sectionedDescription/description:
Benviar Tonson Residence is close to Bangkok CBD  and famous shopping area in town, yet located at a quiet and safe road. 
You’ll love it because of my friendly staff, the location, the tremendous space,and the management of the building. It's ideal for big groups, families (with kids), couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

225 Sqm Comfy and Spacious Apartment, with 3 bedrooms for 6 guests, 4 bathrooms, dining room, kitchen, living room, washing machine, free wi-fi, cable TV. Our building has a swimming pool and a small gym, and 24 hours security guard to ensure guests have a comfortable experience.

The guests can enjoy semi outdoor pool and gym at the residence. Or enjoy shopping at walking distance to famous  shopping street in Bangkok.

Phone No: +66 22513071

We can provide In-room Breakfast 200Thai Baht for each person; you may decide and order the breakfast the day before.

We are located in a quiet street between Wireless and Langsuan Road. There are still plenty of greens around us and convenience to get around. Only few mins walking to the cafe and local restaurants with the selection of Thai or Western food.

Taking 10 mins walking to the Chidlom or Ratchadamri BTS Station. Or few mins to get the taxi from Langsuan Road. We offer free parking at all times.

- Extra-person charge: THB 1000/ night
-Children below 12 year old are free of charge from extra persons 
- Cleaning with replacing towels, changing bed sheets, and refilling amenities can be offered THB. 900 per each time
- No animal or pet is allowed in the Property.
- To arrange late night check-in, please contact us at least 72 hours before arrival.

*Party is not allowed in our property. Loud noise is not permitted in the room or balconies at night. 
Our goal is to ensure a safe, comfortable stay for our guests, and to respect their privacy.

- No Smoking at indoor area.
- For guests who would host party, additional deposit will be collected upon check-in

name: 2 Br 4ppl Trendy Area, Pool, WiFi, BTS, Shopping
address: Khet Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 1PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Located in the heart of Thonglor, this trendy two bedroom apartment has it all. It is surrounded by a bounty of restaurants, night life, street food, and convenience shops. Outside the apartment you can find: massage, a nail salon, a 711, Max Value Supermarket and motorbike taxis.

Relax with free wifi and enjoy the swimming pool. The apartment comes with a stove, microwave, washing machine umbrellas, aircons, electric fan, a bathtub, a DVD player and sporting goods.

This apartment in trendy Thonglor has everything you need. Not only is it situated in one of the coolest areas in Bangkok, but the room also has the basic amenities. The apartment consists of two bedrooms, it has a kitchen, with stove top burners, there's a living room with a tv, wifi, and HDMI cord for connections. The shower have hot water than can be accessed at any time. There are three elevators in the building, so don't worry if you have a lot of luggage!

If you are interested in sports, the building has a ping pong room and a swimming pool on the 9th floor. The gym is restricted to members only, guests will not be allowed in. In the apartment, you can also find a football, badminton rackets, a frisbee, and ping pong equipment.

Guests are allowed to use the ping pong room and swimming pool on the 9th floor. The gym is restricted to members only. No guests will be let in. 

In the apartment lobby you can find a small convenience store, an amazing restaurant, a dry cleaner, and several hair salons. From the outside of the building you can enter a massage parlor, nail salon, and Japanese restaurant. Just down the street there is a max value shop and 711. There are also restaurants and bars above the max value. Down sukhumit 55 there are many restaurants and bars! It's a perfect street for food and drinks!

I work full time and am not always able to be meet guests. Please don't hesitate to message me, I always have my phone and I am very quick to respond. I am here to help make sure your trip goes smoothly.

The apartment lobby you can find a small convenience store, an amazing restaurant, a dry cleaner, and several hair salons. From the outside of the building you can enter a massage parlor, nail salon, and Japanese restaurant. Just down the street there is a max value shop and 711. There are also restaurants and bars above the max value. Down sukhumit 55 there are many restaurants and bars! It's a perfect street for food and drinks!

At the beginning of Soi 18 by the main road you will don a motorbike stand. 20 baht to the bts. There are also red buses that go up Sukhumvit 55. They will take you anywhere along the road for only 7 baht. 

Across the street  you will find a place called The Commons. This is an excellent place for family or friends. There are loads of amazing restaurants and they have a huge variety of wines and beers on the ground level. 

On the main road you will find a building called 72. This building has many great bars, restaurants, and clubs. If you turn left out of Soi 18 you will find an endless list of bars and restaurants. The bts is only 20 baht away and takes two minutes by motorbike. The canal is located on the other side of sukhumvit 55. It's a ten minute walk or 15 baht on a motorbike.

Getting around by taxi and motorbike is the easiest way and also the skytrain . There is a motorbike stand on Soi 18 and there are several along Sukhumvit 55. There are red buses that go up and down Sukhumvit 55 and for only 7 baht you can go anywhere along 55. It's a really fun street to walk down and you will find many cool places along the way!
sectionedDescription/interaction: I work full time and am not always able to be meet guests. Please don't hesitate to message me, I always have my phone and I am very quick to respond. I am here to help make sure your trip goes smoothly.

This apartment in trendy Thonglor has everything you need. Not only is it situated in one of the coolest areas in Bangkok, but the room also has the basic amenities. The apartment consists of two bedrooms, it has a kitchen, with stove top burners, there's a living room with a tv, wifi, and HDMI cord for connections. The shower have hot water than can be accessed at any time. There are three elevators in the building, so don't worry if you have a lot of luggage!

If you are interested in sports, the building has a ping pong room and a swimming pool on the 9th floor. The gym is restricted to members only, guests will not be allowed in. In the apartment, you can also find a football, badminton rackets, a frisbee, and ping pong equipment.
sectionedDescription/summary:
Located in the heart of Thonglor, this trendy two bedroom apartment has it all. It is surrounded by a bounty of restaurants, night life, street food, and convenience shops. Outside the apartment you can find: massage, a nail salon, a 711, Max Value Supermarket and motorbike taxis.

Relax with free wifi and enjoy the swimming pool. The apartment comes with a stove, microwave, washing machine umbrellas, aircons, electric fan, a bathtub, a DVD player and sporting goods.
sectionedDescription/transit: Getting around by taxi and motorbike is the easiest way and also the skytrain . There is a motorbike stand on Soi 18 and there are several along Sukhumvit 55. There are red buses that go up and down Sukhumvit 55 and for only 7 baht you can go anywhere along 55. It's a really fun street to walk down and you will find many cool places along the way!

name: Amazing House with Roof-Top Pool in Thonglor
address: แขวง คลองตันเหนือ เขตวัฒนา  10110, กรุงเทพมหานคร, Thailand
city: แขวง คลองตันเหนือ เขตวัฒนา  10110
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 4PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
My home is a safe environment as we make sanitation and cleanliness our number 1 priority. The entire unit is professionally cleaned after each guests check-out.  
- RIWA is a secluded, stand alone building, located in a quiet residential area. You do not need to share public spaces or elevators with neighbors, to social distance. 
- Wish to enjoy Bangkok vibrant life? RIWA is in the middle of all the best restaurants, night life, and sightseeing spots. 
- We have an in-house resident caretaker.

The 2 floors including each three bedroom plus den apartment boasts over 4,600 square feet of living area. It features private keycard-activated elevator that will take you directly to your private apartments.

Guests have access to their own private units and the Roof-Top.
With 2 large living rooms for gathering, the unit accommodates 12 in comfort with en-suite bathroom for each bedrooms. The 2 master bedrooms have a large walk-in closets where you can enjoy dressing in comfort with own in-room air-conditioning. The 2 dens allows for additional sleeping for 4.

For your convenience, the apartment is equipped with a full kitchen and an in-unit washing machine. Two parking stalls are also available for your use.

You will have full access of:
- 1st Floor: Entrance and parking
- 2nd Floor: Full apartment with 4 bedrooms, living-room and kitchen
- 3rd Floor: Full apartment 4 bedrooms, living-room and kitchen
- 5th Floor: Roof-Top with Pool
You will have access to 2nd, 3rd and 5th floors by private lift

My Co-Host Berry, a well-travelled Bangkokian, will be able to assit you during your stay at RIWA.
Please contact Berry for anything related to your stay and any questions you may have in mind.
Our house caretaker Khun Yut - who stays in a detached studio at the ground floor of the property - is here to ensure your safety during your stay as well as looking after the common areas of the home.

Fantastic restaurants, bars, and nightlife make Thonglor the hippest street in all of Bangkok.

You are right in the middle of all that is happening. I have not visited them all, as the list is exhaustive.

All located near Thonglor, some of my favorites are Pattara, Kanittha, and Madame Shawn for Thai cuisine, Kenji’s Lab for Japanese, Surface Kitchen for French, Bacco for Italian and the Lost Burro for Mexican fare. For drinks with friends, the Rabbit Hole and Tuba. For clubbing, go to Grease. To hang out, check out theCommons, Seen Space, and several rooftop bars on Thonglor.

Of course, real Thai street food is located right in front of the lane, so you can eat like the locals for cheap.

Also do not hesitate to  get a foot massage at any boutique that lines Thonglor for that needed foot and shoulder rub. For the discerning, a good day spa is within reach for pure relaxation and Thai aroma therapy - an experience that cannot be missed while in Thailand!

A few BTS stations away, you will be in Mall heaven.
- EmDistrict, Siam Paragon, MBK, Terminal 21, Central Embassy are within reach.
- For local shopping experience, hit Platinum Mall and Pratunam District, where bargains abound.
- Looking for anything and everything? Hit JJ Market on the weekends.
- RIWA Thonglor is also located near several world-renowned hospitals, popular for medi-tourism. Bangkok is well known for world class medical treatment, at an affordable price, where people from all over come for annual health check up, or advance medical treatments.

This City of Angels is known for her ornate shrines and vibrant street life.
- A ride along the Chao Phraya River will take you to its network of canals, flowing past the Rattanakosin Royal District, the Grand Palace and the sacred Emerald Buddha.
- Nearby, Wat Pho houses the world renowned reclining Buddha (also the birth place of traditional Thai Massage and Medicine School, a practice that dates back 2500 years ago ); - and on the opposite shore, the Khmer-style spire, Wat Arun. All this, at only a Grab ride away.

RIWA Thonglor is situated on a private, residential lane.
Once home, you leave behind the city noise. Enjoy quiet times at the pool or gaze at the stars on the rooftop deck. Open up the kitchen and make your own favorite meal or experiment with an exotic Thai dish.

Makro Express, Tops Supermarket, Foodland, as with your corner 7-11 store are nearby, to pick up all that you may need to cook up a storm.

And if your are tired from the day’s events, simply relax with your favourite drink on the rooftop at RIWA!
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
FIRE SAFETY
-	In case of fire, DO NOT use the elevator; take the stairs to the GROUND Floor.

ACCESS / SECURITY
-	Keep your 3 sets of key and keycard secure at all times. Report lost cards immediately. Any loss will be charged 1,000 Baht / set.
-	In order to avoid cluster and house party with the pending re-opening of travels to Thailand, you shall notify my Co-Host in advance if you wish to bring in unregistered guests.  
-	Guests are responsible and liable for any  misconduct and loss or damages caused by anyone associated with them during their stay at RIWA.
-	When not home, ensure all doors are locked. 

FORBIDDEN ACTIVITIES
During your stay at RIWA, It is NOT allowed to:
-	move, re-arrange or re-locate any furniture such as sofa, dining table and beds as this may result in injury and liable property damages. Please contact Berry for any special requests
-	stock any items in the public areas of the property
-	lead any kind of activity that creates a regular human traffic in and out of property
-	use the property as logistic hub

ELECTRICITY - Help us conserve energy!
-	Air conditioner and lights shall be switched off anytime the apartment in not occupied. 
-	Please turn off Living/Dining Room Air Conditioner when retiring to bedrooms.

SWIMMING POOL AND ROOFTOP (Access via Key Card ONLY)
-	No children should be left without adult supervision AT ALL TIMES 
-	NO breakables - glasses, cups, plates - are allowed on the rooftop; plastic cups for pool use can be found in the kitchen cabinet
-	No open fires or barbecue is permitted
-	Turn off lights when you leave the rooftop to not disturb neighbours
-	Refrain from loud music or excessive noise, out of respect for our other guests and neighbours

SMOKING
-	Smoking is permitted only on the rooftop, and the ground floor  
-	In consideration of other guests, kindly use ashtrays 

LAUNDRY & CLEANING
-	Do not hang any items on the front balcony;  use the drying rack provided in the laundry room.

GARBAGE
-	Dispose garbage daily in the ‘Garbage Room’ next to the front gate
-	The property is pest-free. Please help keep it that way!
-	Do not leave food and dirty dishes unattended, as they are prone to attract unwanted pests. 
-	Use with extreme caution when using the sink garbage disposal
-	Dispose of hard waste such as bones, plastic or wood in the garbage can.  Do not throw in disposal as it will severely damage the motor

name: Steps from Siam Paragon - Cozy 4 BR Vacation home
address: Khet Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
SHA+ Certified. Hidden in a small alley behind the Jim Thompson house, right in the heart of Bangkok. This comfortable hideaway is only steps away from Siam Paragon, MBK, Museums, National Stadium and  a lot of restaurants. Our unique location is ideal for exploring the city and very convenient for shoppers. With BTS skytrain, bus stops, and canal pier close by, it’s an ease to get around.

Our place is more like a home away from home, a casual and cozy one. We have 4 big guest suites with smart TV and 2 air conditioning in each room, a small laundry corner, a living room with big screen TV, Netflix, a lot of board games, and a nice kitchen fully equipped ready for you to prepare a delicious meal or just to heat up the famous spicy Thai food you bring back from the even hotter and spicier street of Bangkok.

- You will have the entire house for your group. The  
   whole common areas and all 4   
   Suites.
- Free WiFi throughout   
   the building
- Living room with 
   comfortable sofa, big screen 
   TV (75” LCD TV), and board  
    games 
- Dining area and an open-plan kitchen for guests 
   to cook simple/light meals or 
   heat up delicious street foods  
   brought back from nearby 
   streets.
- Nespresso, Dolce 
   Gusto coffee machine and Balmuda toaster. Snacks in  
   the kitchen and drinking water are free.
- Small laundry corner with free detergent and fabric 
   softener sheets.
- A nice patio on the first floor and a balcony on the second floor
- Smoking not allowed in the house only for outside at the patio first floor.

We are always available for any questions or help if needed. We are willing to recommend the nice places and fun activities to you as per requested too.

- Humble Abode is located in the famous shopping neighborhood of Bangkok, just a short walk to MBK, Siam Paragon, and Siam Square. Central World is 1 bts stop away. Central Embassy and Chidlom are 2 just 2 bts stops away.
- Our neighbors also include Jim Thompson house, Yelo House and Bangkok art & cultural center. It’s also around 300 meters from BTS National Stadium station.
- Lumpini park – one of the largest green space in Bangkok is only just 3 stops away on BTS.
- You can reach old town Bangkok on a canal boat from Saphan Huachang pier (5minutes walk form us)
o 12 minutes ride on a boat to Phanfah bridge pier where you can walk to Wat sakat temple, Golden Mountain, many famous temples and even the Grand Palace and Wat Pho which is like 25 minutes walk from Phanfah bride.
- hop on a BTS to Chatuchak* weekend market on a weekend.
*Chatuchak is home to more than 8,000 markets stalls, where you can “shop till you drop” from fashion clothing, handicrafts, homewares, food, plants, pet shops, jewelry, antiques, souvenirs and much more.

The BTS skytrain National Stadium Station is in front of Soi Kasemsan 2. Our house is located in the little alley on the left next to Jim Thompson Art Center. MBK shopping center is connected to this station. 

Bangkok downtown shopping area is only 1 stop from us. Get off at Siam Station and spend your shopping day at Siam Paragon, Siam Square, Siam discovery and Siam Center which are also walkable. You can walk a little bit further to Central World to continue your shopping route. This station is also the interchange station that could very convenient lead to many travel attractions.

Our place is a 3-story high building. We have no elevator.  It may not suitable for wheelchair users or those with limited mobility.

- CCTV: 24/7 (common areas) for 
   our guests’ security.

- Our housekeeper is on site 24 
   hours, except some Sundays. (Separate entrance)

- We will provide cleaning in common area everyday, and in-
   room cleaning every 3 days.

- We have no parking onsite, but we could reserve parking spaces for our guests at Jim Thompson Art Center which is 50 meters away from us,
   please contact us in advance if 
   you need a parking space.

- Please be respectful to the neighbors and keep the noise to a
   minimum after 9 pm.

- Smoking not allowed in the house only for outside at the patio first floor.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
- Smoking is prohibited in our building. There is a smoking area outside the building on the first floor. Please also close the door when smoke.
- Pets may be allowed upon request — additional fees (3,500 Baht per night) may apply. Please contact us for more details.
- Commercial Photography and filming may be allowed upon request - addition fees may apply. Please contact us for more details.
- Please keep all noises down after 9 p.m.
- No illegal substances allowed on the premises.
- No Durian inside the house and in the refrigerator. You can enjoy Durian in the patio on the first floor.
- Maximum of 12 guests; any additional person will incur a charge of 2500 Baht per night (a chair bed will be provided). Not more than 2 extra guests permitted.

name: 11BR Lux Villa near BTS Thonglor Haven.
address: Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 4PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Matta Bangkok graces the prestigious epicenter, a serene contrast to bustling Sukhumvit. Only a 10-minute stroll from Thonglor BTS, it seamlessly blends tranquility and accessibility..

Indulge in opulence with lavish amenities in every room: a 55" Smart TV, secure Safe box, sophisticated Bluetooth speaker, coffee maker, and a fully-equipped pantry. The rain shower and bathtub, accompanied by a private garden view, provide a sensory retreat. Fresh amenities, a hair dryer, and a plush bathrobe..

Welcome to our opulent retreat, where luxury meets functionality in exquisite harmony. Immerse yourself in the lavish embrace of our 11-bedroom haven, meticulously designed to captivate your senses while catering to your every need..

Indulge in the finer things in life with our daily cleaning service, ensuring that your stay remains effortlessly flawless. Each of the 11 bedrooms is a testament to meticulous craftsmanship, boasting aesthetic elegance that seamlessly intertwines with remarkable practicality.

Your realm of luxury expands beyond the bedrooms to encompass two inviting living rooms, a grand outdoor dining area set against the backdrop of nature's beauty, and two intimate indoor dining spots for moments of culinary delight. The fully-equipped kitchen stands as a testament to modern convenience, where every culinary desire can be fulfilled.

Within each room, you'll encounter bespoke designer furniture, handpicked to elevate your experience. Whether it's the Warren Planter lounge chair exuding comfort or the opulent Genuine Nappa leather sofa/lounge chair, every piece reflects the epitome of style.

Technological sophistication intertwines seamlessly with luxury. A 55-inch Smart TV, elegant brass pendant lamps, secure safe boxes, and sophisticated Bluetooth speakers grace each space, ensuring that entertainment and security are at your fingertips.

Slip into a realm of dreamy comfort with our sumptuous bedding ensemble, boasting an unparalleled 800-thread-count Egyptian cotton. Customize your sleep experience with two pillow variations, firm and soft, paired with a 5-zone support pocket spring bed that guarantees an indulgent night's rest.

To elevate your arrival experience, take advantage of our airport pick-up service...

Our 10-seater van awaits, ready to whisk you away in style. 

Please note that the van service is available for a fee of 900 THB per way, offering comfort and convenience from the moment you land..

And for those who seek culinary excellence, the option for a private chef awaits, promising a minimum expenditure of 60,000 THB solely for your gastronomic desires..

Your journey with us begins even before you step through our doors. Should you require pre-arrival grocery shopping, allow us to extend our support for an additional fee of 1,000 THB. 

Your comfort and satisfaction are paramount, and we spare no effort in ensuring that your stay with us transcends ordinary indulgence.

all rooms are yours except the office area.

You can contact me through Airbnb messenger or our website messenger .

Walking distance to Thonglo BTS (800m)

use grab (taxi, van) 
location use: the matta

use grab application for grocery and transportation.

address: Huaikhwang, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
You will feel comfortable and at home while staying in BKK.Close to great areas such as Pratunam, night market and nightlife (RCA,Sukhmvit)and wellconected to all of BKK by MRT which is5m away
**Check out my other new apartment!!**

name: landmark skyscraper BTS Saphan Taksin Iconsiam
address: Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 4PM - 11PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
* Stunning views of the Chao Phraya River *
- A landmark in Bangkok
- 100 m to the Lebua Sky Bar
- 5 mins walk to BTS Saphan Taksin Station
- 6 mins walk to Sathorn Pier
- 6 mins walk to Mandarin Oriental Hotel and Shangri-La Hotel
- 150 sq.m. 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 living rooms, 2 balconies
- Fully equipped kitchen, drinking water filtration, air purifier
- Maintained by a hotel housekeeping company, hotel-quality fabrics
- Complimentary housekeeping for stays longer than 2 weeks

Hello，my friends! 

It is more than just a building, it is a symbol of an era. The famous Hollywood film "The Hangover 2" starring Bradley Cooper and Zach Galifianakis, was filmed in this building.

With a significant history, the State Tower stands as a testament to the passage of time, also a well-known landmark in Bangkok, it’s a high-rise condominium that embodies the essence of the old metropolis. If you desire to immerse yourself in the everyday life and authentic traditional cuisine of Bangkok's historic district, and explore the renowned historical sites in the old city, experiencing the fusion of tradition and modernity while strolling along centuries-old streets, then State Tower would be an excellent choice.

The wide view of the Chao Phraya River and the sparkling lights at night are often featured on the covers of various Bangkok travel magazines. 

This area is most famous for being the starting point of Bangkok's history as the capital of the Kingdom of Siam. It is described in the novel "Anna and the King of Siam" by Margaret Landon: "The royal fleet glided slowly down the Chao Phraya River, and as the first rays of dawn cast their light on the land, the golden tower spires floating in the mist on the river became faintly visible. I knew then that I had arrived in Bangkok, that’s the Grand Palace…"

Within a 5 minutes walk, you can reach the historic Mandarin Oriental Hotel（since 1876), Shangri-La Hotel, Wat Yannawa Temple, and the Sathorn Pier for Iconsiam shopping mall and Asiatique night market. You can also reach the BTS Skyline Saphan Taksin station in 5 minutes walk.

The grand fireworks festival held at Iconsiam shopping center on New Year's Eve every year, the apartment balcony is also the best viewing point in Bangkok. Moreover, the shopping center also sporadically sets off fireworks at night.

The apartment has an area of 150 square meters and can accommodate 6 adults. It includes three separate bedrooms. The master bedroom has a king-size bed with suite bathroom, and a balcony. One of the guest bedrooms has a king-size bed, while the other has two 1.2-meter single beds. The living room, dining room, balcony, and bathrooms are all very spacious. There is a fully functional kitchen with a drinking water filtration system and all kinds of utensils and appliances. It is suitable for both short-term stays in Bangkok and long-term living.

This apartment belongs to my aunt, who returned to Sydney, Australia after working in the field of early childhood education in Bangkok for decades. The apartment is very well-maintained and equipped with brand new furniture and appliances. My aunt still comes back to stay and visit relatives and friends here every year. 

She asked me to pass on the message to guests from all over the world: "This apartment has given me many beautiful memories in my life. I hope it can also be a place for you and your family or friends to enjoy the sunset on the Chao Phraya River during your trip in Thailand."

All amenities prepared for your journey.
Just make yourself at home to use all appliances.
Due to personal hygiene and environmental protection, no slippers, toothbrush and toothpaste, soap bar, thanks for your understanding.

Any questions always feel free to ask me please!

Comfy condo in a prime location with a 24-hours security system, full equipment and household devices.
Please remember locking the door when going out, and keep the key card be with you.
Also turn off the power please when going out, energy saved is energy produced.
Please don’t make noise, and keep the environment clean. 
Thank you!

sectionedDescription/description:
Charming apartment in a new Condominium with swimming pool and gym. It's in a superb location close by Lumpini Park with easy access to the Subway (MRT), shopping malls and express way. 
You'll love my place because of the great location, the comfy beds, the bright living area, and the great facilities, the swimming pool and the gym.

101 sqm / Swimming-pool / Gym / Washer / Dryer / Water filter / Towels / Shampoo / Shower gel

Bright and spacious (101 sqm) apartment in the very center of Bangkok. Two bedrooms (both en-suite bathrooms) and utility room. Grand living/dinning room with open, fully furnished, kitchen.

Only 5 minutes walk from the MRT and 300m away from high way. You can easily get to all the tourist attractions like the Grand Palace, China Town, Kaosan Rd, Siam Paragon, Central World, etc.

Full apartment with 2 cozy rooms an private bathrooms
Beautiful swimming-pool, jacuzzi and fitness
Free Wi-Fi
CHECKIN between 2.00PM to 12.00 midnight. If you need a night checkin, contact us.

I can provide different on demand services such as: 
- Airport Private car / Van pick-up 
- International / Thai breakfast
- Thai cooking classes
- Cultural / Sightseeing tours in / out Bangkok 
Do not hesitate to contact me for more information, I can arrange the holiday of your dreams with bespoke guidance and premium services.

Lumpini Park
Lumpini Park is an inner-city haven of tranquility, fresh air and shade, offering the perfect connection to nature. The park is the habitat of various flora and fauna and the perfect spot for a round of jog, light workout, aerobics or any other recreational activities.

Lumpini Boxing Stadium
Muay Thai boxing in Bangkok is an experience not to be missed and, without doubt, the best place to watch genuine matches is at the new and improved Lumpini Boxing Stadium.

8 minutes walk to MRT Lumpini
5 minutes walk to MRT Klong Toei
200 meters away from the high way
8 minutes walk to Lumpini park
3 minutes walk to 7/11 and Tesco Express open 24/7
10 minutes drive to Big C supermarket
10 minutes walk to Silom nightlife 
- World famous Club Ce La Vi and the SoSofitel pool parties
10 minutes walk to the German embassy

name: Dazzle Homey 1BR -Prime Area NANA -Great Pool
address: Bangkok, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
A Luxurious stay in a quiet and friendly corner at Sukhumvit Soi 7, yet, just a few steps away from the vibrant night life of Soi 11, NANA, and ASOKE area.  

《Why Choose here?》
⁕200m to Skytrain BTS Nana station (in the heart of Bangkok)
⁕Airy Spacious Room with a great Roof Top Pool and Gym
⁕Modern Interior Decoration with minimalism concept
⁕Fully Equipped Kitchen and Home Appliances
⁕Prime location, close to clubs and bar, shopping mall and street food, BTS and MRT, but quiet at night time

⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜
《Room features》
⁕38sqm of Room Space
⁕High speed WIFI (100/50 mbps)
⁕True ID box TV programs (pay on demand)
⁕Smart TV box, plays Netflix and Youtube
⁕1 king size bed
⁕2 air conditioners
⁕Cozy sofa
⁕Large flat screen TV
⁕Iron and Iron board
⁕Hair dryer
⁕Fully equipped kitchen (Induction Cooker, Cooking Hood)
⁕Kitchen Wares (Pan, Dishes, Forks, Knives etc.)
⁕Toaster
⁕Kettle
⁕Microwave Oven 
⁕Refrigerator (with Ice Maker)
⁕Washing Machine, Clothes Rack
⁕Bangkok awesome weather for clothes drying :)

《We also provide》
⁕Shampoo 
⁕Shower gel 
⁕Soap
⁕Tooth paste
⁕Bathing Towel (large) for each guest
⁕Face Towel (Small) for each guest
⁕Laundry Detergent
⁕Dish Washing Detergent

《The Facilities》
⁕Stylish Roof Top Pool with several sun beds
⁕Fully equipped gym facilities
⁕Kids playing room
⁕Roof Top Sky garden

《What’s nearby?》
7-11 is at the entrance of the alley (Soi 7) opened 24 hours, serving your need for supply any time any day. Down the alley you can also see a lot of sports bar and talking bars. Coffee shops such as Starbucks and The Coffee Club, sports and pool bars and a few Western restaurants, pizza joints, burger joints and Thai street food are right at the next alley at Sukhumvit Soi 11. There are also plenty of good massage shops and laundry shops not too far from your perimeter.

《Where to eat?》
We recommend to go to the alley next to yours at Sukhumvit Soi 11 where all the good restaurants and munchies are, “Sukhumvit 11 Thai Street Food” is a good choice for Thai food, others like “Hemingway's”, “Oscar Bistro”, “Soho Pizza” and “Tony's Sukhumvit 11” are good munchies places as well. You can also walk 2 mins to reach Sukhumvit Soi 5 where you will find Middle Eastern and Indian food, “Foodland” is always a good choice to stop by for some Grocery and a quick brunch before starting your day. If you go further to Soi 13, you can find a lot of sports bars and pool bars, such as “Old German Beer House” and “Breakers Sports Bar”. If you go a little further more to Asok, you will reach the mall “Terminal 21” and you can get up to the 5th floor for a huge Thai food court.

《Where to Party?》
When talking about partying, NANA is the place to be! You can totally stay here if too lazy to move around, and get your night started with some drink at the bars nearby such as “Wine Connection”, “Old German Beer House”, “Havana Social” and roof top bar like “Above Eleven” or “Spectrum”. Then we suggest you to discover Soi 11 at midnight, starting with clubs like “Levels” and “Sugar”. If the night is still young to you, “Insanity” club is just at the top of Sukhumvit Soi 11, and finally, the newly opened "BOBO Club" right under Hyatt Regency Bangkok Sukhumvit. 

《Where to Shop?》
If you live around the area of NANA or ASOKE, there’s no question that the nearest and best shopping mall is “Terminal 21”. For Groceries and food market, there are few options such as “Foodland”, “Villa Market” “Tops Market” and “Gourmet Market”, all of them can be reached by just walking. But do NOT settle down by just walking, since by BTS, all the famous malls such as “Central Embassy”, “Central World”, “EMQuartier” and “Siam Paragon” are just a few stops away!

⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜
《Where to eat?》
There is a short cut to Sukhumvit Soi 11 where all the good restaurants and munchies are, “Suk…11” the restaurant is a good choice for Thai food, others like “Oscar Bistro”, “Pizza and the city” and “El Gaucho Argentinian Steakhouse” are good munchies places as well. There is also a shortcut to Sukhumvit Soi 5 where you will find Middle Eastern and Indian food, “Foodland” is always a good choice to stop by for some Grocery and a quick brunch before starting your day!


《Where to Party?》
When talking about partying, NANA and ASOKE are the place to be! You can totally stay here if too lazy to move around, and get your night started with some drink at the bars nearby such as “The Game” bar, “Havana Social” and roof top bar like “Above Eleven”. Then we suggest you to discover Soi 11 at midnight, starting with clubs like “Levels” and “Sugar”. If the night is still young to you, “Insanity” club is just across the street of Sukhumvit Road, and finally, the famous “Scratch Dog” at Sukhumvit Soi 20. 


《Where to Shop?》
If you live around the area of NANA or ASOKE, there’s no question that the nearest and best shopping mall is “Terminal 21”. But do NOT settle down by just walking, since by BTS, all the famous malls such as “Central Embassy”, “Central World”, “EMQuartier” and “Siam Paragon” are just a few stops away!

⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜

⁕MRT Sukhumvit stations is 12 minutes of walk away

Swimming Pool Access: 
The pool is generally free to use for all short-term or long-term tenants during its open hours, however there will be annual maintenance every year to keep the pool safe and clean. If tenants somehow encounter an annual swimming pool maintenance during their stay and thus cannot use the pool, we still do NOT provide any partial refund for it, as it is an annual maintenance!

⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜⁜
《Room features》
⁕38sqm of Room Space
⁕High speed WIFI (100/50 mbps)
⁕True ID box TV programs (pay on demand)
⁕Smart TV box, plays Netflix and Youtube
⁕1 king size bed
⁕2 air conditioners
⁕Cozy sofa
⁕Large flat screen TV
⁕Iron and Iron board
⁕Hair dryer
⁕Fully equipped kitchen (Induction Cooker, Cooking Hood)
⁕Kitchen Wares (Pan, Dishes, Forks, Knives etc.)
⁕Toaster
⁕Kettle
⁕Microwave Oven 
⁕Refrigerator (with Ice Maker)
⁕Washing Machine, Clothes Rack
⁕Bangkok awesome weather for clothes drying :)

《We also provide》
⁕Shampoo 
⁕Shower gel 
⁕Soap
⁕Tooth paste
⁕Bathing Towel (large) for each guest
⁕Face Towel (Small) for each guest
⁕Laundry Detergent
⁕Dish Washing Detergent

《The Facilities》
⁕Stylish Roof Top Pool with several sun beds
⁕Fully equipped gym facilities
⁕Kids playing room
⁕Roof Top Sky garden

《What’s nearby?》
7-11 is at the entrance of the alley (Soi 7) opened 24 hours, serving your need for supply any time any day. Down the alley you can also see a lot of sports bar and talking bars. Coffee shops such as Starbucks and The Coffee Club, sports and pool bars and a few Western restaurants, pizza joints, burger joints and Thai street food are right at the next alley at Sukhumvit Soi 11. There are also plenty of good massage shops and laundry shops not too far from your perimeter.

《Where to eat?》
We recommend to go to the alley next to yours at Sukhumvit Soi 11 where all the good restaurants and munchies are, “Sukhumvit 11 Thai Street Food” is a good choice for Thai food, others like “Hemingway's”, “Oscar Bistro”, “Soho Pizza” and “Tony's Sukhumvit 11” are good munchies places as well. You can also walk 2 mins to reach Sukhumvit Soi 5 where you will find Middle Eastern and Indian food, “Foodland” is always a good choice to stop by for some Grocery and a quick brunch before starting your day. If you go further to Soi 13, you can find a lot of sports bars and pool bars, such as “Old German Beer House” and “Breakers Sports Bar”. If you go a little further more to Asok, you will reach the mall “Terminal 21” and you can get up to the 5th floor for a huge Thai food court.

《Where to Party?》
When talking about partying, NANA is the place to be! You can totally stay here if too lazy to move around, and get your night started with some drink at the bars nearby such as “Wine Connection”, “Old German Beer House”, “Havana Social” and roof top bar like “Above Eleven” or “Spectrum”. Then we suggest you to discover Soi 11 at midnight, starting with clubs like “Levels” and “Sugar”. If the night is still young to you, “Insanity” club is just at the top of Sukhumvit Soi 11, and finally, the newly opened "BOBO Club" right under Hyatt Regency Bangkok Sukhumvit. 

《Where to Shop?》
If you live around the area of NANA or ASOKE, there’s no question that the nearest and best shopping mall is “Terminal 21”. For Groceries and food market, there are few options such as “Foodland”, “Villa Market” “Tops Market” and “Gourmet Market”, all of them can be reached by just walking. But do NOT settle down by just walking, since by BTS, all the famous malls such as “Central Embassy”, “Central World”, “EMQuartier” and “Siam Paragon” are just a few stops away!

name: Resort Style Luxury apartment,5min to MRT,freeWifi
address: Huai Khwang, Bangkok, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Our large and comfortable 2 bedroom apartment(68SQM/700SQF)
has a true resort feel right in the heart of Bangkok.This unit is considered huge by Thailand apartment's (URL HIDDEN) comfortably fits 7 and you are able to enjoy the facilities in the condo.There is a shopping mall right bellow the apartment and you are able to walk to a big shopping(Central Rama 9) and the MRT in about 5m.There is free shuttle van provided too!

Luxurious new & modern apartment located in the heart of Bangkok.A perfect place to kick back and relax after a long day exploring Bangkok City! 
Close to public transport and all main sights.Belle Condo is a luxury serviced residences located close (EMAIL HIDDEN) has 2 bedrooms a large open kitchen,dining,living room area and a terrace that overlooks the amazing city skyline!!.You will have access to a resort style pool area and a fully equipped gym and playground.

The unit is equipped with a washing machine,dryer,microwave,stove and a fridge.

The bedrooms are spacious and comfortable.The master room has a queen size bed and the second room has 1 single bed .We will also provide additional 4 comfortable single foldable beds,bedsheets and blanket.

Guest will be able to access to two lovely pools,gym,playground

Feel free to contact me,if you required any help or recommendations during your stay as i work and live nearby:

My preferred form of communication channels:
-Airbnb
-Mobile phone
-Line
-(website hidden)

Getting to my apartment

From Suvarnabhumi airport,there are 2 ways-
-By taxi it will take around 35-45m with a cost of     around 350-450tbh

-By Airport Rail Link take to Makassan Station alight and then walk about 2m to Petchaburi MRT (email hidden)from there head to Phra Ram 9 Station which is 1 station away. From there it is just a 5m walk from the MRT to the condo.

From Don Mueng Airport,there is 2 ways-
-By Taxi it will take around 30-40m with a cost of 180-250tbh

-Another cheaper alternative is to take the Bus (B1) to Chatuchak MRT and then head to Phra ram 9.

Phra Ram 9 is a lively area conveniently located in central Bangkok,just a 5m walk and you will be at the MRT and Central Plaza Shopping Mall,and across the street is the very large Fortune IT mall and also China embassy.For nightlife,RCA is just a few minutes away by cab.

Right below the apartment there is a shopping mall where you can get your daily groceries and food.There is a massage parlour,nail spa,yoga,kids arcade and a muay thai gym.

Phra Ram 9 MRT is literally a 5m walk away from the (URL HIDDEN) will also be a free shuttle van to send you to the shopping mall and train station.

Do note that we will only be providing 4 towels

name: Cozy apartment near BTS for group
address: Khlong Toei Nuea, Bangkok, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
Staying at the heart of Bangkok. Our apartment is on the 26th floor, so nice scenery and very convenience. You can walk 350m to BTS station. This place is 3 BR & 2 Bathroom. Also you can rent each room separately for 1200 baht for maximum 3 people.

The apartment are spacious and very comfortable for 6-9 ppl group. There are 3 bedroom (1 en-suite included) and 2 bathroom.  The place is well decorated and equipped with full facilities, LCD, Internet Wifi, Kitchen (with cooking and dining set). It is affordable place for large group in the heart of Bangkok near BTS station.
There are pool and gym in the building. 
It is easily reach the chic and trendy area Thong Lo and Ekamai area.

The apartment is at 26th floor. Enjoy Bangkok view from the top.

Communicate with guests via Airbnb message system and (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN).

Thong Lor and Ekamai areas are rich of good dining, shopping and entertainment. The chic restaurants/nightlife are all around.

Dining : You can choose from 5-star European, Japanese, Authentic Thai food, Fast-Food Chain and famous Bangkok street Food

The department stores are away 1 -2 stations. High End Malls : Emporium,EmQuartier,Terminal 21 and Gateway)
Gateway Ekamai shopping mall is at the opposite. Also Grocery store and Coffee Club restaurant at Major Cineplex Ekamai are 100 meters away. 

The Ekamai Bus Terminal where operates buses to Eastern region (Pattaya, Trat, Chonburi and Rayong) is opposite.

Relaxation : Thai Massage shops/Beauty and Spa are nearby

5 mins walk from BTS Thong Lo and BTS Ekamai. (The building located at the middle between 2 BTS stations)

You can rent each room with 3 people maximum for 1200 baht per night. You can choose to stay 1 ,2 beadroom or entire apartment.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
No pet allowed.
Turn off air-con and lighting when not in use. Do not smoking both in the room and on the balcony.

name: 2 Storey Penthouse with Roof-Top Pool in Thonglor
address: Khet Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 4PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
My home is a safe environment as we make sanitation and cleanliness our number 1 priority. The entire unit is professionally cleaned after each guests check-out.
- RIWA is a secluded, stand alone building, located in a quiet residential area. You do not need to share public spaces or elevators with neighbors, to social distance.
- Wish to enjoy Bangkok vibrant life? RIWA is in the middle of all the best restaurants, night life, and sightseeing spots.
- We have an in-house resident caretaker.

The 2 floors including 3 plus 2 bedroom plus 2 den apartments boasts over 4,000 square feet of living area. It features private keycard-activated elevator that will take you directly to your private apartments.

Guests have access to their own private units and the Roof-Top.
With 2 large living rooms for gathering, the unit accommodates 12 in comfort with en-suite bathroom for each bedrooms. The master bedroom has a large walk-in closets where you can enjoy dressing in comfort with own in-room air-conditioning. The 2 dens allows for additional sleeping for 4.

For your convenience, the apartment is equipped with a full kitchen and an in-unit washing machine. Two parking stalls are also available for your use.

You will have full access of:
- 1st Floor: Entrance and parking
- 3rd Floor: Full apartment 4 bedrooms, living-room and kitchen
- 4th Floor: Apartment with 3 bedrooms, living-room and kitchen (another bedroom is locked for owner private belongings storage)
- 5th Floor: Roof-Top with Pool
You will have access to 3rd, 4th and 5th floors by private lift

My Co-Host Berry, a well-travelled Bangkokian, will be able to assit you during your stay at RIWA.
Please contact Berry for anything related to your stay and any questions you may have in mind.
Our house caretaker Khun Yut - who stays in a detached studio at the ground floor of the property - is here to ensure your safety during your stay as well as looking after the common areas of the home.

Fantastic restaurants, bars, and nightlife make Thonglor the hippest street in all of Bangkok.

You are right in the middle of all that is happening. I have not visited them all, as the list is exhaustive.

All located near Thonglor, some of my favorites are Pattara, Kanittha, and Madame Shawn for Thai cuisine, Kenji’s Lab for Japanese, Surface Kitchen for French, Viva 21 and Bacco for Italian, and the Lost Burro for Mexican fare. For drinks with friends, the Rabbit Hole and Tuba. For clubbing, go to Grease. To hang out, check out theCommons, Seen Space, and several rooftop bars on Thonglor.

Of course, real Thai street food is located right in front of the lane, so you can eat like the locals for cheap.

Also do not hesitate to  get a foot massage at any boutique that lines Thonglor for that needed foot and shoulder rub. For the discerning, a good day spa is within reach for pure relaxation and Thai aroma therapy - an experience that cannot be missed while in Thailand!

A few BTS stations away, you will be in Mall heaven.
- EmDistrict, Siam Paragon, MBK, Terminal 21, Central Embassy are within reach.
- For local shopping experience, hit Platinum Mall and Pratunam District, where bargains abound.
- Looking for anything and everything? Hit JJ Market on the weekends.
- RIWA Thonglor is also located near several world-renowned hospitals, popular for medi-tourism. Bangkok is well known for world class medical treatment, at an affordable price, where people from all over come for annual health check up, or advance medical treatments.

This City of Angels is known for her ornate shrines and vibrant street life.
- A ride along the Chao Phraya River will take you to its network of canals, flowing past the Rattanakosin Royal District, the Grand Palace and the sacred Emerald Buddha.
- Nearby, Wat Pho houses the world renowned reclining Buddha (also the birth place of traditional Thai Massage and Medicine School, a practice that dates back 2500 years ago ); - and on the opposite shore, the Khmer-style spire, Wat Arun. All this, at only a Grab ride away.

RIWA Thonglor is situated on a private, residential lane.
Once home, you leave behind the city noise. Enjoy quiet times at the pool or gaze at the stars on the rooftop deck. Open up the kitchen and make your own favorite meal or experiment with an exotic Thai dish.

Makro Express, Tops Supermarket, Foodland, as with your corner 7-11 store are nearby, to pick up all that you may need to cook up a storm.

And if your are tired from the day’s events, simply relax with your favourite drink on the rooftop at RIWA!
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
FIRE SAFETY
-	In case of fire, DO NOT use the elevator; take the stairs to the GROUND Floor.

ACCESS / SECURITY
-	Keep your 3 sets of key and keycard secure at all times. Report lost cards immediately. Any loss will be charged 1,000 Baht / set.
-	In order to avoid cluster and house party with the pending re-opening of travels to Thailand, you shall notify my Co-Host in advance if you wish to bring in unregistered guests.  
-	Guests are responsible and liable for any  misconduct and loss or damages caused by anyone associated with them during their stay at RIWA.
-	When not home, ensure all doors are locked. 

FORBIDDEN ACTIVITIES
During your stay at RIWA, It is NOT allowed to:
-	move, re-arrange or re-locate any furniture such as sofa, dining table and beds as this may result in injury and liable property damages. Please contact Berry for any special requests
-	stock any items in the public areas of the property
-	lead any kind of activity that creates a regular human traffic in and out of property
-	use the property as logistic hub

ELECTRICITY - Help us conserve energy!
-	Air conditioner and lights shall be switched off anytime the apartment in not occupied. 
-	Please turn off Living/Dining Room Air Conditioner when retiring to bedrooms.

SWIMMING POOL AND ROOFTOP (Access via Key Card ONLY)
-	No children should be left without adult supervision AT ALL TIMES 
-	NO breakables - glasses, cups, plates - are allowed on the rooftop; plastic cups for pool use can be found in the kitchen cabinet
-	No open fires or barbecue is permitted
-	Turn off lights when you leave the rooftop to not disturb neighbours
-	Refrain from loud music or excessive noise, out of respect for our other guests and neighbours

SMOKING
-	Smoking is permitted only on the rooftop, and the ground floor  
-	In consideration of other guests, kindly use ashtrays 

LAUNDRY & CLEANING
-	Do not hang any items on the front balcony;  use the drying rack provided in the laundry room.

GARBAGE
-	Dispose garbage daily in the ‘Garbage Room’ next to the front gate
-	The property is pest-free. Please help keep it that way!
-	Do not leave food and dirty dishes unattended, as they are prone to attract unwanted pests. 
-	Use with extreme caution when using the sink garbage disposal
-	Dispose of hard waste such as bones, plastic or wood in the garbage can.  Do not throw in disposal as it will severely damage the motor
sectionedDescription/interaction:
My Co-Host Berry, a well-travelled Bangkokian, will be able to assit you during your stay at RIWA.
Please contact Berry for anything related to your stay and any questions you may have in mind.
Our house caretaker Khun Yut - who stays in a detached studio at the ground floor of the property - is here to ensure your safety during your stay as well as looking after the common areas of the home.
sectionedDescription/name: 2 Storey Penthouse with Roof-Top Pool in Thonglor
sectionedDescription/neighborhoodOvervie:
Fantastic restaurants, bars, and nightlife make Thonglor the hippest street in all of Bangkok.

You are right in the middle of all that is happening. I have not visited them all, as the list is exhaustive.

All located near Thonglor, some of my favorites are Pattara, Kanittha, and Madame Shawn for Thai cuisine, Kenji’s Lab for Japanese, Surface Kitchen for French, Viva 21 and Bacco for Italian, and the Lost Burro for Mexican fare. For drinks with friends, the Rabbit Hole and Tuba. For clubbing, go to Grease. To hang out, check out theCommons, Seen Space, and several rooftop bars on Thonglor.

Of course, real Thai street food is located right in front of the lane, so you can eat like the locals for cheap.

Also do not hesitate to  get a foot massage at any boutique that lines Thonglor for that needed foot and shoulder rub. For the discerning, a good day spa is within reach for pure relaxation and Thai aroma therapy - an experience that cannot be missed while in Thailand!
sectionedDescription/notes:
RIWA Thonglor is situated on a private, residential lane.
Once home, you leave behind the city noise. Enjoy quiet times at the pool or gaze at the stars on the rooftop deck. Open up the kitchen and make your own favorite meal or experiment with an exotic Thai dish.

Makro Express, Tops Supermarket, Foodland, as with your corner 7-11 store are nearby, to pick up all that you may need to cook up a storm.

And if your are tired from the day’s events, simply relax with your favourite drink on the rooftop at RIWA!
sectionedDescription/space:
The 2 floors including 3 plus 2 bedroom plus 2 den apartments boasts over 4,000 square feet of living area. It features private keycard-activated elevator that will take you directly to your private apartments.

Guests have access to their own private units and the Roof-Top.
With 2 large living rooms for gathering, the unit accommodates 12 in comfort with en-suite bathroom for each bedrooms. The master bedroom has a large walk-in closets where you can enjoy dressing in comfort with own in-room air-conditioning. The 2 dens allows for additional sleeping for 4.

For your convenience, the apartment is equipped with a full kitchen and an in-unit washing machine. Two parking stalls are also available for your use.
sectionedDescription/summary:
My home is a safe environment as we make sanitation and cleanliness our number 1 priority. The entire unit is professionally cleaned after each guests check-out.
- RIWA is a secluded, stand alone building, located in a quiet residential area. You do not need to share public spaces or elevators with neighbors, to social distance.
- Wish to enjoy Bangkok vibrant life? RIWA is in the middle of all the best restaurants, night life, and sightseeing spots.
- We have an in-house resident caretaker.
sectionedDescription/transit:
A few BTS stations away, you will be in Mall heaven.
- EmDistrict, Siam Paragon, MBK, Terminal 21, Central Embassy are within reach.
- For local shopping experience, hit Platinum Mall and Pratunam District, where bargains abound.
- Looking for anything and everything? Hit JJ Market on the weekends.
- RIWA Thonglor is also located near several world-renowned hospitals, popular for medi-tourism. Bangkok is well known for world class medical treatment, at an affordable price, where people from all over come for annual health check up, or advance medical treatments.

This City of Angels is known for her ornate shrines and vibrant street life.
- A ride along the Chao Phraya River will take you to its network of canals, flowing past the Rattanakosin Royal District, the Grand Palace and the sacred Emerald Buddha.
- Nearby, Wat Pho houses the world renowned reclining Buddha (also the birth place of traditional Thai Massage and Medicine School, a practice that dates back 2500 years ago ); - and on the opposite shore, the Khmer-style spire, Wat Arun. All this, at only a Grab ride away.

name: Chic loft
address: Khet Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 4PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Escape to a peaceful retreat in vibrant Thonglor. Our loft-style townhouse is an artistic space showcasing poetry, painting, photography, comics, and architecture. Enjoy a state-of-the-art kitchen, spacious bedrooms with wardrobes, dual rain showers, PM2.5 inverter ACs, and a 75" TV. Stay connected with high-speed internet and Wi-Fi, and set the mood with dual lighting.

The house features a large living area on the first floor, 2 bedrooms (each with king size bed) on the second floor, and a master bedroom on the third floor. The master bedroom has one king size bed and a sofa that can cover into a queen size bed (160cm wide). Let me know if you wish to use the sofa as a bed and I will prepare it for your arrival.

The best and fastest way to contact me is through the Airbnb app

Thong Lor has emerged as one of the most vibrant and popular neighborhoods in Bangkok over the past few years. It is known for its exceptional selection of upscale and trendy restaurants, as well as its stylish cafes and bars that are perfect for a night out.  In addition to the exciting dining and nightlife scene, Thong Lor also offers a picturesque canal that has been home to locals for generations. Take a leisurely stroll along the canal and immerse yourself in the charming local atmosphere.

The house is located at:
- 2.5km from the BTS Sky train
- 150m from the boat station (goes straight to central world/ Siam)
- 1.5km from Emquartier Mall
- 500m from Camilian hospital
- Major touristic attractions such as Wat Arun are on the other side of town.

- Moto taxi,  Grab and Bolt app are the best way to move around. I can arrange motorbike rental or a driver with car or van upon request.
- For large groups (6 people), I recommend to use Muvmi app. It's a popular service of EV Tuktuk in the neighborhood. The vehicles are brand new and can accommodate 6 people.

Example Comment from guests stay here

           Edward: what a great location and a place to stay in Bangkok. It is located right by the BTS and supermarket and other shops are within walking distance. Place is very clean and spacious. No doubt that I’m coming back.

           Domen: Had a great stay at Max's place. Luxury duplex with a nice view, close to the BTS, along with warm hospitality and good amenities. Would stay again!

           Souksangkhom:   Mr. Max is a good person, caring host and very prompt in communicating at any given time. The place has good security, 24hr guards, entrance key card, good space, perfect for long stay in bangkok provided with all the amenities. For 2 floor penthouse concept in bangkok is great value for money and location is just a few minutes walk to BTS. Book now!


          Fyora : I am quite particular on cleanliness but not fussy on anything else. This place is totally clean, the provided items like cups were wrapped with a plastic with "sanitised for your safety" written. The bed was very comfy, location is extremely close to the BTS. It's -almost- at the "doorstep", just the second building in the BTS nearest side lane only! There were stalls around the morning and evening so we could always snack if hungry. Check in process was painless. In fact because our flight was so early, we requested for early check in if it is available. So happen it was, and we got in about an hour early. Jacuzzi is fun to use. Small but enough to sit and stretch out our legs (We are Asian). The only one bad thing is there is always a smell hanging around the unit whenever we came back. But it's easily solved by turning the air-conditioning back on and our own fragrances that we brought. Everything else is great.

                 Austin: Was a great stay. He was communicative and checked in periodically on how things were. Place was nice and in a good location with lots around.

                 Supawadee: Great experience! Host was very helpful in expediting a smooth check in and check out. Loved the jacuzzi in the bathroom too! Will definitely be back.

                John: Super host and excellent place!!! 

                 Pueng Nongnapat: The owner is very helpful and responsive. The room is as shown in the photos.

                Joel: Great location, spartan but has everything you need. Everything else (like street food) just head out the front door.

                Ariel B: Nice an clean space the location near BTS

address: Khet Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
The Alberti is a brand-new boutique designer building offering luxury interiors and furnishing.

Located in downtown Sukhumvit on 31 at the heart of Bangkok's foodie and shopping district, 600 metres from EmQuartier & Emporium Shopping Mall and surrounded by some of the coolest restaurants and bars within walking distance!

This 2-bedroom suite is 85 sqm and has 2 separate bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a living area, as well as a kitchenette.

Ultra-comfortable beds, and the finest 600 thread count linens, we aim to offer you a 5-star stay!

Both bathrooms feature a rain shower with the master bedroom having an en-suite with a freestanding bath.

Full access to the lobby, suite and rooftop pool and lounge.

We provide Towels, robes and slippers as well as listed below.

Amenities in the suite:
- Aircon
- Smart TV's in the living room and master bedroom
- Wifi
- Fridge
- Microwave
- Espresso Machine
- Kettle
- Shampoo, gels and other bath amenities.
and more!

BTS: Phrom Phong

name: Modern Villa, Private Pool! Spacious & Luxurious
address: mueang samutprakarn, Chang Wat Samut Prakan, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 4PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Could this be the vacation home of your dreams? An impressive luxury villa nestled in a quiet high-end suburb of Bangkok. Modern style & premium furnishings in spacious, light & airy rooms. A family-oriented home that's the perfect blend of high-level luxe & welcoming vibes!

My home is filled with love, light, and welcoming vibes; it's a cozy family-friendly space in which your whole crew can relax together. Contemporary elegance, soothing color schemes, and premium finishes characterize the entire house. I hope you'll agree I've gone the extra mile to ensure you have the most amazing vacation experience!

Highlights: 4 bedrooms, vast indoor kitchen, outdoor Chinese kitchen, quaint Chinese tea room & sensational swimming pool within sunny gardens. Book your stay to make your vacation dreams a reality!

Inside, you'll find sparkling clean, spacious, light-filled rooms - all fully-furnished and decorated to a high standard. Outside, you'll be whisked away to paradise, with a wow-factor swimming pool set within beautifully-maintained gardens. Sound like your kind of place? Get in touch to discuss your booking!

The Living Room:
- Comfortable seating makes this a great spot to unwind after your day's adventures
- Adjacent is a Chinese-style tea room - a fun place to hang out with the family!

The Kitchen:
- Features an indoor Western-style kitchen plus an outdoor Chinese-style kitchen
- A vast, impressive space, fully-equipped for all your catering needs and beyond!
- Long central island for food prep, serving, and casual dining
- Appliances include an oven, fridge, induction stove, and more

The Dining Area:
- Round glass-topped table with room to seat your whole group 
- Comfortable chill-out zone adjacent where you can sip your after-dinner coffee
- Around the corner, the double-height ceiling with contemporary chandelier is so striking!

The Bedrooms:
- Four in total, each with two plush, comfortable beds 
- One bedroom has a wide sofa bed; one has a grand 4-poster bed
- All have high-quality beds and furniture, and lots of storage space

The Bathroom:
- Features a large luxury walk-in shower with rain showerhead
- Crisp, modern décor, with beautiful tiles and a marble floor

The Outside Space:
- Quiet, private, and gets lots of sunlight!
- Vast manicured garden planted with trees and shrubs
- Large luxury swimming pool with a modern design
- Table and chairs/benches for family time or outdoor dining

Guest access

There are 3 house within this villa, guest have access to the entire middle house (as shown in picture), swimming pool and garden.

Other things to note

•	Please treat my home with care - keep it clean and tidy
•	Please respect the neighbors and the surrounding area
•	Please keep noise levels to a minimum to avoid creating a disturbance

You will be staying in a high-end but family-friendly suburban neighborhood. The area is quiet and safe with excellent local security. You will be away from the bustle of the city center so you can relax and breathe in clean, fresh air!

The property is a 30-minute drive away from Suvarnabhumi Airport. Uber is available and is low-cost, you can easily take an Uber to the nearby train station.

It is 9km away from BTS Samrong. 6km away from Erawan Musuem. 8km from Samutprakarn Crocodile Farm and Zoo. 13km from Mega Bangna Shopping mall and IKEA. 13km from CentralPlaza shopping mall. 9km away from Makro grocery store.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
- Smoking are prohibited indoor
- events are only allowed through prior request 
- outdoor shoes are prohibited indoor
- We might be able to accept earlier check in, please message us for confirmation

name: Roof-top Pool Luxury Residence in trendy Thonglor
address: แขวง คลองตันเหนือ เขตวัฒนา  10110, กรุงเทพมหานคร, Thailand
city: แขวง คลองตันเหนือ เขตวัฒนา  10110
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 4PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
My home is a safe environment as we make sanitation and cleanliness our number 1 priority. The entire unit is professionally cleaned after each guests check-out.  
- RIWA is a secluded, stand alone building, located in a quiet residential area. You do not need to share public spaces or elevators with neighbors, to social distance. 
- Wish to enjoy Bangkok vibrant life? RIWA is in the middle of all the best restaurants, night life, and sightseeing spots. 
- We have an in-house resident caretaker.

The two bedroom plus den apartment offers a great living area. It features private keycard-activated elevator that will take you directly to your private apartment.

Guests have access to their own private unit and the Roof-Top.
With a large living room for gathering, the unit accommodates 4 in comfort with en-suite bathroom for each bedrooms. The 2 master bedrooms have a large walk-in closets where you can enjoy dressing in comfort with own in-room air-conditioning. The den allows for additional sleeping for 2.

For your convenience, the apartment is equipped with a full kitchen and an in-unit washing machine. Two parking stalls are also available for your use.

You will have full access of:
- 1st Floor: Entrance and parking
- 4th Floor: Apartment with 3 bedrooms, living-room and kitchen (another bedroom is locked for owner private belongings storage)
- 5th Floor: Roof-Top with Pool
You will have access to 4th and 5th floors by private lift

My Co-Host Berry, a well-travelled Bangkokian, will be able to assit you during your stay at RIWA.
Please contact Berry for anything related to your stay and any questions you may have in mind.
Our house caretaker Khun Yut - who stays in a detached studio at the ground floor of the property - is here to ensure your safety during your stay as well as looking after the common areas of the home.

Fantastic restaurants, bars, and nightlife make Thonglor the hippest street in all of Bangkok.

You are right in the middle of all that is happening. I have not visited them all, as the list is exhaustive.

All located near Thonglor, some of my favorites are Pattara, Kanittha, and Madame Shawn for Thai cuisine, Kenji’s Lab for Japanese, Surface Kitchen for French, Viva 21 and Bacco for Italian, and the Lost Burro for Mexican fare. For drinks with friends, the Rabbit Hole and Tuba. For clubbing, go to Grease. To hang out, check out theCommons, Seen Space, and several rooftop bars on Thonglor.

Of course, real Thai street food is located right in front of the lane, so you can eat like the locals for cheap.

Also do not hesitate to get a foot massage at any boutique that lines Thonglor for that needed foot and shoulder rub. For the discerning, a good day spa is within reach for pure relaxation and Thai aroma therapy - an experience that cannot be missed while in Thailand!

A few BTS stations away, you will be in Mall heaven.
- EmDistrict, Siam Paragon, MBK, Terminal 21, Central Embassy are within reach.
- For local shopping experience, hit Platinum Mall and Pratunam District, where bargains abound.
- Looking for anything and everything? Hit JJ Market on the weekends.
- RIWA Thonglor is also located near several world-renowned hospitals, popular for medi-tourism. Bangkok is well known for world class medical treatment, at an affordable price, where people from all over come for annual health check up, or advance medical treatments.

This City of Angels is known for her ornate shrines and vibrant street life.
- A ride along the Chao Phraya River will take you to its network of canals, flowing past the Rattanakosin Royal District, the Grand Palace and the sacred Emerald Buddha.
- Nearby, Wat Pho houses the world renowned reclining Buddha (also the birth place of traditional Thai Massage and Medicine School, a practice that dates back 2500 years ago ); - and on the opposite shore, the Khmer-style spire, Wat Arun. All this, at only a Grab ride away.

RIWA Thonglor is situated on a private, residential lane.

Once home, you leave behind the city noise. Enjoy quiet times at the pool or gaze at the stars on the rooftop deck. Open up the kitchen and make your own favorite meal or experiment with an exotic Thai dish.

Makro Express, Tops Supermarket, Foodland, as with your corner 7-11 store are nearby, to pick up all that you may need to cook up a storm.

And if your are tired from the day’s events, never fear... simply relax with your favourite evening drinks on the rooftop of RIWA!
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
FIRE SAFETY
-	In case of fire, DO NOT use the elevator; take the stairs to the GROUND Floor.

ACCESS / SECURITY
-	Keep your 3 sets of key and keycard secure at all times. Report lost cards immediately. Any loss will be charged 1,000 Baht / set.
-	In order to avoid cluster and house party with the pending re-opening of travels to Thailand, you shall notify my Co-Host in advance if you wish to bring in unregistered guests.  
-	Guests are responsible and liable for any  misconduct and loss or damages caused by anyone associated with them during their stay at RIWA.
-	When not home, ensure all doors are locked. 

FORBIDDEN ACTIVITIES
During your stay at RIWA, It is NOT allowed to:
-	move, re-arrange or re-locate any furniture such as sofa, dining table and beds as this may result in injury and liable property damages. Please contact Berry for any special requests
-	stock any items in the public areas of the property
-	lead any kind of activity that creates a regular human traffic in and out of property
-	use the property as logistic hub

ELECTRICITY - Help us conserve energy!
-	Air conditioner and lights shall be switched off anytime the apartment in not occupied. 
-	Please turn off Living/Dining Room Air Conditioner when retiring to bedrooms.

SWIMMING POOL AND ROOFTOP (Access via Key Card ONLY)
-	No children should be left without adult supervision AT ALL TIMES 
-	NO breakables - glasses, cups, plates - are allowed on the rooftop; plastic cups for pool use can be found in the kitchen cabinet
-	No open fires or barbecue is permitted
-	Turn off lights when you leave the rooftop to not disturb neighbours
-	Refrain from loud music or excessive noise, out of respect for our other guests and neighbours

SMOKING
-	Smoking is permitted only on the rooftop, and the ground floor  
-	In consideration of other guests, kindly use ashtrays 

LAUNDRY & CLEANING
-	Do not hang any items on the front balcony;  use the drying rack provided in the laundry room.

GARBAGE
-	Dispose garbage daily in the ‘Garbage Room’ next to the front gate
-	The property is pest-free. Please help keep it that way!
-	Do not leave food and dirty dishes unattended, as they are prone to attract unwanted pests. 
-	Use with extreme caution when using the sink garbage disposal
-	Dispose of hard waste such as bones, plastic or wood in the garbage can.  Do not throw in disposal as it will severely damage the motor

name: BTS Wongwianyai, Rooftop  Pool, Wifi
address: Bangkok, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Fully furnished and silence apartment with extremely well connected with the center of town by 2 minutes walk to BTS Sky Train and a few stops on the BTS away from Bangkok’s central business districts of Silom and Sathorn. You will pass convenient stores at the entrance and surounding with the best street food.
The 2 stops BTS Skytrain to Bangkok's biggest public water transportation which you can go  to China Town, Temple of Dawn, The Emeral Buddha Temple, Patravadi Theatre and Khao San Road.

A warm welcome with complementary drinking water tea and coffee.
You can watch  TVs with cable tv  in living room and bed room.
Bluetooth speaker is provided for music lover you can play from your device.
Washing Machine with dryer was install in the room.
Toaster, kettle, pot, pan and electric stove are provided.
Towels were provided in the wardrobe.

1. Via BTS to Wong wian yai station at use exit no.3. Then turn left along the bridge to the elevator.
2. Via Taxi to Krung Thonburi Soi 1 or take the taxi to Wongwian Yai BTS station.

Walk into Krung Thonburi Soi 1 about 200 meters and turn left when you see  Viva Condo sign on your left before Tops Supermarket.

While Wongwian Yai’s low-key residential properties give it a warm, less-hectic atmosphere, the area’s extremely well connected with the center of town, too. You can live the ultimate slow life across the river knowing you’re only a few stops on the BTS away from Bangkok’s central business districts of Silom and Sathorn.

Only 2 stops of BTS Skytrain joins hands with Bangkok's biggest public water transportation provider, Special boat service to travel unlimited trips along the Chao Phraya River for tourism. Comfortable with a large and secure boat. Tour guide on board to recommend tourist attraction throughout the trip, for example, China Town, Wat Pho, Wat Arun (Temple of Dawn), The Grand Palace, The Emeral Buddha Temple, Patravadi Theatre, Khao San Road.

Nothing like returning home from a long day’s work to a delicious street meal. And Wongwian Yai is home to some of the best street food stalls in the business. The legendary Somsak Pu Ob serves freshly made shrimp and crab ob woon sen (glass noodles) that draws customers from all over town, while the classic shop-house restaurant Guay Teaw Ped Tun does excellent duck noodles. Those with a sweet tooth can round off their meal with a refreshing bowl of tabtim krob with water chestnuts and sweetened coconut topped with shaved ice at Tabtim Krob Wongwian Yai.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
This listing welcome only number of guest that booking from Airbnb.
No more guest allowed after booking.
Do not break the law in this area.
Please clear the trash before check out and keep clean.

name: Dream Villa, Private Pool! Spacious & Luxurious
address: mueang samutprakarn, Chang Wat Samut Prakan, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 4PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Could this be the vacation home of your dreams? An impressive luxury villa nestled in a quiet high-end suburb of Bangkok. Modern style & premium furnishings in spacious, light & airy rooms. A family-oriented home that's the perfect blend of high-level luxe & welcoming vibes! 

Highlights: 4 bedrooms (2 beds each), vast indoor kitchen, outdoor Chinese kitchen, quaint Chinese tea room & sensational swimming pool within sunny gardens. 
Book your stay to make your vacation dreams a reality!

My home is filled with love, light, and welcoming vibes; it's a cozy family-friendly space in which your whole crew can relax together. Contemporary elegance, soothing color schemes, and premium finishes characterize the entire house. I hope you'll agree I've gone the extra mile to ensure you have the most amazing vacation experience! 

Inside, you'll find sparkling clean, spacious, light-filled rooms - all fully-furnished and decorated to a high standard. Outside, you'll be whisked away to paradise, with a wow-factor swimming pool set within beautifully-maintained gardens. Sound like your kind of place? Get in touch to discuss your booking!

The Living Room:
- Comfortable seating makes this a great spot to unwind after your day's adventures
- Adjacent is a Chinese-style tea room - a fun place to hang out with the family!

The Kitchen:
- Features an indoor Western-style kitchen plus an outdoor Chinese-style kitchen
- A vast, impressive space, fully-equipped for all your catering needs and beyond!
- Long central island for food prep, serving, and casual dining
- Appliances include an oven, fridge, induction stove, and more

The Dining Area:
- Round glass-topped table with room to seat your whole group 
- Comfortable chill-out zone adjacent where you can sip your after-dinner coffee
- Around the corner, the double-height ceiling with contemporary chandelier is so striking!

The Bedrooms:
- Four in total, each with two plush, comfortable beds 
- One bedroom has a wide sofa bed; one has a grand 4-poster bed
- All have high-quality beds and furniture, and lots of storage space 

The Bathroom:
- Features a large luxury walk-in shower with rain showerhead
- Crisp, modern décor, with beautiful tiles and a marble floor

The Outside Space:
- Quiet, private, and gets lots of sunlight!
- Vast manicured garden planted with trees and shrubs
- Large luxury swimming pool with a modern design
- Table and chairs/benches for family time or outdoor dining

There are 3 house within this villa, guest have access to the entire middle house (as shown in picture), swimming pool and garden.

I want you to enjoy every minute of your time here! You can contact me via Airbnb message prior to your stay. On the day of your arrival, please contact me via phone or text.

You will be staying in a high-end but family-friendly suburban neighborhood. The area is quiet and safe with excellent local security. You will be away from the bustle of the city center so you can relax and breathe in clean, fresh air!

The property is a 30-minute drive away from the airport. Uber is available and is low-cost, you can easily take an Uber to the nearby train station.

It is 9km away from BTS Samrong. 6km away from Erawan Musuem.  8km from Samutprakarn Crocodile Farm and Zoo. 13km from Mega Bangna Shopping mall and IKEA. 13km from CentralPlaza shopping mall. 9km away from Makro grocery store.

•	Please treat my home with care - keep it clean and tidy
•	Please respect the neighbors and the surrounding area
•	Please keep noise levels to a minimum to avoid creating a disturbance
