name: 曼谷中心Asok&Thong Lor800平米海天别墅summer villa 189/7
address: Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
曼谷市中心的泳池别墅，是您在这座令人陶醉的城市留下美好回忆的理想之选。这个宽敞的民宿拥有六个卧室，让您与亲朋好友一同入住，享受温馨的时光。

别墅内设有一个引人入胜的游戏室，让您在休闲时光中尽情娱乐。但更让人难以抗拒的是它巨大的泳池，绝对是放松和消遣的绝佳去处。您可以在水中畅游，或是在泳池边的躺椅上晒太阳，尽情享受泰国温暖的阳光。

这个别墅的豪华装修令人惊叹。宽敞的客厅和现代化的厨房让您有宾至如归的感觉，而六个卧室提供了足够的隐私和舒适。您可以在别墅内自行准备美味的食物，或者选择享用曼谷的丰富美食，因为地理位置极为优越，附近有各种餐馆和购物中心。

这座泳池别墅位于曼谷市中心，交通便捷，附近有众多的旅游景点和娱乐场所。无论您是想探索城市的文化遗产，还是寻找购物和夜生活的乐趣，这里都能满足您的需求。

选择我们的泳池别墅，将为您带来曼谷最美好的回忆。无论是家庭度假、朋友聚会还是浪漫之旅，这里都将成为您留连忘返的度假胜地。欢迎您来体验这片天堂，创造珍贵的回忆。

这栋房子拥有漂亮的泳池和大厅，六套房间带全功能的卫生间，一间游戏室，一个中式厨房一个西式厨房，现代的设计风格会让你拥有轻松愉悦的假期

这里就是您的家

这栋别墅拥有全职保姆以及安保

曼谷最繁华的位置，在这里可以轻松找到一切

特别注意：
        别墅的入住时间为14:00退房时间为11:00，我们可以帮您寄存行李，请严格按照规定时间退房保证其他用户顺利入住。
        入住期间需要缴纳10000泰铢的押金，这包括物品保证金以及电费押金，我们已经在房价中扣除了包含电费的费用，以适应1人到16人的不同用电需求，电费根据国家电表计数为准，每个单位费用为9泰铢。
        别墅可以入住16人，超过16人，每人加1000泰铢加床费。
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
入住须知
很高兴您可以入住我们的别墅，以下信息请详细阅读，希望可以在入住期间帮到您
1.入户门密码：111111#
2.Wi-Fi 名字：“house189/7”
密码：house1897
3.我们为您提供了洗发水及沐浴露，但牙膏和牙刷个人物品需自己准备
4.希望您可以节约用电，离开时请关好用电设备
5.大门遥控器在您抵达时，我们会安排保姆交给您，离开时请归还。
6.我们的泳池系统非常健康。水深1.4-2.0米，请注意安全，预防溺水，尤其是有儿童在场时。
7.吸烟的游客请移步室外，室内禁止吸烟
8.我们的保洁员每天上午九点会为您打扫一楼的客厅区域，请保管好您的贵重物品。如需打扫卧室请提前告知。
9.入住期间请勿在房间内进行违法活动，不要影响周围邻居的生活。如需进行party或其他活动，请提前告知我们。
10.购买外卖及出行，我们建议使用Grab。使用软件时请将“189/7 soi Prachan Khadi, Sukhumvit 39,Sukhumvit road, Khlongton nue, Watthana, Bangkok, 10110”地址粘贴在Grab地址栏即可。
11.保姆的工作时间为9:00—21:00，如遇特殊情况需要保姆服务，请酌情给予小费。
12.别墅门外200米有7-11便利店，别墅地处重要商业街区，这里可以找到您想要的一切。
13.冰箱里准备了一箱矿泉水，是免费提供给您的。
14.我们的入住时间为预定日期的14:00退房时间为退订日期的11:00，请严格按照时间来计划行程，不要影响您之后的客人入住。
15.在泰游玩期间遇任何问题都可以联系我，我会尽全力帮助您。

特别提示：由于入住人数的不同，会产生不同的用电量，为公平起见，入住期间需要您缴纳10000泰铢的押金，押金包括房间设施保证金及电费押金，在您入住时按照国家电表计费，每度电费为9泰铢。

marvelous experiences only get better. Your comfortable and exclusive place, walled around and hidden from view, also possesses its own private pool for a nice morning dip or lovely evening cocktails, or a bottle of fine wine from the villa’s private stock.

Savor the convenience of a hotel, paired with all of the space, ambience, and privacy of home living at siam Allison pool villa in Bangkok, Sukhumvit Thonglor. completely high class furnished, luxury serviced apartment is outfitted with a fully equipped kitchen, storage, and 24-hour security. Indulge in delicious dining and endless recreation within the five-star property, which beckons you to explore the best Bangkok has to offer. Located in the upscale residential neighborhood of Thonglor, your new apartment is easily accessible from the BTS Skytrain and all major highways — ensuring all roads lead home, no matter where you find yourself.offering the perfect place to unwind after a full day of business or exploration. Here, new discoveries are limitless, and opportunities to recharge abound at every turn.

ushering you into the total exclusiveness of the world you want, from the moment you approach the door. name: The Glam Loft in Thonglor, a creative escape
address: Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 4PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
The Glam loft is a unique and stylish concept in Bangkok Thonglor, original, bold, and daring, yet cozy and luxurious. 

The house is a blend of Thai and Western influences, inspired by classic movies and TV shows as well as local painters and sculptors. From the moment you walk in, you'll be transported to a world of art and design.

The Glam loft is perfect for couples, families, or groups of friends looking for a unique and memorable place to stay in Bangkok.

The first floor features an open living area with a fully equipped kitchen, dining area, TV/sofa area, and laundry area. Step outside onto the spacious outdoor deck to enjoy the fresh air and relax in the sun.

The second floor features two bedrooms with unique design and color themes, each with a private balcony and king-size bed. A shared bathroom is conveniently located between the two bedrooms.

The third floor is a fully open space with a canopy bed, walk-in closet, ensuite bathroom with bathtub, and private balcony.

Guests have the option to switch to two twin beds in one of the bedrooms.

It's located in  Thonglor, one of Bangkok's most vibrant and trendy neighborhoods, with easy access to restaurants, bars, shops, and nightlife.

Parking

Guests can park their vehicles inside or outside the house.

Transportation

The BTS and MRT stations are not within walking distance (2.5km). It is recommended to take a taxi (Grab), EV Tuk Tuk, or boat (to avoid traffic).

EV Bike and Scooter

I provide one EV bike and one scooter for guests to use.

With a focus on natural materials like leather, wood, steel, and raw bricks, the space is packed with high-end appliances, a comfortable bed, a state-of-the-art kitchen, a solid stone bathtub, a large rain shower, a 75-inch TV (including Netflix, Prime, Disney, and HBO), a gaming console, an EV bike, a scooter, and much more.

name: 88 Grand resort pool villa in centre of Bangkok
address: Watthana, Bangkok, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
The Private pool villa  in center of BANGKOK ! 
At the Center of Modern Conveniences & Entertainment is now come true for your vacation. 

Dipping into your deliciously cool plunge pool. Spend evenings under the stars soaking in your over-sized tub on the deck outside.

Luxury flows from inside to out at our pool villas in Bangkok city center, with both master bedroom and en-suite bathroom doors sliding open onto your outdoor haven.

Resort-style Bali atmosphere and the beauty of Siam Thailand luxury resorts all gathered into a combination of one masterpiece villa in the location of the Bangkok city's most famous central business districts where no existing of a private single house is left. Great inclusive in your book now including five staff, and stunning features also upscale qualities. The only most luxury was amazing in the Luxury retreat in Bangkok relaxation in superior style.
The villa’s two glorious infinity pools on different levels are incredible, as are the super-king beds in two of the rooms, with all rooms promising gorgeous sea, pool or garden views. One room is housed in an ultra-modern, Tropical modern.
The bathrooms have star quality with wonderfully rounded freestanding tubs and avant-garde design elements adding the ‘wow’ factor. An over-the-pool deck, and wooden nest seats give the outdoor space a trendy feel, highlighting the incredible design of Siam allison.
In the evening, spectacular architecture of the villa’s atrium living room lights up with magical starlight chandeliers, while the bedrooms relax with a natural, Scandinavian look. Splashes of modern, artistic design add funky, interesting energy.
The villa boasts a cinema, TV room, and lounge, as well as a full kitchen. Dining is divine with a breakfast bar, kitchen dining area, and grand atrium dining too, with alfresco meals savored in the poolside sala(extra charge)
Relaxation is inspired along with engaging activities at Quintz's. 
we promises luxury that goes beyond and delivers a truly exceptional villa vacation experience.

HIGH GRADE KITCHEN

modern modern European-style kitchen is sleek, with ceramic stoves & extractors, electric ovens, microwaves, refrigerators-freezers and washing machines.

LUXURY ROOM

Each bathroom has luxurious crystal marble floors, tables and mosaic tiles which are all individually coordinated and accompanied by the best selection of materials and furniture to give guests a warm welcome feeling.



STANDARD FACILITIES

- Shampoo,
- Shower gel 
- Toothpaste
- Toothbrush
- Bathrobe
- Towels
- Hair dryer
- Stereo
- Smart TV
- Hangers
- Iron
- Washing machine
- Full kitchen

- Maid service 8 hrs from 8.00 A.M. - 5.30 P.M.
- Free Van service pick up from / to Airport (Maximum 7 person).
-  In house massage (Additional charge) : 1,100 THB per 2 hours
- BBQ party
- Enjoy swimming pool

FEATURES & AMENITIES
* Fully equipped kitchen
* Formal dining area with seating for 12
* Espresso machine
* Dishwasher
* Ice maker
* Satellite television
* Smart TV
* Massage tables
* Office space
* Iron/Ironing board
* Washer/Dryer
* Air conditioning
* Wi-Fi

Stay at the Modern Ease & Entertainment in the heart of Bangkok

With a warm and welcoming culture, so often expressed by the ubiquitous Thai smile — after all, Thailand is known as “The Land of Smiles” — a tantalizing cuisine that seems to be enjoyed all around the world, and a wealth of sights that captivate the eyes and amaze the imagination, people love Thailand. And it is easy to see why people come to Thailand for a vacation,booking a few nights in Bangkok,choosing Siam allison. will change your life

When taking a vacation to what is widely known as the most tranquil spot in Thailand, if not Southeast Asia and the whole wide world, it is necessary to make sure you have booked yourself into the ultimate in luxury, as well as into a hotel designed with beauty and taste. A 5-star private luxury pool villa in the city center should have all of this to please you and bringing it all together creates an unparalleled experience that you will remember with great pleasure forever.

A new 5-star way in Bangkok that fully satisfies every requirement of luxury

BY CAR
5 Minute to DONKI DONKI shopping mall

15 Minute to BTS Thonglor 
20 Minute to Shopping mall ( Emquartier and Emporium) 
30 minute to Siam Paragon and Central world

sectionedDescription/description:
Arpo Pool Villa Riverside is a colonial-style 3 Bedroom pool villa situated along one of the klongs (waterways) on the Thon Buri side of the Chao Praya River; With a nice ambience of old canal and local neighbourhood. You can see some longtail boat past by. Located at Soi Phet Kasem 20. Easy reach of the Bang Phai MRT subway station (100 metre) . Surrounded by many attraction places such as The Artist's House, Wat Paknam Phasi Charoen (Big Buddha Statue), Khlong Bang luang floating market.

contact via Airbnb or contact host directly

sectionedDescription/neighborhoodOvervie: Arpo Pool Villa Riverside is a colonial-style 3 Bedroom pool villa situated along one of the klongs (waterways) on the Thon Buri side of the Chao Praya River; With a nice ambience of old canal and local neighbourhood. You can see some longtail boat past by. Located at Soi Phet Kasem 20. Easy reach of the Bang Phai MRT subway station (100 metre) . Surrounded by many attraction places such as The Artist's House, Wat Paknam Phasi Charoen (Big Buddha Statue), Khlong Bang luang floating market.
sectionedDescription/summary: Arpo Pool Villa Riverside is a colonial-style 3 Bedroom pool villa situated along one of the klongs (waterways) on the Thon Buri side of the Chao Praya River; With a nice ambience of old canal and local neighbourhood. You can see some longtail boat past by. Located at Soi Phet Kasem 20. Easy reach of the Bang Phai MRT subway station (100 metre) . Surrounded by many attraction places such as The Artist's House, Wat Paknam Phasi Charoen (Big Buddha Statue), Khlong Bang luang floating market.
sectionedDescription/transit:
Car park within Villa : 6 cars

Get off at MRT (subway) Bangphai Station. Arpo just right away from MRT Bangphai 100 metre.

guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is 3PM - 9PM

Brand new building with great facilities including a swimming pool, sauna and lounge, the place is close to public transport, shopping center. 
20 meter walk to BTS Victory monument
In the central of everything.
3 BTS station from Siam paragon.

Close to Airport rail link
Close to Van hub to other party of Thailand.

There are access to gym, Swimming pool, and rooftop area for party.

name: Modern&Luxury apartment,5min to MRT,freeWifi
address: Khet Huai Khwang, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Our large and comfortable 2 bedroom apartment(68SQM/700SQF)
has a true resort feel right in the heart of Bangkok.This unit is considered huge by Thailand apartment's (URL HIDDEN) comfortably fits 7 and you are able to enjoy the facilities in the condo.There is a shopping mall right bellow the apartment and you are able to walk to a big shopping(Central Rama 9) and the MRT in about 5m.There is free shuttle van provided too!

The space

Luxurious new & modern apartment located in the heart of Bangkok.A perfect place to kick back and relax after a long day exploring Bangkok City! 
Close to public transport and all main sights.Belle Condo is a luxury serviced residences located close (EMAIL HIDDEN) has 2 bedrooms a large open kitchen,dining,living room area and a terrace that overlooks the amazing city skyline!!.You will have access to a resort style pool area and a fully equipped gym and playground.

The unit is equipped with a washing machine,dryer,microwave,stove and a fridge.

The bedrooms are spacious and comfortable.The master room has a king size bed and the second room has 1 queen bed .We will also provide additional 3 comfortable single foldable beds,bedsheets and blanket.



Interaction with guests
Feel free to contact me,if you required any help or recommendations during your stay as i work and live nearby:

My preferred form of communication channels:
-Airbnb
-Mobile phone
-Line
-(website hidden)

Getting to my apartment

From Suvarnabhumi airport,there are 2 ways-
-By taxi it will take around 35-45m with a cost of around 350-450tbh

-By Airport Rail Link take to Makassan Station alight and then walk about 2m to Petchaburi MRT (email hidden)from there head to Phra Ram 9 Station which is 1 station away. From there it is just a 5m walk from the MRT to the condo.

From Don Mueng Airport,there is 2 ways-
-By Taxi it will take around 30-40m with a cost of 180-250tbh

-Another cheaper alternative is to take the Bus (B1) to Chatuchak MRT and then head to Phra ram 9.

Guest will be able to access to two lovely pools,gym,playground

Do note that we will only be providing 4 towels
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
- Do not smoke in the house. Can smoke at the balcony but do not throw the cigarette outside.
- Do not be noisy 
- Do not have party or event

name: Designer Pool Villa near Emquartier
address: Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 4PM and check out by 10AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Experience the epitome of Scandinavian style in our 5-bedroom, 5-bathroom City Center Pool Villa.

Bathed in natural light, this tranquil oasis offers sleek design, a private pool, and lush surroundings. With modern amenities and a central location, immerse yourself in the vibrant city while enjoying the serenity of this luxurious retreat.

Perfect for families or groups seeking an unforgettable Scandinavian-inspired getaway. Book now for an exceptional experience!

As you enter the villa, you will immediately notice the contemporary design and the clever use of space. The open-plan living room with high ceilings is bright and airy, with large windows that allow plenty of natural light to flood the room. The living room leads directly to the pool area, where you can relax and enjoy the tropical climate.

The villa has a fully equipped modern kitchen, complete with high-end appliances, sleek cabinetry, and ample counter space. The dining area is adjacent to the kitchen, making it easy to entertain guests while cooking.

The five spacious bedrooms are designed to offer maximum comfort and relaxation. 4 bedrooms has its own en-suite bathroom, complete with a rain shower, modern fixtures, and luxurious finishes. The bedrooms are elegantly furnished, with plush beds, soft linens, and plenty of storage space.

The outdoor area is designed to offer the ultimate in luxury and relaxation. The private pool is the perfect place to cool off on a hot day, while the poolside lounge chairs provide a comfortable spot to soak up the sun. The villa also has a covered terrace, complete with outdoor seating and a BBQ area, making it the perfect spot for al fresco dining and entertaining.

Overall, your 5 bedroom 4.5 bathroom luxury pool villa in Scandinavian style is a stunning example of modern architecture and design, offering the perfect combination of luxury, comfort, and style.

Less than 10 minutes to Phrom Phong/ Thong Lor BTS.

Nearby:
-Emquartier, Emporium
-The Commons/ Beer Belly
-DONKI Mall Thonglor
-Samitivej Sukhumvit Hospital
-J Avenue Thonglor

Three queen mattresses can be provided to accommodate up to 16 guests upon request.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
• No Smoking of ANY KIND in the unit. (Only permitted outside the house)
• No parties, events, birthdays, bachelor or bachelorette stays
• Nothing illegal
• Do not clog the toilet bowls by throwing prohitbed waste into them (chargeable)
• No Extra/ Overnight Guests
(Have more guests than stated in your reservation or if the number doesn't match we reserve the right to cancel your reservation)
• No Mail Delivered here (unless personally arranged with me ahead of time)
• No Moving / Rearranging of the furniture
(unless otherwise specified)
• No unplugging of the electronics like TVs, cable boxes, lamps, Roku sticks, etc

name: Lory home 曼谷顶级豪华花园别墅（免费接机，三晚以上赠送包车服务)
address: Tambon Bang Yo, Chang Wat Samut Prakan, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in time is 12PM (noon) - 12AM (midnight) and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
您即将入住的温馨别墅是由法国设计大师亲手历时三年采用地中海式风格精心设计建造完成，坐落于泰国曼谷美丽的湄南河之滨，出门即可到达被美国时代周刊评为具有亚洲绿洲之城美称的“绿肺”公园，适合骑行，咖啡馆小憩，距离城市中心素坤逸50巷仅有一河之隔，乘坐轮渡十五分钟即可到达曼谷商业中心区，总共三层，一楼三个房间，二楼两个房间，三楼一个超大房间，有按摩浴缸，房源最多可停放6-8辆车，是您几家人家庭旅行聚会，商务招待，生日party ，蜜月之旅的不二选择。

别墅采用地中海式设计，走进别墅大门首先进入眼帘的是一个超大泳池，泳池周边有淡水淋浴和桑拿房，向前走是独栋独立竹林花园的超级大床房，有按摩浴缸；一楼还有一个公用会客厅，有60寸液晶电视和超大公用厨房，进入别墅主楼有三个卧室，两个大床房，一个标准房，接着移步二楼，是整个别墅的中心位置，有公用餐厅，可以尽情享受美味佳肴，还有一个主卧室带按摩浴缸，一个次卧室有扶梯，给您小桥流水人家的视觉体验，接下来是三楼可以看到稻田美景和一个露台酒吧，可欣赏夕阳西下，繁星点点，为您的住宿多增添一份大自然的宁静辽阔

住三晚以上可以免费接机

绿肺公园，水上市场，特色咖啡屋，游船码头

步行10分钟可到达轮渡码头，乘坐轮渡10分钟到达曼谷城市中心区
sectionedDescription/interaction: 住三晚以上可以免费接机

-Share Big kitchen, Big common area
-Silom Night life, BKK Old town, Shopping Malls,. Mahanakhon Highest tower, Restaurants, street food and 7-11 are all around this place.

Welcome travelers, expats, students, etc. 

환영 여행자, 외국인, 학생 등

欢迎旅客，外籍人士，学生等

Space is one bedroom with living area, private bathroom and separated shower with islands design planning. It makes area is very large to relax in this unit, fully furnished composing, an oversize sofa bed for extra person and large working table with Fiber Hi Speed Wifi up-to 300 MB, Kitchen amenities and Laundry machine are provide by sharing common space at 1st floor.

You own the room.

Facilities and Amenities
1.Electronic Facilities

A/C (Cooling ) 
Hair Dryer

WIFI

2.Amenities:

Toiletries:Shampoo, Body Wash, Conditioner
Towel
Toothpaste and Toothbrush
Laundry Detergent
Tableware

☆ Apartment Facilities for Free ☆

- Minimalist style common bar & waiting area
- Laundry machine
- FIBER Hispeed Wifi upto 300 MB
- Main Kitchen
- Kettle
- Microwave
- Kitchenware

Feel free to contact me at any time via Line id : @ekaphap111

- Silom shoping area only 10 mins walk
- 'Mahanakhon' and sky terrace. The must Bangkok view point on Highest tower in Thailand
- Chaopraya Boat station (Sri Phraya or Saphan Taksin Boat station )in only 1000 meters.
- Siam Paragon Shopping Mall 2 BTS station. 
- Central Embrassy 4 BTS station.
- 7 Eleven 300 m. 2 minutes by walk
- TCDC Thailand Creative Design Center 5 minutes by car

-------
☆ Fantastic Location 
· Situated at Silom Road, the heart of Bangkok, where is also the hub for recreation,culture and celebrity. As the main commercial street, along the Sukhumvit Road teems with all kinds of shopping centres and stores. Namely, it is a shopping paradise! Major shopping mall like Siam Paragon､Central World､Terminal 21､Emporioum are just around the corner. There are also 7-11 and supermarkets downstairs.

More information
-★ Only takes a 5 m walk to Silom District (Patphong､Surawongse )
★ Only takes a 10 min walk to MRT Samyan Station
★ Only takes 5 station to BTS Asok Station & Terminal21
★ Only takes 4 stations to Nana Plaza and Soi Cowboy
☆ Only takes 3 stations to BTS Chit Lom Station, Central World Shopping Mall, Erawan Shrine.
☆ Only takes 2 stations to BTS Siam Station, Siam Paragon, MBK Shopping Mall.
☆ Only takes 5 min to Si Lom District.

• Delicious cuisine are just around the corner! Along the street are all sorts of restaurants and cafes, varies from country to country. Whenever you want, you could find you favour nearby. 

• The apartment enjoys a favourable transportation which makes it very convenient to getting around. BTS Chong Nonsri, MRT Samyan or BTS Saladaeng  is just within a very easy walking distance. The location is great as many major tourist spots are easy to access!!

Google Map link
https://goo.gl/maps/fwdfZ8zs2uE2
Lat/Long
13.729377, 100.523398

On Naret road, 

From Suvarnabhumi Airport, you can go down to B Floor and get Airport Rail Link 30 minutes to BTS Phayathai Station. Then you should change BTS Line at BTS Siam Station to Samrong Line and take to BTS Phromphong Station directly. Easily, you can take taxi directly to the property.

From Don Muang Airport, you can take on BMTA Bus (A2) to Victory Monumet and get on BTS Victory Monument Station. Then you should change BTS Line at BTS Siam Station to Samrong Line and take to BTS Phromphong Station directly. Easily, you can take taxi directly to the property.

From BTS Promphong station :
Get down BTS PromPhong Station Exit x or x, walk to Sukhumvit 24 just 6 minutes walking 550 meters to get to this condominium.

▷Coming Back Home: 
1. By Taxi: 
From The Airport: Taxi is highly recommended! About 400THB.
2. By Underground: 
Exit from BTS Phrom Phong Station and walk for 500m.
The community provides regular bus service for residents. The bus will drive you to the crossing next to BTS Phrom Phong Station.
3. By Car:
Free Parking. When entering the parking lot, you are required to offer your documents. The personnel will give you a yellow visitor card which is the proof for getting the documents back.

▷Away From Home: 
1. By Walk:
★ Only takes a 500m walk to EM District (Emporium ､EmQuartier ､Emsphere )
★ Only takes a 8 min walk to BTS Phrom Phong Station

2. By Underground:
★ Only takes 1 station to BTS Asok Station & Terminal21
★ Only takes 2 stations to Nana Plaza and Soi Cowboy
☆ Only takes 4 stations to BTS Chit Lom Station, Central World Shopping Mall, Erawan Shrine.
☆ Only takes 5 stations to BTS Siam Station, Siam Paragon, MBK Shopping Mall.
☆ Only takes 10 min to Si Lom District.

3. By Other Transportations:
Taxi, tuk-tuk, motorbike are always nearby. Security personnel could help you to call a taxi to downstairs. 
- By taxi: Traffic jam always happens. Taxi is fairly more economical with ample A/C. It consists of two types: One in yellowish-green and one in rosy-red. The former is by meter while the latter maybe not.
-Tuk-tuk is a more Thai Style transportation. Bargain with the driver could have a more reasonable price. 
-Motorbike is very speedy. Please take good care of youself. SAFETY FIRST.

☆ Only 10 min by car to Si Lom Nightlife Area.
☆ About 30 min by car to the Grand Palace. 
☆ If you wanna visit several local night markets and characteristic markets, Grab ( An app like U*ber) is highly recommended.

Get to this residence is very easy just 10 mins for Chongnonsi BTS. .

please note that we are residential apartment, not a hotel.  
Please don't check-in without appointment., 
We do need to make arrangement for check-in. 

It's no service at the front lobby or security guard. such as taxi calling, ask for the any information. Please feel free to contact me directly 24 hours.

Meanwhile you can contact me via
Airbnb, or
Call : 081 530 3130 or
062 959 9545
Whatapps : +66815303130
Line ID : ekaphap111
Wechat : ekaphap111
Email : eakaphap@gmail.com

*This condo's staff do not support short-term rental, hence please do not go to the front desk or juristic office at the building. If there are any issues or questions, please contact or text us directly.

guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
This is my cozy 1 bedroom. This apartment has several facilities such as kitchen, washing machine, and internet access with WIFI. There is a pool & gym that you can access for free (6 am to 10 pm). There are also a coffee shop, Thai restaurants, Japanese restaurant, supermarket (7-Eleven), massage shop, and laundry shop, respectively.

Offering an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre, as well as a garden, CONDO TC Green is situated in Bangkok, 7 km from Emporium Shopping Mall. Complimentary WiFi is provided.

This apartment will provide guests with 1 bedroom, a TV and air conditioning.

Suvarnabhumi Airport is 23 km away. 

Huai Khwang is a great choice for travellers interested in night markets, shopping for clothes and markets.

name: 曼谷素坤逸3号宫廷别墅
address: Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12AM (midnight)
sectionedDescription/description:
如果您想在曼谷享受一段难忘的度假或商务之旅，那么皇家园林别墅是您的理想之选。这是一个拥有新泰式风格的豪华别墅民宿，让您感受到泰国的传统与现代的完美结合。
        三卧三卫的宽敞房间里放松身心，享受空调，百寸电视，洗衣机，烘干机，免费WiFi和私人游泳池等现代设施。设备齐全的厨房里展示您的厨艺。
      私人园林庭院里打卡拍摄精美照片，在泳池畅游，享受阳光和清爽的空气。三个免费专属停车库停放您的私家车，方便您随时出行。不仅如此，别墅位于素坤逸地区，是曼谷最繁华商业区，您可以轻松前往附近的购物中心、夜市、Tichuca Roofttop 酒吧、RCA夜店一条街。从网红小吃到高档餐厅，应有尽有。
       让我们为您打造一段令人难忘的奢华体验吧。期待着为您提供无与伦比的服务，并让您的曼谷之行成为美好的回忆。

别墅整体500平米，

全部

可以提供，免费牙刷，热水壶，

Sky bar

距离bts车站300米

name: [Staycation]Near Rot Fai Train Night Market Condo
address: Khet Prawet, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Elements Srinakarin Condo

1. We are in the opposite of the Seacon Square. And Paradise Park (Seri Center), Train Market Srinakarin are within a walking distance.
2. Our Condo is 37 sqm, well furnished with standards of comfort;
3.It's well equipped with swimming pool/gym/garden;
4.Convenient traffic here, easy to go to Suvarnabhumi Airport;
5.We can speak English/ภาษาไทย/普通话/粤语/한국어!^^

Room Equipment:
*32” TV
*Refrigerator
*Air conditioner (2)
*Microwave
*Wifi-router
*Hair dryer
*Water heater
*Electric Kettle
*Shampoo&shower gel&soap
*Toothpaste&toothbrush
*Free toiletries

Facilities
*Outdoor swimming pool(10.00 A.M. – 10.00 P.M)
*Fitness room(10.00 A.M. – 10.00 P.M)
*Garden
*Covered Car Park(200 THB per day)
*CCTV
*24-hour security guards

Nearby:
7-Eleven convenience store —200 m
Seacon Square Srinakarin— 600 m
Paradise Park (Seri Center) — 1km
Train Market Srinakarin ( Tarad Rodfai )— 1.8km
Weekend Night Market —1.3km
Villa Market (Paradise Park) —1.2 km

Restaurants:
So Saap – 280 m
Canton Suki (Seacon Square) – 630 m
Khrua Thai (Seacon Square FL.4) – 630 m
Santa Fe' Steak (Seacon Square FL.4) – 630 m
Jum Zap Hut (Seacon Square) – 630 m

You can contact me anytime on airbnb~!:)

Airport:

From Suvarnabhumi airport, you may take taxi directly. It will take about 20 minutes, 300 thai baht. Or you may take SRTET City Line from airport B1 floor to the nearest station Hua Mak station, and then take taxi for about 10 minutes to our condo.

From Don Mueang Airport (DMK) , you may take taxi directly. It will take about 40 minutes.

name: Thonglo25 Swimming pool Villa素坤逸铜锣25巷6卧4卫泳池别墅
address: Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
摩登泰式泳池别墅地处曼谷市中心富人区铜锣25巷口1公里处的别墅区，别墅周围遍布各国美食餐厅、咖啡厅集网红打卡店，是曼谷年轻人最chic的逛街去处。巷口有个泰式连锁糕点店和一家知名日式餐厅Miyabi Kappo，往前走泰餐厅ZAO LARB ซาวลาบ，意大利餐厅Pasta等.....
距离BTS Thonglor  2公里，距离1.5公里有The 8 Tonglo 商场，距离曼谷贵妇商场EMQuartier  2公里，距离三美泰医院1.5公里，曼谷医院4公里，距离市中心四面佛8公里。距离素万那普机场和廊曼机场都是27公里。可提供付费接机、租车服务。
入住这处位于市中心的房源，让家人享受一切近在咫尺的便利。

曼谷市区 1600平 网红小区高端奢华6房泳池别墅 适合于家人休假 朋友开派对 中泰英房东 司机接送旅行路线规划 

Bangkok luxurious private pool villa 6bedrooms suitable for family and friends with chauffeur and tourist guide suggestion.

Land 389.4 sq m, Usable area 806.14 sq m, 
6 bedrooms / 6 bathrooms with toilet / 1 toilet / 6 parking spaces / Western kitchen / Swimming Pool / Chinese Tearoom / Majong Room / Working Table

The location of the “QHouse Avenue Ratchaphruek-Rama 5 Villa” is on Nakhon In Road, Bang Kruai District, Nonthaburi. This road is important for traveling in and out of the city. Used to connect across Rama 5 Bridge into Nonthaburi city and Bangkok. It can also connect to Ratchaphruek and Kanchanaphisek Roads. Near the Si Rat Expressway entrance and exit point. Used for short cut into the city to Chatuchak and Chaengwattana zones.

The amenities in this area are quite complete, with shops, restaurants lining both sides of the road, as well as retail stores. Convenience stores, supermarkets, community malls and large department stores. Other important places like schools and hospitals. In the future, a new road will be cut connecting from Nakhon-In all the way to the Salaya zone which helps avoid traffic jams. So who has children? Studying at Mahidol Wittayanusorn School and Mahidol University Salaya Campus Can travel easily.

Nearby important places such as:

Community Mall & Supermarkets:
-Lotus Plus Bang Yai ~ 2.2 kilometers
-The Walk Ratchaphruek ~ 5.4 kilometers
-Homepro Ratchaphruek ~ 7.2 kilometers
-The Crystal Ratchaphruek ~ 9 kilometers
-The Circle Ratchaphruek ~ 13.3 kilometers
-Food Villa Ratchaphruek ~ 13.9 kilometers

Department Stores
-Central Plaza Westgate ~ 8.3 km.
-IKEA Bang Yai ~ 8.3 kilometers
-The Mall Bang Khae ~ 13.2 kilometers

Convenient Stores:
-7-Eleven Prathana Village branch ~1.3 kilometers
-7-Eleven PTTOR Nakhon In branch ~1.8 kilometers

Educational Institutions:
-Debsirin Nonthaburi School ~ 2.2 kilometers
-Dragon International School ~ 2.5 kilometers
-Denla School ~ 3 kilometers
-Ploen Phatthana School ~ 7.5 kilometers

Hospitals:
-Thonburi Hospital 2 ~ 6,4 kilometers
-Bang Kruai Hospital ~ 10.4 kilometers
-Siriraj Piyamahakarun Hospital ~ 15 kilometers
-Chao Phraya Hospital ~ 15.2 kilometers
-Phyathai Hospital 3 ~ 16.3 kilometers

Q-House Avenue Details

The design of the QHouse Avenue Ratchaphruek-Rama 5 Villa places emphasis on a large area. The whole part of the land surrounding the house That can be made into a garden and parking space for many cars. Including a maximum usable area of ​​845 square meters. To supports large families it also comes complete with common areas, a wide main road, and a large club building. The functions are divided into a swimming pool, sauna, relaxation area, fitness room, tennis court, and gardens distributed at 4 points throughout the project.

Facilities:
-Clubhouse
-Swimming pool with divided children's pool
-Sauna room
-Fitness room
-There are 3 garden areas in the project.
-Security system: CCTV cameras at entrance and exit
-Double Gate
-24 hour security guard
 -Burglar alarm in the entire mansion with Magnetic & Shock Sensor system and Control Panel.

 🧹House maid is provided if don’t need please ask at least one day prior check-in or 1000THB
    -House maid can do basic daily cleaning but not messy cleaning like bunch of food/trash all over.
***Please takecare of the house to what its original status. 
🧽🎉Clean up your mess after party or gathering to its original place.
  -wash up dishes 500THB
  -clean up your mess on the table THB per table
  -puke 500THB per spot
  -furniture damages 3000THB (depends on what is damaged)
  -house key remote 20000THB if damaged or lost.

sectionedDescription/description:
This sumptuous 3-Bedroom Suites offer spacious luxury accommodation with lavish conveniences and traditional elegance. Featuring 3 spacious bedrooms and an expansive living space - this accommodation type is ideal for families. Bolstered by hardwood, marble flooring, premium furnishings and superior amenities this 3-Bedroom Suite is richly appointed and fully equipped for business or leisure.

Guests enjoy full access to the entire residence and all of its facilities and amenities:
- Fully-equipped kitchen
- Washer/dryer
- Custom mattresses
- PC connection point
- Hardwood & Marble flooring
- Personal safe
- Fully stocked minibar
- LED Television
- Radio
- Tea/coffee facilities
- Swimming pool on 4th floor
- 3 bathrooms
- Individual air-conditioning.
- Guest toilet
- Personal Wine Fridge & Minibars
- Safety box is available in the master bedroom
- Tea & coffee making facilities
- TV and DVD player
- WiFi Internet
- Butler service

Should you have any additional questions or requests before booking or during your stay, please do not hesitate to reach out to me!

Due to its perfect location, the following points of interest are within easy reach:
Shopping: 
- Central Embassy (800m), 
- Central Chidlom (1.0km),
-  Siam Paragon (2.2km)

Hospitals:

Parks:

The rates are inclusive of:

- Local newspaper

- Complimentary wireless Internet access
- Daily housekeeping
- Shuttle Service to Central Embassy and Nearby Hospitals

The following services can be provided upon request at additional charges:
- In-residence dining
- International newspaper

name: Thong Lo Private Pool Villa In Center Of Bangkok
address: Khet Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in time is 3PM - 10PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
This peaceful and quiet luxury property is conveniently located in the heart of the city, offering easy access to all of the local attractions. You'll be just a short distance from restaurants, shopping, supermarkets, and entertainment options, as well as the sky train for easy travel. You'll appreciate having everything you need right at your fingertips. The property is newly renovated and very spacious with a private pool and a fully equipped kitchen.

Welcome to your luxurious private pool villa in the center of Bangkok! This stunning retreat, is located next to shopping, restaurant and nightlife venues, is the perfect getaway for those seeking a tranquil and indulgent stay in this bustling city.

To ensure a worry-free stay, please note that a ฿30,000 security deposit is required upon arrival. This deposit will be refunded at the end of your stay, provided there are no damages to the villa.

Additionally, we offer the convenience of a cleaning service for an extra fee. While this service is optional, we highly recommend it to maintain the pristine condition of the villa. If you opt not to avail yourself of the cleaning service, kindly ensure the villa is left in the same condition as you found it upon arrival. Failure to do so may result in a ฿3000 cleaning fee. Your comfort and satisfaction are our top priorities, and we hope you enjoy your time in our beautiful space!

The Villa

Step inside and be greeted by a spacious and tastefully decorated living area, complete with comfortable seating. Relax and enjoy the state-of-the-art entertainment system including a 85 inch smart tv in the family room or step into the games room and enjoy a game of pool at your full size pool table. The fully equipped kitchen is a chef's dream, boasting top-of-the-line appliances and everything you need to whip up a gourmet meal.

As you make your way through the villa, you'll find pristine bathrooms, each with their own unique charm and luxurious amenities. Sink into the oversized jacuzzi spa bathtub or indulge in experience of the rainfall shower, and let your worries melt away.

But the real highlight of this villa is undoubtedly your private pool. Take a dip in the crystal-clear water, lounge on the comfortable sun beds, or sip on a refreshing cocktail as you soak up the sun.  When it’s time for a break from the sun, retreat you your cushioned poolside cabana and let the cooling breeze of the tropical fan wash over you.

Cleaner 

During your stay, we offer cleaning services throughout the villa, and our cleaner can make up your rooms for an additional fee if you desire.

STANDARD FACILITIES

- Shampoo,
- Shower gel
- Towels
- Hair dryer
- Stereo
- Smart TV
- Hangers
- Iron
- Washing machine
- Full kitchen

FEATURES & AMENITIES

- Fully equipped kitchen
- Formal dining area with seating for 8
- Espresso machine
- Dishwasher
- Ice maker
- Satellite television
- Smart TV
- Office space
- Iron/Ironing board
- Washer/Dryer
- Air conditioning
- Wi-Fi
- Pool table
- Family outdoor BBQ
- 85 inch smart tv 

Located in the center of Bangkok, this villa is just steps away from the city's most popular attractions, shopping, and dining destinations. But with its serene setting and luxurious amenities, you may never want to leave!

Book your stay now and experience the ultimate in luxury and relaxation at our private pool villa in Bangkok.

Guest will have access to the entire private space

I am just a short phone call away.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
- Only one pet is allowed on the property and cannot exceed 15kg

- Smoking is allowed only outside of the house


Additional Rules Regarding Parties:

Parties and gatherings are allowed in our Airbnb rental, but guests must contact the host first to discuss the details and obtain approval. Please note that additional charges may apply depending on the size and nature of the event.

Before booking, please be aware of the following guidelines:

Contact the host: Guests must contact the host  in advance to discuss the details of the party or gathering. This includes the number of attendees, the purpose of the event, and any additional equipment or services required.

Approval required: Parties and gatherings are subject to host approval. The host reserves the right to decline any requests that do not meet their criteria or may pose a risk to the property, neighbors, or other guests.

Additional charges: Depending on the size and nature of the event, additional charges may apply. The host will provide guests with a quote for any extra fees, such as cleaning, security, or damage deposit, before approving the request.

Noise levels: Guests must respect the noise level rules of the property and the surrounding neighborhood. Loud music or excessive noise may result in complaints from neighbors and may lead to the cancellation of the event.

Damage to property: Guests are responsible for any damages to the property or its contents during the event. The host may charge an additional fee to cover the cost of repairs or replacement of damaged items.

We want all guests to have a pleasant and safe experience at our Airbnb rental. Please be respectful of the property, neighbors, and other guests. Contact the host with any questions or concerns about the party or gathering, and follow their guidelines and instructions to ensure a successful event.
sectionedDescription/interaction: I am just a short phone call away.

sectionedDescription/description:
My home is a safe environment as we make sanitation and cleanliness our number 1 priority. The entire unit is professionally cleaned after each guests check-out.  
- RIWA is a secluded, stand alone building, located in a quiet residential area. You do not need to share public spaces or elevators with neighbors, to social distance. 
- Wish to enjoy Bangkok vibrant life? RIWA is in the middle of all the best restaurants, night life, and sightseeing spots. 
- We have an in-house resident caretaker.

The 3 floors of the house including a total 8 bedrooms plus 3 den apartments boasts over 6,500 square feet of living area. It features private keycard-activated elevator that will take you directly to the 3 floors of the house.

Guests have access to the full house, including of the Roof-Top.

With 3 large living rooms for gathering, the unit accommodates 16 in comfort with en-suite bathroom for each bedrooms. The 2 master bedrooms have a large walk-in closets where you can enjoy dressing in comfort with own in-room air-conditioning. The 3 dens allows for additional sleeping for 6.

For your convenience, the 3 apartments of the house are equipped with a full kitchen and an in-unit washing machine. Two parking stalls are also available for your use.

You will have full access of:
- 1st Floor: Entrance and parking
- 2nd Floor: Full apartment with 4 bedrooms, living-room and kitchen
- 3nd Floor: Full apartment 4 bedrooms, living-room and kitchen
- 4th Floor: 3 bedrooms, living-room and kitchen (another bedroom is locked for owner private belongings storage)
- 5th Floor: Roof-Top with Pool
You will have exclusive access to 2nd, 3rd, 4th and 5th floors by private lift

My Co-Host Berry, a well-travelled Bangkokian, will be able to assit you during your stay at RIWA.
Please contact Berry for anything related to your stay and any questions you may have in mind.
Our house caretaker Khun Yut - who stays in a detached studio at the ground floor of the property - is here to ensure your safety during your stay as well as looking after the common areas of the home.

Fantastic restaurants, bars, and nightlife make Thonglor the hippest street in all of Bangkok.

You are right in the middle of all that is happening. I have not visited them all, as the list is exhaustive.

All located near Thonglor, some of my favorites are Pattara, Kanittha, and Madame Shawn for Thai cuisine, Kenji’s Lab for Japanese, Surface Kitchen for French, Viva 21 and Bacco for Italian, and the Lost Burro for Mexican fare. For drinks with friends, the Rabbit Hole and Tuba. For clubbing, go to Grease. To hang out, check out theCommons, Seen Space, and several rooftop bars on Thonglor.

Of course, real Thai street food is located right in front of the lane, so you can eat like the locals for cheap.

Also do not hesitate to get a foot massage at any boutique that lines Thonglor for that needed foot and shoulder rub. For the discerning, a good day spa is within reach for pure relaxation and Thai aroma therapy - an experience that cannot be missed while in Thailand!

A few BTS stations away, you will be in Mall heaven.
- EmDistrict, Siam Paragon, MBK, Terminal 21, Central Embassy are within reach.
- For local shopping experience, hit Platinum Mall and Pratunam District, where bargains abound.
- Looking for anything and everything? Hit JJ Market on the weekends.
- RIWA Thonglor is also located near several world-renowned hospitals, popular for medi-tourism. Bangkok is well known for world class medical treatment, at an affordable price, where people from all over come for annual health check up, or advance medical treatments.

This City of Angels is known for her ornate shrines and vibrant street life.
- A ride along the Chao Phraya River will take you to its network of canals, flowing past the Rattanakosin Royal District, the Grand Palace and the sacred Emerald Buddha.
- Nearby, Wat Pho houses the world renowned reclining Buddha (also the birth place of traditional Thai Massage and Medicine School, a practice that dates back 2500 years ago ); - and on the opposite shore, the Khmer-style spire, Wat Arun. All this, at only a Grab ride away.

RIWA Thonglor is situated on a private, residential lane.
Once home, you leave behind the city noise. Enjoy quiet times at the pool or gaze at the stars on the rooftop deck. Open up the kitchen and make your own favorite meal or experiment with an exotic Thai dish.

Makro Express, Tops Supermarket, Foodland, as with your corner 7-11 store are nearby, to pick up all that you may need to cook up a storm.

And if your are tired from the day’s events, simply relax with your favourite drink on the rooftop at RIWA!
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
FIRE SAFETY
-In case of fire, DO NOT use the elevator; take the stairs to the GROUND Floor.

ACCESS / SECURITY
-	Keep your 3 sets of key and keycard secure at all times. Report lost cards immediately. Any loss will be charged 1,000 Baht / set.
-	In order to avoid cluster and house party with the pending re-opening of travels to Thailand, you shall notify my Co-Host in advance if you wish to bring in unregistered guests.  
-	Guests are responsible and liable for any  misconduct and loss or damages caused by anyone associated with them during their stay at RIWA.
-	When not home, ensure all doors are locked. 

FORBIDDEN ACTIVITIES
During your stay at RIWA, It is NOT allowed to:
-	move, re-arrange or re-locate any furniture such as sofa, dining table and beds as this may result in injury and liable property damages. Please contact Berry for any special requests
-	stock any items in the public areas of the property
-	lead any kind of activity that creates a regular human traffic in and out of property
-	use the property as logistic hub

ELECTRICITY - Help us conserve energy!
-Air conditioner and lights shall be switched off anytime the apartment in not occupied. 
-Please turn off Living/Dining Room Air Conditioner when retiring to bedrooms.

SWIMMING POOL AND ROOFTOP (Access via Key Card ONLY)
-No children should be left without adult supervision AT ALL TIMES 
-NO breakables - glasses, cups, plates - are allowed on the rooftop; plastic cups for pool use can be found in the kitchen cabinet
-No open fires or barbecue is permitted
-Turn off lights when you leave the rooftop to not disturb neighbours
-Refrain from loud music or excessive noise, out of respect for our other guests and neighbours

SMOKING
-Smoking is permitted only on the rooftop, and the ground floor  
-In consideration of other guests, kindly use ashtrays 

LAUNDRY & CLEANING
-Do not hang any items on the front balcony;  use the drying rack provided in the laundry room.

GARBAGE
-Dispose garbage daily in the ‘Garbage Room’ next to the front gate
-The property is pest-free. Please help keep it that way!
-Do not leave food and dirty dishes unattended, as they are prone to attract unwanted pests. 
-Use with extreme caution when using the sink garbage disposal
-Dispose of hard waste such as bones, plastic or wood in the garbage can.  Do not throw in disposal as it will severely damage the motor

name: Bkk super VIP 4+1 bed top floor luxury penthouse
address: Khet Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.
Located in the heart of one of Bangkok’s most exclusive neighbourhoods, on a peaceful avenue opposite the Royal Bangkok Sports Club and just 100m from the BTS station, Dusit Suites Hotel Ratchadamri, Bangkok provides an elegant haven in the city centre.

This top shelf Bangkok penthouse lies atop an iconic highrise condominium situated in the center of Bangkok’s Central Business District (CBD). The upscale condominium building is well renowned and features groundbreaking environmentally friendly design and facilities. The location is located within close proximity to the headquarters of many fortune 500 companies, local and international banks and other major high-end office buildings. The location also allows easy access to many of Bangkok’s finest restaurants including two ranked among the top 20 of the world
has huge terrace private big balcony facing to panoramic city view 360 degree on the highest floor of the building. This estate contains big spaces of 4+1 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, usable area about 463 Square meters ( Sq.m. ), 2storey, and 1 maid's quarter provided, storage room, full air-conditioned in all rooms with very well maintain, elegantly full equipped kitchen, luxurious and tastefully fully furnished however can be unfurnished as your requested, characteristic property along with comfortable, unique, personalized, warmth, and relaxation. They are also carefully for all detail in final touched. This consists of a large living room, dining room, bedrooms area comfortable and spacious with well appointed stylish en-suite bathrooms. It is conveniently access to business area enhance the living satisfaction, also the accommodation closed to BTS Skytrain station, Expressway, transportation, Lumpini Park, Embassies, along with the property near Shopping centers such as Central Embassy, Central Chidlom, Siam Paragon, Central World, community malls, numerous Restaurants, Supermarkets, International Schools, Petchburi road, Office Buildings, Financial Institutions, ans quality of Hospitals. Marvelous Full Facilities, CCTV, Security Systems, warmth Receptions, Technician, and highly 24/7 hours Security guards on duty

The penthouse is located by the bustling Ratchaprasong intersection, within walking distance of renowned shopping precincts. Just a few minutes’ stroll to the Erawan Shrine, the luxurious Gaysorn Village mall and both lines of the Bangkok Mass Transit System (BTS) Skytrain, the hotel is ideally positioned for guests to immerse themselves in the city’s colorful culture. Other highlights within a 10- to 25-minute drive include the Charoenkrung Creative District, the iconic Grand Palace and the city’s beautiful flower market. Both Suvarnabhumi International Airport and Don Mueang Airport are an easy 35 minutes away by taxi (if there’s no traffic).

name: 6 BR house,Private pool, shopping mall, vast room
address: Pak Kret, Chang Wat Nonthaburi, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is 10AM - 8PM
sectionedDescription/description:
6 bedrooms with ensuite bathroom and a private pool. You won't find anything like this easily in Bkk. It's close to a big shopping Mall, Central Changwattana. We have fully equipped kitchen and the high ceilings living room. My place is good for families (with kids) and big groups who loves quiet spaces.

It's a house with 845 sqm. of space with private swimming pool that is regularly in maintenance. 6 bedrooms + 6 bathrooms make all guests who stays feel comfortable in his own space. The house is surrounded with green garden and well-guarded with security.

Our house is fully equipped with kitchen (both western and eastern style), big fridge, dish washing machine, washer and dryer. You can enjoy the dip pool whenever you want. There are parking space for 2 cars. However, the house in situated in a small compound with other residences, please respect their privacy by not using noises, not stroll into their yard and not park your cars in others' spaces.

My daughter and I will be ready to help you out through chat box or phone calls (Thai number) because we have moved our house to other areas. Please do not hesitate to ask us anytime. We will try to accommodate you as much as we can.

Our house is in residential area in the eastern side of Bkk. It is near Donmueng airport than the big Suwannabhum airport. The big shopping mall, Central Changwattana, is just 1 km. away. There are 7-11 near by. And plenty of local restaurants if you are open to try.

It's best to get around by car, taxi, Uber or even hire a van with driver. Most of my guests come in big group and hiring a van with local driver is best for them. I am happy to help arrange the van for guests, just make your request :)

Friends of guests are not allowed. The guards in front of the house has authority to grant or not grant access to guests who are deemed suspicious for risky behavior such as intoxication or drug usage.

sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome to my dear friends and guests

*Please take note that the swimming pool and gym are only available for guest(s) who booked 30 nights or more*

 Our unique services are included "SALE" of properties,  "Monthly Rental" and "Interior Renovation" by experiencing stays in our particular lists.

We extremely hope our clients and guests can experience those tiny details and features of the properties before they rent monthly or purchase.

Our home, "Above the Sky" is at a SUPER convenient location in the heart of Bangkok. we are right at Sukhumvit 11 and 5mins walk to Nana this is one of biggest night life area, pubs, clubs and fine dining this place can also offer you the greatest convenience of travelling around Bangkok as we are a couple of stops away from some great tourist attractions and shopping malls like theTerminal 21, the Emporium and the EmQuartier.


"Above The Sky " is one of our luxury and premium penthouse in our lists, we wish we can provide you a elegant journey. in addition. This unit is spacious, and located on the high floor with a spectacular view of the Bangkok city. In addition, this particular list is surrounded with full of night life activities and delicious restaurants, we also can offer you a decent sleeping quality at the same time. we also would like to offer our friends and guests a coming-home like experience even though you are travelling in oversea, so we will provide all the essential home equipment and make you feel like "home."

Bed Room: A comfy queen size bed, aircon, Refrigerator, TV and kittle 

Shower Room: A luxury and clean tiled shower room, mirror and toilet - all the essentials that you need.

sectionedDescription/description:
If you are looking for a nice hotel located right in the heart of Bangkok’s shopping paradise that is just a 10-minute walk from either Airport Rail Link or BTS Skytrain Station, Vince hotel is your absolute choice.

How can you experience the true Bangkok flair unless you visit Pratunam, one of the most vibrant, bustling neighborhood in Bangkok. While Pratunam is packed with dozens of hotels, Vince is not just another hotel here where you just check in and sleep. It’s a stylishly hybrid hotel boasting a uniquely innovative interior and charming decor. ‘Fun’, ‘easy’, and ‘style’ are what you will experience while staying here.
Behind the stunningly modern facade, inside is a classical-looking hotel with a contemporary edge. It’s like classic and modern design languages in dialog. A warm Siamese welcome awaits your arrival. The minute you arrive, you know you are somewhere where you can be yourself, kick back and relax. Let our professional, friendly staff attend to your desires. Here at Vince, you can always expect new twists.

- Private Room with inside toilet
- Queen bed
- Air conditioner
- Hot Shower separate with toilet
- Dressing table with half body mirror
- Hair Dryer
- Kettle
- In room safe
- Open wore drop and cloth hanker
- Shampoo, Hand wash, Shower Gel and body lotion are provide on refill bottle
- Drinking water, Tea, coffee set are provided 1 time on arrival date

...

...

...

- Cleaning service 300 THB / time (included all linen changed)
- Breakfast 220 THB net / pax for buffet breakfast (advance purchase at front desk to get this rate)
- Set of amenities (included toothbrush, comb, razor, shower cab, sanitary bag, cotton bud) will be charge 100 THB
- Drinking water set pack  2 bottles will be charge 60 THB
- Extra bed with full bedding faciliteis will be charge 600 THB
- Extra towel, bathmat, Bathrobe will be charge 100 THB / Pcs. (1 time pay no charge)
- Extra Pillow, blanket, bedsheet is 200 THB / pcs. ( 1 time pay no charge)

name: 曼谷中心Thong Lor顶级豪宅庄园泳池别墅summer villa 189
address: Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand

sectionedDescription/description:
**房屋配置***
这是一栋拥有2400平米五个卧室八个卫生间以及七张超大双人床三个用餐区，酒吧区，桑拿房，健身房、娱乐室、影音室、办公室，35人会议室、25米*5米双泳池带冲浪，篮球场，花园，台球室，以及六个停车位，庄园里设施豪华，宽敞舒适

步入别墅，您将被宽敞的起居空间所吸引，精心设计的室内布局充满了现代与传统的融合之美。不论是三个用餐区还是设施齐全的厨房，此外，别墅内还设有酒吧，让您在品尝美酒的同时，感受别样的惬意。

想要放松身心？別墅的桑拿房和娱乐室将是您的最佳选择。您也可以在影音室享受私人电影院的乐趣，或在会议室和办公室内安排商务活动。对于喜爱运动的客人，别墅内的双泳池带冲浪、篮球场以及花园，都将满足您的需求。

而夜幕降临时，別墅的台球室则是放松身心的绝佳场所，让您与亲朋好友共度美好时光。别墅还提供六个宽敞的停车位，确保您的出行更加便利。

欢迎您来体验曼谷的奢华庄园生活！

这是一栋拥有2400平米位于曼谷市中心的顶级豪宅庄园别墅，拥有五个卧室八个卫生间，三个用餐区，酒吧，桑拿房，娱乐室、影音室、会议室、办公室，双泳池带冲浪，篮球场，花园，台球室，以及六个停车位，庄园里设施豪华，宽敞舒适，希望您可以在这里度过美好的假期

全部设施

这里位于曼谷绝对市中心，附近可以找到您想要的一切

距离phrom phong站BTS步行12分钟

特别注意：
        别墅的入住时间为14:00退房时间为11:00，我们可以帮您寄存行李，请严格按照规定时间退房保证其他用户顺利入住。
        入住期间需要缴纳10000泰铢的押金，这包括物品保证金以及电费押金，我们已经在房价中扣除了包含电费的费用，以适应1人到14人的不同用电需求，电费根据国家电表计数为准，每个单位费用为9泰铢。

name: 曼谷市中心Thong附近800平泳池别墅
address: Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in time is 3PM - 10PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
曼谷市中心的泳池别墅，是您在这座令人陶醉的城市留下美好回忆的理想之选。这个宽敞的民宿拥有5个卧室6张床，让您与亲朋好友一同入住，享受温馨的时光。
别墅内设有一个引人入胜的ps5游戏室，让您在休闲时光中尽情娱乐。但更让人难以抗拒的是它的露天烧烤跟泳池！绝对是放松和消遣的绝佳去处。您可以在水中畅游，或是在泳池边的躺椅上晒太阳，尽情享受泰国温暖的阳光。
这个别墅的豪华装修令人惊叹。宽敞的客厅和现代化的厨房让您有宾至如归的感觉，而五个卧室提供了足够的隐私和舒适。您可以在别墅内自行准备美味的食物，或者选择享用曼谷的丰富美食，因为地理位置极为优越，附近有各种餐馆和购物中心。
这座泳池别墅位于曼谷市中心，交通便捷，附近有众多的旅游景点和娱乐场所。无论您是想探索城市的文化遗产，还是寻找购物和夜生活的乐趣，这里都能满足您的需求。
选择我们的泳池别墅，将为您带来曼谷最美好的回忆。无论是家庭度假、朋友聚会还是浪漫之旅，这里都将成为您留连忘返的度假胜地。欢迎您来体验这片天堂，创造珍贵的回忆。

name: Luxury Pool Villa w/ Jacuzzi + Lift by Thonglor
address: Watthana, Bangkok, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 4PM and check out by 10AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Our spacious Oasis 5 bedroom 6.5 Bathroom luxury villa is more than a home; it's an embodiment of a lavish lifestyle that few experience. The careful attention to detail, desired central location, and the exquisite state-of-the-art amenties create a symphony of modern luxury that's beyond compare. 

Two Private pools, jacuzzi and private lift inside. 

Don't just imagine the pinnacle of urban living – live it, in this extraordinary villa designed to exceed your expectations in Bangkok.

Upon entering, guests are greeted by soaring ceilings (over 5 meteres high) that accentuate the sense of openness and sophistication throughout the home. Designed for lavish living and entertaining, the villa features five bedrooms and six bathrooms, offering ample accommodation for residents and guests alike. 

The centerpiece of this magnificent abode is undoubtedly the private jacuzzi and two swimming pools, where residents can indulge in leisurely swims or bask in the tropical sun amidst the lush green surroundings. Whether hosting glamorous soirées, a family friendly BBQ, or enjoying quiet moments of relaxation, the pools provide the perfect backdrop for memorable experiences with all state-of-the-art amenities for your perusal. 

Parking is never a concern with spaces for 5-10 cars. Additionally, a maid's room with two bedrooms is available (only 5 bedrooms are officially advertised), catering to the needs of household staff and ensuring seamless maintenance of the villa. 

Private lift inside the home no need to use the stairs. 

Modern architecture combined with nature’s greenery and premium interiors provide the ultimate must-try experience. 

In summary, this private modern pool villa in the heart of Thailand's vibrant city offers a rare blend of luxury, comfort, and convenience. From its spacious interiors and resort-style amenities to its prime location and proximity to amenities, this villa embodies the epitome of upscale urban living. Discerning individuals seeking an unparalleled lifestyle experience need look no further than this exquisite retreat in Ekkamai Villa.

- Additional TWO maid bedrooms available (not advertised, making it 7BR)
- Each bedroom has it's own WC
- Free Parking for 5-10 cars
- Nearby Huge Don Don Donki Mall 
- BTS Station close by
- Many branded shops, party, tourist attractions near home
- Weekly maintenance of private swimming pool, jacuzzi and plants
- Security: Gated villa
- Extra mattresses can be provided


- Private Pool
- Bath Tubs
- Jacuzzi
- Smart TVs
- SuperSpeed Wi-Fi
- 24hrs self-check-in
- Excellent service, concierge and local tour guide
- Airport transfer can be arranged
- Wheelchair friendly
- Family friendly

Here at your service!

address: Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand

sectionedDescription/description:
Experience a brand new dimension of luxury in this spacious and attractively decorated condominium. It offers stylish, comfortable and complete facilities such as infinity pool so you can admire the panoramic city view,  private Japanese onsen, and sky fitness center. With a fusion creative design to bring the charm of modern luxury and classic styles living in Thonglor area.

This is not a shared apartment.

On the 14th floor, you'll find a large spacious living area with comfortable sofa which can be transformed to sofa beds to accommodate up to 6 people. 

There are 2 bedrooms, 3 beds including one sofa bed, 2 specious & comfortable bathrooms. 

Bedroom;

1 king size bed, 1 Queen size bed and sofa bed

1)  Master Bedroom with king size bed and closet design for maximum comfort. 

2)  Bedroom with queen size bed and closet

3) Sofa bed in living room  size is W 140cm x L185cm


Living room;

sectionedDescription/description:
位于曼谷繁华的On Nut 地区。周边配套：距离7-11超市450米，Rca夜店街5.5公里，曼谷最繁华商业区素坤逸6公里。
   整个庄园占地2000平方米，9卧6卫，可容纳18+人同时入住。并配置两名保洁打扫院落，让您体验惬意生活
12m*10m，120平米曼谷唯一私人超大泳池，五米水上滑梯高端大气，增添游泳乐趣。
设有私人豪华KTV，并设有矩阵式专业音响。
   庄园内三栋楼宇，百平大客厅含有罗奇堡家私，网红打卡草莓熊背景墙，3米高彩兔镜，未来女战士等拍照区。配备现代化的设施，可享受空调、百寸电视、洗衣机、烘干机、WiFi、蓝牙音响等，同有烤箱、冰箱等厨房设施。

9卧6卫9床，庄园别墅，可容纳18人，12米*10米超大泳池，5米高水上滑梯，私人停车位，专业KTV游戏室

2000平左右占地，三处建筑

可以随时沟通交流

附近200米有711超市，开车五分钟有泰国海鲜餐馆，周边有多家按摩店。

sectionedDescription/description: บ้านพักระดับ 5 ดาวที่น่ารักแห่งนี้จะต้องให้แน่ใจว่าจะทำให้วันหยุดของคุณครั้งหนึ่งน่าจดจำที่สุดแห่งความสะดวกสะสบายชองการพักพ่อน กับพูลวิลล่า ขนาดใหญ่ ที่ได้รับการออกแบบที่มีความสมบูรณ์แบบในใจคุณและทุกตารางนิ้วของวิลล่าที่คุณต้องประทับใจ! กับการตกแต่งที่มีสไตล์ พร้อมด้วย ห้องนอน จำนวน 7 ห้องนอน ที่พร้อมรองรับแขกผู้เข้าพักได้สูงสุดถึง 14 ท่าน พรั่งพร้อมด้วยพื้นที่สนามหญ้าเขียวขจีขนาดใหญ่ พร้อมต้นไม้นานาพันธ์ ที่จะทำให้แขกผู้เข้าพักได้สูดอากาศอันบริสุทธ์

sectionedDescription/interaction: 让我们为您打造一段令人难忘的Thailand 奢华隐世感体验吧。期待着为您提供无与伦比的服务，并让您的曼谷之行成为美好的回忆。
sectionedDescription/name: x7 五房四卫私人泳池 KTV 台球桌 屋顶酒吧
sectionedDescription/space: 5卧4卫，可容纳10人入住，设有家庭房。享受空调、洗衣机、烘干机、WiFi、蓝牙音响等现代设施；烤箱、冰箱设备齐全的中、西厨房；专属停车区停放您的私家车；配备一名专职保姆打造优品🏡环境卫生。
sectionedDescription/summary:
梦境藏海🌊几度/夕阳🌇遍照曼谷
        日落跌进星海✨
        留给不昧旅人的着迷😍
        极致魅惑的欢喜💋
       当一扇16M枢轴大门开启，呈现给您的是私藏度假天堂。这里有波光粼粼的瀑布大泳池，闪耀着万象光芒；看不尽的星海，椰林环绕的城池；现代美学设计，客厅320°落地玻璃窗，3米长的北极熊网红沙发会给您带来一丝清凉，松鼠🐿️清晨随时到访；阳台为落日公路露营🏕️地，实现您未完成的度假梦想；在别墅内还有金色海浪风动空中酒Sky  Lounge Bar，200寸I MAX投影幕布，矩阵式BMB KTV可以和您的朋友尽情歌唱；花式台球案伴着🍷以球会友，以球传情；星级酒店标准床品拥JIA人入梦乡～万千块乐高积木增添童趣的色彩，在打卡墙前拍摄📸靓丽照片，美爆pyq～

sectionedDescription/description:
+ Our 2 townhouses will tell you my unique experiences as a shoemaker in a Chinese Thai family with the 10 bedrooms+10 bathrooms inspired from different experiences.Houses For 30 guests.
+ Free one way airport pick up, Mango Sticky Rice.
+ Daily cleaning.
+ A perfect retreat for couples, families with 2 townhouses, across small alley, not suitable for party.
+ Fully-Equipped Kitchen with appliances, basic supplies.
+ 3 Large Living Areas with TV, Cable TV.
+ Near city center, 5 mins walk to BTS.

1. Entire two townhouses space almost 550 SQ/M which opposite with small alley. All the 10 rooms are very unique design and bathroom attached ( all bedrooms have own bathrooms ).

2. Entire house, the guests do not share the space with other guests. 

3. My co-host Anne is my younger sister, she is the fashion designer, loves luxury fashion, arts, foods, you can ask her for any local tips. She works in this studio almost everyday with her helper on the 2nd floor which has the kitchen & design studio. Sometimes she works quite late and sleep in her studio. She has private bamboo stair placed at the garden ( 1st floor ) to the balcony ( 2nd floor ) in front of the house which is separate the guests stair in the house ( her own access separately the guests access ). Even her studio has the connection door to the kitchen and she would not like to bother our guests during their stay. Inside her studio still have the restroom and the pantry. That’s why she has her own private stair for using only herself. All inside her studio, the windows & door closed with the sticker & blind curtains which closed all the time which cannot see each others. 

She like to meet all of you and she can answer your questions when you needed. And she help me to explain all the house rules with all of you again, no have special or extra rules, just only our house is designed for eco friendly and take care environment.

4. This promotion is not provide fusion breakfast ( only light breakfast coffee/ tea, toast, snacks, fruits, drinking water, ......, etc. ) and provided the body soap & hair shampoo and body towels.

5. Maid daily cleaning every rooms and all house about 8:00 - 17:00.

6. Bedding & towels are changed every 7 days. If you want to change. Extra charge.
7. I have the washing machine & dryer for extra cost.

9. + ABSOLUTELY YES!! We offer you One Way FREE private Airport Transfer for up to 22 guests with fully luggage!

The driver awaitings for you at the Airport and you or your group will just have to find your name written on a signboard to get started.
Upon your booking confirmation, simply inform us the following flight details :
+ Flight number.
+ Arrival Time.
+ Airport name.
+ Number of guests.
+ English Name to on the sign board.
+ Your photo group/ some of your photo group.

We can then confirm the driver/ transportation company to pick up you from Suvanbhumi/ Don-Muang Airport to my house which starting of your Bangkok journey will be smooth as silk !

Remark : 
*** If you have the member of your group more than 16 people which Airbnb system does not support. Please send an inquiry and feel free to contact us on Airbnb. We can manage for you on Airbnb system. Our house can stay for 26 guests as your request with extra cost.

I always love to meet and welcome all of the guests by my personal.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: - 1. PLEASE HELP US TO SAVE THE ENVIRONMENT by reducing the use of electricity. TURN OFF AIR CON, LIGHTINGS/ REMOVE THE CARD WHEN YOU LEAVE THE ROOM. 2. Turn off air conditioning every time you leave a room. In a house this big, the utility bill gets expensive quickly. 3. Keep the air con no less than 25 degrees. Any less is terrifically expensive and inefficient. NOTE: I will check the electric meter before and after checkout. I've had guests keep the air con running in every room 24 hours a day, which is unacceptable. It's very expensive to cool a 5-hr house in the tropics! So please be responsible, otherwise I must charge extra for overuse. 4. No parties/ events and no one staying who have not booked in, Extra charge 500 baht per person per night. 5. No smoking indoors, but you may smoke on the balcony with an ashtray provided. Smoking is prohibited because we have lovely neighbors breach, Fine 2,000 baht/ room. I would prefer no smokers please.  6.Take your shoes off indoors. 7. Visually verify that the main gates are closed and locked! 8. Lost key room or card charge 2,000 THB/key/card. 9. I trust that if you come in late you will be as quiet as possible. 10. All information about your stay will be provided when you arrive, including a map of the area and info about my home. Just enjoy yourself when you come and stay with me. 11. Respectful each other. 12. Have fun, but be responsible. Loud parties will disturb the neighbors. Do not make noisy/ loud after 22:00.  13. Not allow to have the illegal drug inside home. 14. If furniture, appliances and home has been damaged. The guest must be an administrator and liability for damages incurred. 15. Please do not flush anything inside of the toilet ( this includes toilet paper, sanitary napkins, paper towels, or wipes ). Use garbage disposal instead. 16.No food or beverages in bedrooms (except water) to prevent insects and rodents! Keep screens and doors closed to keep out mosquitoes (for your protection)! 17.All decoration stuffs do not move included beds are fixed in rooms and mattresses should not be moved to other rooms - If the guests move its around and break or any damages stuff items will be charge. 18. Damage and Lost Charge; All items in room are set for your convenience. Any damage or lost items in the room such as Blood stain, Food stain, Vomit stain, Urine stain, Cosmetic stain OR Any stain will be charge at price; - Duvet Cover = 1,500 THB. - Bed Sheet = 500 THB.- ( white color ), 800 THB. ( color ) - Body Towel = 400 THB. - Hair Towel = 200 THB. - Pillow case = 200 THB. - Hair dryer = 1000 THB.

9. + ABSOLUTELY YES!! We offer you One Way FREE private Airport Transfer for up to 22 guests with fully luggage!

The driver awaitings for you at the Airport and you or your group will just have to find your name written on a signboard to get started.
Upon your booking confirmation, simply inform us the following flight details :
+ Flight number.
+ Arrival Time.
+ Airport name.
+ Number of guests.
+ English Name to on the sign board.
+ Your photo group/ some of your photo group.

We can then confirm the driver/ transportation company to pick up you from Suvanbhumi/ Don-Muang Airport to my house which starting of your Bangkok journey will be smooth as silk !

Remark : 
*** If you have the member of your group more than 16 people which Airbnb system does not support. Please send an inquiry and feel free to contact us on Airbnb. We can manage for you on Airbnb system. Our house can stay for 26 guests as your request with extra cost.
sectionedDescription/summary:
+ Our 2 townhouses will tell you my unique experiences as a shoemaker in a Chinese Thai family with the 10 bedrooms+10 bathrooms inspired from different experiences.Houses For 30 guests.
+ Free one way airport pick up, Mango Sticky Rice.
+ Daily cleaning.
+ A perfect retreat for couples, families with 2 townhouses, across small alley, not suitable for party.
+ Fully-Equipped Kitchen with appliances, basic supplies.
+ 3 Large Living Areas with TV, Cable TV.
+ Near city center, 5 mins walk to BTS.

sectionedDescription/description:
Here is the safe place to stay.

- Routinely disinfectant cleaner all frequently touched surfaces in the Penthouse, such as  countertops, and door handles.

- Rouinely disinfectant air spray.

- In house Doctor service :Checking  on  sign and symptom of Covid-19 or any present illness ,evaluated the risk, and keep watching if any health condition happen.

- 24 hour doctor on call service, you will have doctor service to the penthouse.

- Provide disposable wipes so that commonly used surfaces (for example, doorknobs, keyboards, remote controls, desks) can be wiped down before each use.
- Provide medical grade face mask to protect you from airborne infection.
- Provide antimicrobial antiseptic cleaner and sanitizing liquid, to clean your hand, prevent infection from contact.
- Full service ordering food , pick up, and bring it to you by our staff to avoid  contact.


Luxurious duplex Penthouse (2 stories Penthouse)
*You'll own the Entire Upper Floor,*

Exclusive Duplex Penthouse for rent located in the heart of Bangkok, 10 min walk to Prakanong BTS Station. Luxurious 250 sqm suite is on the 22nd floor (Rooftop), 50 sqm of private European sky garden which gives you panoramic stunning views of the city elegant and Bankajao River view. You'll feel like you're on top of the city. Fully interior decides, luxury furniture, private lounge, etc. unforgettable stay!

“Luxury Smart Duplex Penthouse"
There are 2 Floors, Upper and Lower Floor.

*You will own the Entire Upper Floor which is about 125 Sqm.*

250 SQ.M. of 2 stories on the 22nd floor of Condominium, corner unit at Sukhumvit Road, Bangkok.  
Perfect Views with Luxurious Interior design of European classical & Smart Modern Style of each floor.

On the Upper Floor:
is 2 en-suite bedrooms with mini theatre Living room connecting with Luxury fully kitchen, Rooftop sky garden and etc.

Fact Info: 
2 Bedrooms en-suit with private bath room
1 Fully Kitchen + 1 Dining room
1 Mini Theater Living room
1 Private Rooftop Garden + Pond

Below floor: Private loudge, dinner table indoor garden, working space with Projector and big Whiteboard with high speed wi-fi

Detail Info:

There is an extraordinarily private “Rooftop garden” a unique panoramic City views & River views.
 
The Smart home Wi-Fi, sound System & Airflow system that more than Comfortable & Functional. 

Fully furnished with the highest quality furniture, Posh Atelier which includes Theater set electric sofa bed, imported from Italy, Smart TV, 100 Inches touches widescreen. And many of exquisite attention to the Detail of Top Spec & Modern Electric Equipment.

Smart home Wi-Fi automatic, Lighting, motion sensor & Touch screen, Ceiling sound system surrounding stereo enjoy music while cooking, dinner, taking shower or Cozy chill in the rooftop garden.

It offers high ceilings and full floor-to-ceiling glass which allows beautiful natural light to enter and create a grand experience of estate living on top. Luxurious kitchen, centre island, marble floors and granite countertops, custom wood, stainless steel appliances and much more.

Whole entire top floor (2 bedrooms)

Staff will host our value guest.

Guest will meet our Lobby &  share entrance through our privacy lounge, dinner area and working space on the 22nd floor.

and then own whole 23rd floor where 2 ensuite bedrooms with fully kitchen and mini-theatre living room and private rooftop garden. 

Guest also can use our common area on 22nd floor.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
To ensure that you have a good stay, please feel free to communicate with us anytime. We willing to help.
*Apart from sky line view on top floor of our penthouse, private rooftop garden ,all guests can access to common area facilities namely swimming pool, sauna, gym room, table tennis, tennis/badminton court, basketball  court, mini golf patch, children playroom and playground, garden area of the property.
- The condo is located on floor 22, unit number 282.
- The pool is located on level 2A, the magnet key is needed to access the door.

*No Pet allowed

* CCTV in living room are at all-time disabling. We use it only for security purposes of activate fired alarm, nothing are in record or capture.

* Smoke is ONLY allowed in the private rooftop garden with ashtray provided
*Indoor smoking are restrictively NOT allowed, 5000 Bath will be charged if break this rule.
 Do not throw cigarettes on the floor, please use ashtray provided, if not Fine will apply.

*There are 2 bedrooms, 2 guess in each room. The total of 4 guess will be accept on this top floor. Extra guess will be charged at 10,000 / person /night.

* Taxi Service from/to Airport is available
(free/fee depending on promotion price), Please check with us

* Early check-in and late-check out are possible if available
(small fee might apply for urgent cleaning arrangement).

* Please keep the place clean.
Extra charges might apply if more time are needed from ordinary cleaning.

* Please keep voice down. Kindly speak or talk softly.
(Voice or music must keep down after 10.00PM)

 *No noisy party / illegal drug/ prohibit activities/

*Have nothing against Thai laws.

* Kindly do not throw anything in the toilet bowl, it will jam and cause unpleasant experience.

* Light cooking on the stove is available in your private kitchen. There is a microwave, oven, refrigerator, and dishwasher, all necessary catering you can use for light cooking or food warming.

* Use of washing machine is 140 baht per wash. Free for more than 1 week stay.

* Upon check-in, please kindly show your passport.

* Damage deposit of THB 10,000 per stay is not included.

* Loss of key card will cost 1,000 baht per key. So please take care.

*Never bring any decorating or any tools out, Penalty 10 times of each item.

*CCTV in Common area but switch off

*Please take responsibility when damage any stuffs and inform us 

*Please take off shoes and change slipper that we provide

* If you are travelling with a backpack, please let us know.

* Overnight parking fees may apply. Please check with us for detail.
