name: Lux 2 bed Best View & Location!
address: Khet Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 1PM
sectionedDescription/description:
Long-term only. 2 bedroom,  fantastic 270 degree views, end unit, high floor, dead central, next to Asoke BTS/Sukumvit MRT in one of Bangkok's most beautiful condos.  Sunrise/sunset view from this 2 bedroom spacious apartment.  All new furniture/appliances. Two new queen beds.  Floor to ceiling windows million dollar view from your bed. One of the nicest pools in Bangkok and well-fitted fitness facility with views. 2 min to MRT, 4 min BTS, most in A/C via MRT walk. Discounts for long term !!

Two bedrooms with queen beds - one with bedframe with traditional mattress, one with bedframe and high quality, comfortable, air mattress. Walk-out balcony on the 38th floor. All brand new appliances. Kitchen with two burner cooktop, exhaust fan, refrigerator, microwave, hot water kettle, laundry washing machine, expandable clothes drying rack on balcony.  High speed internet and new wide screen TV with soundbar. Bathroom with tub and Euro type showe head on a flexible shower hose.  Floor to ceiling windows throughout.  This apartment is perhaps the only one in this buidling on AirBnb that is a larger end unit with two bedrooms.  Most in Ashton Asoke are one bedroom and quite small at approximately 31 - 35 square meters.  Beware of wide-angle photos of the one bedrooms (better described as a studio) that give the impression of lots of space - believe me, I lived in one for 4 months and let's say they are "cozy".  Ashton Asoke is situated without any tall buildings close by which means excellent views and privacy from any room in the apartment.

Ground floor garden, expansive lobby, 35th floor gym/fitness with study work rooms and one of the most beautiful  salt water pools in Bangkok.  Rooftop gardens on the 48th and 50th floors with seating/tables but very quiet/rarely used.

Usually the hostess will be able to meet you upon your arrival with keycard  at the building and is available for any quesitons or assistance.  All coorindation regarding check-in must be communicated/discussed between you and the host/hostess a few days prior to your arrival.  In Bangkok support is usually available during your stay for anything you need.

Ultra central at BTS Asoke and MRT Sukhumvit at Terminal 21 halfway between Siam/MBK/Central World and Ekkamai BTS stations. Directly between Nana and Phrom Phong BTS stations.   A few minutes walk from a couple of Bangkok's most popular parks.  Located between Soi 21 and Soi 19 with entrances to both streets. 1 minute walk to  entrance to MRT station Sukhumvit and 3 additional minutes to BTS Asoke via an air conditioned underground "mall" connecting walkway (Starbucks, hair/beauty solons, currency exchange, various fast food)

Located at MRT Sukhumvit and BTS Asoke so easy to get anywhere in any weather.  On Sukhumvit 21 next to The Siam Society and Terminal 21.  Easy access to Soi 19 and directions west to Nana via private access door on property to short safe alley to Soi 19.  Close to Soi Cowboy if that floats your boat.

So close to both the  MRT (Sukhumvit Station) and  he Skytrain (Asoke Station).  Just a few steps and you can walk through an A/C'd  walkway ("Mall" - Starbucks, etc) to get to Terminal 21 and Asoke Skyway Station - only 4 to 5 minutes from the entrance to the Ashton Asoke!
sectionedDescription/houseRules: Smoking allowed only on balcony with balcony exterior window open.  Air conditioning (A/C) should be shut off for any periods when guests will be out of the apartment for more than one hour (A/C will cool down apartment very quickly when your return/when turned on). A/C shut off upon exit at end of your stay.  Please remove (most) trash from the apartment at the end of your stay.
sectionedDescription/interaction: Usually the hostess will be able to meet you upon your arrival with keycard  at the building and is available for any quesitons or assistance.  All coorindation regarding check-in must be communicated/discussed between you and the host/hostess a few days prior to your arrival.  In Bangkok support is usually available during your stay for anything you need.

name: Designer work Moroccan style 6  bedroom 4  bath
address: Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
欢迎🌵曼谷“绝色之城”4号别墅民宿🌵 别墅仿佛是一座跨越历史的宫殿，独特的风格带领您穿越数世纪的时光隧道，追寻优雅、神秘与梦想。墅内多处绝美的网红拍照📸打卡点，让来宾体验异域国度魅力。现代与传统的完美结合，散发着豪华与优雅。为了让您完全投入舒适写意之大境，绿茵围绕着泳池、亭外休闲区，更让您亲身体验韵味十足的绝色之城。🧿
[图片]

别墅位于素坤逸34巷 ，位于曼谷空提区的一个私密具有摩洛哥，风格别墅民宿。六卧、四卫、KTV、免费WiFi、洗衣机、烘干机、现代化厨房、专属停车位等功能区展示不凡面貌。更有一名专职保姆打造优品🏡环境卫生。附近是曼谷最繁华商业区，可以轻松前往购物中心、夜市、SKY BAR酒吧、RCA夜店一条街。从网红小吃到高档餐厅，再到红灯区，应有尽有。

六卧、四卫、KTV、免费WiFi、洗衣机、烘干机、现代化厨房、专属停车位等功能区展示不凡面貌。更有一名专职保姆打造优品🏡环境卫生。附近是曼谷最繁华商业区，可以轻松前往购物中心、夜市、SKY BAR酒吧、RCA夜店一条街。从网红小吃到高档餐厅，再到🏮区，应有尽有。

无论您是来旅游还是短期居住，我们都乐于与您分享曼谷的各种生活体验，希望您可以把我们这里当作您在曼谷的家一样～我们也一直在努力！

name: Sukhumvit 40 BTS Brand designer  Private pool
address: Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
🌳曼谷X5别墅🌳
                     ---XIANG豪华系泰国民宿
  🏡天鹅绒、锦缎、水晶等郁郁葱葱的选材以及与众不同的配色构成了自由、毫无保留的宇宙。复古、优雅、精致、奢华，如梦如幻，夜晚泳池旁、庭院间、鸡蛋花树下萤火虫灯星光点点，爱和梦的实体呈现。

5卧4卫，私家豪华游泳池，宽敞庭院，超大卧室，家庭房，享受空调、百寸电视、洗衣机、烘干机、WiFi、蓝牙音响等现代设施。烤箱、冰箱设备齐全的中央厨房里展示您的厨艺。更有一名专职保姆打造优品🏡环境卫生。

私人园林庭院里打卡拍摄精美照片，在泳池畅游，享受阳光和清爽的空气。三个免费专属停车库停放您的私家车，方便您随时出行。不仅如此，别墅位于素坤逸地区，是曼谷最繁华商业区，您可以轻松前往附近的购物中心、夜市、SKY BAR酒吧、RCA夜店一条街。从网红小吃到高档餐厅，再到🏮区，应有尽有。

无论您是来旅游还是短期居住，我们都乐于与您分享曼谷的各种生活体验，希望您可以把我们这里当作您在曼谷的家一样～我们也一直在努力！

在您确认定定房后，我们会提供中文、英文English客服服务！有任何问题随时与我们联系～

Feel free to contact with me when you need any support~

name: 4 bedrooms Luxury Colonial Style Apartment
address: Khet Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is flexible and check out by 1PM
sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome to our spacious and luxurious 4-bedroom colonial-style apartment in the heart of Bangkok! Perfectly situated in a vibrant and bustling neighborhood, our apartment is the ideal base for exploring all that this amazing city has to offer.

With its elegant colonial architecture and beautifully appointed interiors, our apartment is the perfect blend of old-world charm and modern comfort. You'll love the spacious living areas, with their high ceilings, polished hardwood floors, and comfortable seating. The bedrooms are equally impressive, with plush bedding, ample storage space, and plenty of natural light.

Our apartment also features a fully equipped kitchen, perfect for whipping up your favorite meals, as well as a large dining area where you can enjoy them with friends and family. And if you need to stay connected, we've got you covered with high-speed Wi-Fi and a large flat-screen smart TV.

But perhaps the best thing about our apartment is its location. Situated in the heart of Bangkok's bustling city center, you'll be just steps away from some of the best restaurants, bars, and shops in the city. And when you want to explore further afield, the city's excellent public transport system makes it easy to get around.

So whether you're here for business or pleasure, our 4-bedroom colonial-style apartment is the perfect base for your stay in Bangkok. Book now and experience the best that this amazing city has to offer!

Less than 4 minutes walk from Ploenchit BTS station

sectionedDescription/description:
If you are looking for a nice hotel located right in the heart of Bangkok’s shopping paradise that is just a 10-minute walk from either Airport Rail Link or BTS Skytrain Station, Vince hotel is your absolute choice.

How can you experience the true Bangkok flair unless you visit Pratunam, one of the most vibrant, bustling neighborhood in Bangkok. While Pratunam is packed with dozens of hotels, Vince is not just another hotel here where you just check in and sleep. It’s a stylishly hybrid hotel boasting a uniquely innovative interior and charming decor. ‘Fun’, ‘easy’, and ‘style’ are what you will experience while staying here.
Behind the stunningly modern facade, inside is a classical-looking hotel with a contemporary edge. It’s like classic and modern design languages in dialog. A warm Siamese welcome awaits your arrival. The minute you arrive, you know you are somewhere where you can be yourself, kick back and relax. Let our professional, friendly staff attend to your desires. Here at Vince, you can always expect new twists.

- Private Room with inside toilet
- Queen bed
- Air conditioner
- Hot Shower separate with toilet
- Dressing table with half body mirror
- Hair Dryer
- Kettle
- In room safe
- Open wore drop and cloth hanker
- Shampoo, Hand wash, Shower Gel and body lotion are provide on refill bottle
- Drinking water, Tea, coffee set are provided 1 time on arrival date

..

..

..

- Cleaning service 300 THB / time (included all linen changed)
- Breakfast 220 THB net / pax for buffet breakfast (advance purchase at front desk to get this rate)
- Set of amenities (included toothbrush, comb, razor, shower cab, sanitary bag, cotton bud) will be charge 100 THB
- Drinking water set pack  2 bottles will be charge 60 THB
- Extra bed with full bedding faciliteis will be charge 600 THB
- Extra towel, bathmat, Bathrobe will be charge 100 THB / Pcs. (1 time pay no charge)
- Extra Pillow, blanket, bedsheet is 200 THB / pcs. ( 1 time pay no charge)

name: Luxury Pool Villa w/ Jacuzzi + Lift in Thonglor
address: Watthana, Bangkok, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 4PM and check out by 10AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Our spacious 5 bedroom 6.5 Bathroom luxury villa is more than a home; it's an embodiment of a lavish lifestyle that few experience. The careful attention to detail, desired central location, and the exquisite state-of-the-art amenties create a symphony of modern luxury that's beyond compare. 

Two Private pools, jacuzzi and lift inside. 

Don't just imagine the pinnacle of urban living – live it, in this extraordinary villa designed to exceed your expectations in Bangkok.

*Enquire for dates*

Upon entering, guests are greeted by soaring ceilings that accentuate the sense of openness and sophistication throughout the home. Designed for lavish living and entertaining, the villa features five bedrooms and six bathrooms, offering ample accommodation for residents and guests alike. 

The centerpiece of this magnificent abode is undoubtedly the private jacuzzi and two swimming pools, where residents can indulge in leisurely swims or bask in the tropical sun amidst the lush green surroundings. Whether hosting glamorous soirées, a family friendly BBQ, or enjoying quiet moments of relaxation, the pools provide the perfect backdrop for memorable experiences with all state-of-the-art amenities for your perusal. 

Parking is never a concern with spaces for 5-10 cars. Additionally, a maid's room with two bedrooms is available (only 5 bedrooms are officially advertised), catering to the needs of household staff and ensuring seamless maintenance of the villa. 

Private lift inside the home no need to use the stairs. 

Modern architecture combined with nature’s greenery and premium interiors provide the ultimate must-try experience. 

In summary, this private modern pool villa in the heart of Thailand's vibrant city offers a rare blend of luxury, comfort, and convenience. From its spacious interiors and resort-style amenities to its prime location and proximity to amenities, this villa embodies the epitome of upscale urban living. Discerning individuals seeking an unparalleled lifestyle experience need look no further than this exquisite retreat in Ekkamai Villa.

*Message privately for available dates*

Conveniently next to a huge Don Don Donki Mall (Large 24/7 supermarket that has everything), close to BTS station, local and branded shops - massage parlour, food, stalls and fashion etc. Nearby the busy night life and major tourist attractions.

- Additional TWO maid bedrooms available  (not advertised)
- Free Parking for 5-10 cars
- Nearby Huge Don Don Donki Mall 
- BTS Station close by
- Many branded shops, party, tourist attractions near home
- Weekly maintenance of private swimming pool, jacuzzi and plants
- Security: Gated villa
- Extra mattresses can be provided


- Private Pool
- Bath Tubs
- Jacuzzi
- Smart TVs
- SuperSpeed Wi-Fi
- 24hrs self-check-in
- Excellent service, concierge and local tour guide
- Airport transfer can be arranged
- Wheelchair friendly
- Family friendly

Here at your service!

Private lift inside the home no need to use the stairs. 

Modern architecture combined with nature’s greenery and premium interiors provide the ultimate must-try experience. 

In summary, this private modern pool villa in the heart of Thailand's vibrant city offers a rare blend of luxury, comfort, and convenience. From its spacious interiors and resort-style amenities to its prime location and proximity to amenities, this villa embodies the epitome of upscale urban living. Discerning individuals seeking an unparalleled lifestyle experience need look no further than this exquisite retreat in Ekkamai Villa.

*Message privately for available dates*
sectionedDescription/summary:
Our spacious 5 bedroom 6.5 Bathroom luxury villa is more than a home; it's an embodiment of a lavish lifestyle that few experience. The careful attention to detail, desired central location, and the exquisite state-of-the-art amenties create a symphony of modern luxury that's beyond compare. 

Two Private pools, jacuzzi and lift inside. 

Don't just imagine the pinnacle of urban living – live it, in this extraordinary villa designed to exceed your expectations in Bangkok.

*Enquire for dates*

sectionedDescription/description:

Ocean world, Galaxy, Sailing Boat, Alice in wonderland etc. along with a salt water outdoor swimming pool and fitness service that is available throughout the day.” Highlight; Jacuzzi Bathtub in each room.

Our villa has 14 rooms in total maximum for 30 people. Each room has unique art wall paintings. 

There’s Elevator; convenient for your luggages (our staff will be there to help at check-out & check-in)

4 room types;

1. Superior Double Room ( 35 Square meters)

• Ocean World (Spa Bathtub)
• Galaxy  (Spa Bathtub)
• Sailing Boat  (Spa Bathtub)
• Alice in Wonderland  (Spa Bathtub)

2. Superior Triple Room ( for 3 persons ) 1 king size bed & 1 single bed - shower

• Thai style 
• Country Style

3. Deluxe Double Room ( 40 square meters)

• For-rest Room (Balcony & Shower)
• Antique style (Balcony & Shower)
• Modern style no. 1 (Spa Bathtub)
• Modern style no. 2 (Spa Bathtub)
• Red Carpet (Spa Bathtub)
• Roman Style (Spa Bathtub)

4. Family Room ( connected rooms)
• Vintage style (Spa Bathtub)
• North-pole  (Spa Bathtub)

Salt water outdoor swimming pool private only for your group

Fitness room (Second floor)

BBQ grill by the pool ( We provide free of charge) 

Space on the balcony by the pool.

During your stay my staff will be there helping you with all the luggages while checking in and out, getting a cab, booking massage, ordering food etc.

Right beside our property is a fine thai cuisine restaurant with Karaoke.

Tennis Court - (2 mins walk)

Our villa has a parking lot which accommodates upto 20 vehicles

2-3 minutes walking distance from the property to MRT Sri-Bearing (very convenient for you to travel to any places in BKK city)

• Erawan Museum (3 headed elephant architecture)

• Airport Pickup (additional charge)

name: 7 bedrooms with shared kitchen near Thonglor BTS
address: Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
The Matta Bangkok is located in the heart of most prestige’s area. A quiet space in contrast to the nearby bustling Sukhumvit area.
10 minutes’ walk from/ to Thonglor BTS station , Shuttle Service is available.
Each room provides luxury and full amenities to comfort all guest featuring 55 "Smart TV, Safe box, Bluetooth speaker, coffee maker, pantry with full equipment. A rain shower, and bathtub with private garden view also comes with fresh amenities, a hair dryer, bathrobe .

Exquisite Fusion of Unique Design and Modern Functionality

Elevate your experience at our establishment where the perfect blend of distinctive design and contemporary functionality awaits you. Each of our 7 meticulously crafted rooms is a testament to both impeccable aesthetics and seamless practicality. 

Within each room, a curated selection of designer furnishings awaits. From the distinguished Warren planter lounge chair to the opulent Genuine Nappa leather Sofa/lounge chair, every piece exudes sophistication. Entertainment is redefined with a 55-inch Smart TV, while the ambient illumination is perfected by a brass pendant lamp. Your security is paramount, with a safe box at your disposal, and music is elevated through the integrated Bluetooth speaker.

Indulge in ultimate comfort with our sumptuous bedding ensemble, comprising an 800 TC Egyptian cotton sheet set and a choice of two pillow types – firm and soft. The unrivaled support of a 5-zone pocket spring bed ensures restful nights like never before.

Our 7-bedroom accommodations are equipped with spacious kitchens, replete with comprehensive amenities for your culinary pursuits. From filtered water to a refrigerator, kettle, microwave-oven, and coffee machine, every need is anticipated and met.

For our esteemed long-stay patrons, we extend the courtesy of towel changes every 3 days and fresh bed sheets every 5 days, ensuring a consistently pleasant and hygienic stay. Your comfort is our commitment.

you can message me here

The matta is located in the heart of Bangkok, sukhumvit 36, located only 550 m from Thonglor BTS station. 
Near many famous restaurants spa and salon..

name: 泰式古典风格  绝美泳池 四房六卫 米其林餐厅
address: Khet Bang Na, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
🌴曼谷“香印”2号Bangna别墅🌴
                                      
    900㎡的曼谷豪华别墅，光与多面积阴翳形成的私家庭院，拥有超大中央泳池，在水中尽情畅游。景观设计别具匠心，热带植物、波光粼粼的海洋系美陈装置、偶尔垂落的鸡蛋花，营造出自然浪漫的氛围。🏡是拍照打卡的绝佳点，无论是阳光下、泳池边，还是夜晚的灯光下，都能拍出高颜值的美

    🏡有4间卧室，可以轻松容纳8-10人入住。舒适的大床、空调，让您享受安静私密的休息空间。5个独立卫生间都有干湿分离的淋浴间和洗漱用品，主卧的冲浪双人浴缸让人充满遐想。

配备豪华现代的娱乐设施，度过难忘的泰兰德美好时光。在矩阵音响KTV唱心声，在台球室挑战技巧。也可在夜色下的巨幕泳池影院观看电影，在游戏机中体验刺激游戏。此外，提供免费WiFi、中央厨房、洗衣机、烘干机等便利设备，让您感受到尊享服务。

其位于bangna商业中心附近，距离市区只需十几分钟车程，交通便利。步行50m泰味餐厅绽放舌尖味蕾、多个便利超市和夜市等，均可满足您的需求。

name: 曼谷 波光 橘色海 X7 THiNkIing villa 五卧
address: Khet Phra Khanong, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
sectionedDescription/interaction: 让我们为您打造一段令人难忘的Thailand 奢华隐世感体验吧。期待着为您提供无与伦比的服务，并让您的曼谷之行成为美好的回忆。
sectionedDescription/name: 曼谷 波光 橘色海 X7 THiNkIing villa 五卧
sectionedDescription/space: 5卧4卫，可容纳10人入住，设有家庭房。享受空调、洗衣机、烘干机、WiFi、蓝牙音响等现代设施；烤箱、冰箱设备齐全的中、西厨房；专属停车区停放您的私家车；配备一名专职保姆打造优品🏡环境卫生。
sectionedDescription/summary:
梦境藏海🌊几度/夕阳🌇遍照曼谷
        日落跌进星海✨
        留给不昧旅人的着迷😍
        极致魅惑的欢喜💋
       当一扇16M枢轴大门开启，呈现给您的是私藏度假天堂。这里有波光粼粼的瀑布大泳池，闪耀着万象光芒；看不尽的星海，椰林环绕的城池；现代美学设计，客厅320°落地玻璃窗，3米长的北极熊网红沙发会给您带来一丝清凉，松鼠🐿️清晨随时到访；阳台为落日公路露营🏕️地，实现您未完成的度假梦想；在别墅内还有金色海浪风动空中酒Sky  Lounge Bar，200寸I MAX投影幕布，矩阵式BMB KTV可以和您的朋友尽情歌唱；花式台球案伴着🍷以球会友，以球传情；星级酒店标准床品拥JIA人入梦乡～万千块乐高积木增添童趣的色彩，在打卡墙前拍摄📸靓丽照片，美爆pyq～

name: 高端大平层3卧3卫公寓，高层270 °俯瞰曼谷湄南河景，近iconsiam 水门寺大佛
address: Khet Khlong San, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
高端公寓位于座落在泰国的母亲河湄南河边上，270度河景房，公寓正对面是曼谷的最奢华的五星级嘉佩乐酒店和四季酒店以及公寓。公寓距离泰国最奢华的商场ICONSIAM  1.5公里。距离初次来曼谷的必打卡景点大皇宫6.6公里。距离著名景点唐人街5.6公里，公寓的河对岸就是曼谷著名的摩天夜市Asiatique 。属于优质的学区房，河对岸就是曼谷舒兹伯利国际学校。如果你担心曼谷交通拥堵，你可以到楼下乘坐公寓的专船短短几分钟即可到达轻轨口，在堵城曼谷实现“丝滑”到站的感觉。公寓楼下也有不少米其林老字号小吃店。交通便利，一下楼便是大马路，有24小时门卫看守。电梯独户到家让你更是感受到满满的高级安全感。41楼俯瞰曼谷市，总面积140+平米，三房三卫。

iconsiam，Asiatique，Chao Phraya River
sectionedDescription/name: 高端大平层3卧3卫公寓，高层270 °俯瞰曼谷湄南河景，近iconsiam 水门寺大佛
sectionedDescription/neighborhoodOvervie: iconsiam，Asiatique，Chao Phraya River
sectionedDescription/summary: 高端公寓位于座落在泰国的母亲河湄南河边上，270度河景房，公寓正对面是曼谷的最奢华的五星级嘉佩乐酒店和四季酒店以及公寓。公寓距离泰国最奢华的商场ICONSIAM  1.5公里。距离初次来曼谷的必打卡景点大皇宫6.6公里。距离著名景点唐人街5.6公里，公寓的河对岸就是曼谷著名的摩天夜市Asiatique 。属于优质的学区房，河对岸就是曼谷舒兹伯利国际学校。如果你担心曼谷交通拥堵，你可以到楼下乘坐公寓的专船短短几分钟即可到达轻轨口，在堵城曼谷实现“丝滑”到站的感觉。公寓楼下也有不少米其林老字号小吃店。交通便利，一下楼便是大马路，有24小时门卫看守。电梯独户到家让你更是感受到满满的高级安全感。41楼俯瞰曼谷市，总面积140+平米，三房三卫。

name: Thong Lo Luxury Pool Villa In Center Of Bangkok
address: Khet Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
This newly renovated pool villa is conveniently located in the center of Bangkok, offering easy access to all of the local attractions. You'll be just a short distance from restaurants, cafe's, shopping, supermarkets, hospitals and entertainment options, and the sky train for easy travel. You'll appreciate having everything you need right at your fingertips. The property is newly renovated and very spacious with a private pool and a fully equipped kitchen. Perfect for families and small parties.

Welcome to your luxurious private pool villa in the center of Bangkok! This stunning retreat, is located next to shopping, restaurant and nightlife venues, is the perfect getaway for those seeking a tranquil and indulgent stay in this bustling city.

To ensure a worry-free stay, please note that a ฿30,000 security deposit is required upon arrival. This deposit will be refunded at the end of your stay, provided there are no damages to the villa.

Additionally, we offer the convenience of a cleaning service for an extra fee. While this service is optional, we highly recommend it to maintain the pristine condition of the villa. If you opt not to avail yourself of the cleaning service, kindly ensure the villa is left in the same condition as you found it upon arrival. Failure to do so may result in a ฿3000 cleaning fee. Your comfort and satisfaction are our top priorities, and we hope you enjoy your time in our beautiful space!

THE VILLA

Step inside and be greeted by a spacious and tastefully decorated living area, complete with comfortable seating. Relax and enjoy the state-of-the-art entertainment system. The fully equipped kitchen is a chef's dream, boasting top-of-the-line appliances and everything you need to whip up a gourmet meal.

As you make your way through the villa, you'll find pristine bathrooms, each with their own unique charm and luxurious amenities. Sink into the oversized jacuzzi spa bathtub or indulge in experience of the rainfall shower, and let your worries melt away.

But the real highlight of this villa is undoubtedly your private pool. Take a dip in the crystal-clear purified water, lounge on the comfortable sun beds, or sip on a refreshing cocktail as you soak up the sun.  When it’s time for a break from the sun, retreat you your cushioned poolside cabana and let the cooling breeze of the tropical fan wash over you.

Cleaner 

During your stay, we offer cleaning services throughout the villa, and our cleaner can make up your rooms for an additional fee if you desire.

STANDARD FACILITIES
- Shampoo,
- Shower gel
- Towels
- Hair dryer
- Stereo
- Smart TV
- Hangers
- Iron
- Washing machine
- Full kitchen

FEATURES & AMENITIES
- Fully equipped kitchen
- Formal dining area with seating for 8
- Espresso machine
- Dishwasher
- Ice maker
- Satellite television
- Smart TV (with streaming services)
- Office space
- Iron/Ironing board
- Washer/Dryer
- Air conditioning
- Wi-Fi

LOCATION
- Cafe (1 minute walk)
- 7 11 (3 minute walk)
- Restaurants (5 minute walk)
- Grocery Store (5 minute walk) 
- Sky Train (5 minute drive)

HOSPITALS
- Samitivej Hospital (10 minute drive) 
- Bangkok Hospital (10 minute drive) 
- Bumrungrad Hospital (20 minute drive) 

Located in the center of Bangkok, this villa is just steps away from the city's most popular attractions, shopping, and dining destinations. But with its serene setting and luxurious amenities, you may never want to leave!

Book your stay now and experience the ultimate in luxury and relaxation at our modern private pool villa in Bangkok.

name: 2BR Suites with ABF · 2BR Suites with ABF · 2BR Su
address: Pathumwan, Bangkok, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 2PM - 11PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Live large and feel more at home with a 66 sqm suite space. Enjoy a master king room, that feature a luxurious king-sized bed and an en-suite master bath. The second bedroom offers a twin-bed with full bath. The separate living room includes a dining area with a dining table and chairs and a fully equipped kitchenette with a washer cum dryer. Most of the suites feature a private balcony. For your comfort and convenience, the Two Bedroom Suite also features a 40-inch LED flat screen TV satellite

A 7-minute walk from Ploenchit BTS Skytrain Station or by Tuk-Tuk shuttle service, Arcadia Suites is on Soi Nai Lert. It offers contemporary accommodations with free Wi-Fi, 32” LED Flat Screen TV, en suite bathroom, a separate living area and a fully-equipped kitchenette with refrigerator, microwave and washing machine. A 10-minute drive to Central Chidlom Department Store and All Seasons Place, with a wealth of dining and entertainment spots nearby.

The Bodega restaurant is situated on the second floor, offers a wide range of scrumptious a la carte choices for our guests ranging from international dishes to local favourites. You can choose between the cosy indoor dining with air-conditioned comfort or poolside dining where you can lounge by the soothing water and the trees. If you are looking for more privacy, we also offer room service.
OPENING HOURS
6:00 am - 10:30 pm

Featuring 73 elegantly designed suites with essential modern amenities, a free wireless internet connection, an en-suite bathroom and a fully equipped kitchenette. The hotel boasts  a beautiful restaurant and swimming pool. A perfect choice for both long and short stay travelers, our guests will be under the care of our friendly and professional staff who will ensure that you feel like at home.

A perfect choice for both long and short stay travelers, our guests will be under the care of our friendly and professional staff who will ensure that you feel like at home. Close to Phloenchit BTS and Central Embassy are only a 2 minutes walking distance.

It is easy to connect with BTS sky Train at Ploenchit Station, We also do have  shuttle bus service for free for our guests during staying with us.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
The maximum number of children allowed in existing beds is dependent on the room you choose. Please check your selected room for the maximum capacity.

There is no capacity for cots in the room.
There is no capacity for extra beds in the room.
Pets are not allowed.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Please inform Arcadia Suites Ploenchit Sukhumvit by Compass Hospitality in advance of your expected arrival time.

name: Serene Family Home BTS Ari
address: Khet Phaya Thai, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Spacious and tastefully designed 4 bedroom, 3.5 bathroom detached home with separate maid unit. 10 MIN WALK TO BTS ARI! Boasting 300sqm of living space equipped with a large chef's kitchen, kids play area, relaxing plunge pool and so much more! Vibrant family friendly neighborhood with amazing restaurants, unique cafes and artistic venues. All while being only 15 minutes away by train to Siam, Central World, Chatuchuk Weekend Market, Phaya Thai Airport Link. Perfect for big groups and families!

The entire property is for guest use! Keys to home are in combo lockbox located just outside of the front gate. Driveway parking can be accessed by using the switch inside the gate.

We are available 24/7 to answer any questions or troubleshoot any issues you may have while staying at our home. Please always feel free to contact us through the app anytime :)
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
NO LOUD PARTIES. We are a residential neighborhood with quiet time after 10pm. Please be considerate of neighbors. Thank you!

Please take off your shoes before entering the house. 

Smoking inside the house is strictly prohibited. 

No pets allowed, unless specifically allowed by host. 

No glassware by the pool please. There are plastic cups in the kitchen for your convenience. 

Upon check-out, please leave any dishes or cups in sink or dishwasher and put towels in laundry baskets.

Do not dispose of food in the sink. 

Dishwasher requires powdered detergent located in front of machine. Use 1 tsp per wash. 

Please refrain from flushing toilet paper. Use waste baskets provided. 

Turn off A/C and lights when leaving the house. 

Return "Set 1" house keys to combo box. Remember to return any garage/gate keys before leaving. 


**NO SMOKING IN HOME**
Smoking can be done outside only. There are balconies in every room and plenty of outdoor space. Please do not smoke inside! 
**SMOKING INDOORS WILL RESULT IN 5,000 BAHT FINE.**

***NO SHOES INSIDE THE HOUSE***

**CHECK IN - 15:00 / 3:00PM**

**CHECKOUT - 11:00AM**
Please be respectful of our check out times as we need 4 hours to clean the house thoroughly for our next guests! If you need a late check out or to leave luggage at the home, please ask us and we will try our best to accommodate! 
**LATE CHECK OUT WITHOUT PERMISSION WILL RESULT IN 3,000 BAHT FINE.**

**DO NOT FLUSH PAPER OR ANY TRASH IN TOILETS**

**GARBAGE IS TAKEN EVERY NIGHT**
There is garbage service every night at our home. Place tied-trash bags in bins outside of gate for daily service. 

**NO PARTIES OR LOUD NOISE AFTER 10PM**
We are located in a residential neighborhood. Please be respectful of our neighbors with noise at night. Thank you!
sectionedDescription/interaction: We are available 24/7 to answer any questions or troubleshoot any issues you may have while staying at our home. Please always feel free to contact us through the app anytime :)

TO DO NEARBY
Place to eat 
-Doi Chaang coffee shop & restaurant, Fast Internet 3min walk, 08:00-19:00
-Terminal21, food court have very cheap all most all kind of Thai food, Vegetarian food, Mango Sticky rice, and many more, 10:00-22:00
-Terminal21, a lot of very good restaurant Ex. MK, Baan Ying, 10:00-22:00
-Robinson, food court 10:00-22:00 and one of Thai food shop in food court open, 24h.
-Foodland, Thai and Western food, 24h.
-Cabbages & Condoms Restaurant, famous Thai restaurant with very nice Thai style atmosphere, 11:00-23:00
-Many street food on Sukumvit12, daytime
-Vegan restaurant name May Veggie Home: 12 min walk, 11:00-22:00
-In between Sukhumvit 1 to Sukhumvit 11 have many Indian Restaurants
Malls Near by 
-Terminal21: 9 min walk, 10:00-22:00
-Robinson: 6 min walk, 10:00-22:00
Supermarkets

-Gourmet supermarket (Terminal21) 10:00-22:00
-Villa Market (Sukhumvit 11) 07:00-00:00
-Foodland supermarket (Sukhumvit 16 and Sukhumvit 5), 24h.
Night market
-On Sukhumvit street between Sukhumvit 1 to Sukhumvit 17
Fresh market

1)Bedroom detail
- Room name DN room
- Private Bedroom

- Twin bed
- Max 2 people

2)	About this building 
-9min walk from BTS/MRT "Asoke"
-Quiet area in the middle of city
-you need to clear your own massy
-Every bedroom has air-conditioner, door lock & keys
- We do not offer a swimming pool! There is a swimming pool, but it is old, a bit dirty sometimes and it has broken tile with a sharp edge. You can use it on YOUR OWN RISK, but don’t complain afterwards! :)


3)	Why we need 5 stars:
-Airbnb punishes us very badly if we get lower than 4.8 stars on average in any of the categories.
We try to inform you about all the bad things about us as good as we can. If you still would like to stay with us and, please give us 5 starts when you give the rating. Or don’t rate and let us know your criticism in a private massage. We will try our best to improve.
-We believe that we offer a place that is worth its money. We hope that we can continue to make a lot of people happy with a cheap place in a fantastic location.

4)	Address
-We are in ‘Sukhumvit 12 Alley’, 5 min walk from Sukhumvit Rd.

sectionedDescription/houseRules:
Rules

FORBIDDEN
Check out late & Party and/or noise after 10pm & Smoke indoor & No Visitors Allowed.
all of this are 'FORBIDDEN'
Forbidden FEE 5000 THB and move out right the way
NOTE: If you fail to check out by 11am, We will remove your belongings & you will incur a 5000THB fee.
Breaking any rules will cost you money
======================================

CONSIDERATION OF OTHER GUESTS
No house parties, be mindful of noise, keep spaces tidy (free of smells and mess) especially common areas.
Please don't make other guests awkward or feel unsafe, especially as noise can travel through the divided rooms.
Please keep noise to a minimum after 10PM especially when moving around the unit.
Clean your own dishes as soon as you finished using them, and keep the place clean and tidy
Complaints from other guests, excessive mess or broken items not reported may lead to a loss of your deposit or a 5000THB fee. or more if needed. 

Any missing thing will cost 10 times its price.

Keep the place and your bedroom clean.
If you leave the place or/and your bedroom unclean 
You will pay cleaning fee extra 300-1000THB or more if necessary
Ex. Blood (period) on the bed we will starts extra cleaning fee from 300THB

No allow you to let other people who don’t have the apartment key card come in to the flat,
If that people just walk after you try to get in to the flat, please don’t let He/She/Them in. 
Just close the door and let that person use they own key card open the door by them self 

Everyone who book this place accept to open the door by they own key card 
======================================

RESTRICTIONS
No Pets Allowed
No Early Check-in
No Late checkout (Maid has limited opportunity to clean space)
No Sleeping in shared space
No moving of furniture specially on the balconies
No Party
No Allow to have visitor
No Allow to leave personal stuff in common area
Smoking only outdoors on the balcony with the door closed.
Child-friendly but be mindful not to make a mess and noise to not disturb the other guests.
The keys need to be put in the “Check-Out Key Box” and the keys cannot be given to another guest directly.

If you forget your key in the bedroom or the apartment you need to ask maid to open the door for you: 100 THB during the day (9am - 7pm) 500 THB during the night (7pm-9am) Pay cash before she opens the room for you.
Losing key card fee 500: THB
Losing bedroom key fee: 300 THB
Guest Copy key is forbidden
If you give the keys to another guest directly: 3,000THB fee
======================================

ILLEGAL ACTIVITIES
No prostitution (including escort service)
No drugs (Including consumption of any illegal substance)
No illegal activity (including trading or exchange of restricted goods)

PENALTY: Any illicit services or illegal activity will be reported to the authority without toleration, the contract will be terminated effective immediately without a refund.
======================================

You allow us to cancel your booking anytime, if you don’t send us your copy passport to our email and if you have been give us bad review and/or lower than 5star rating, after this cancelation you agreed to not give review.

Thank you very much for the understanding
Best Regards, Alissa

sectionedDescription/name: 曼谷“波光.橘色海”X7别墅
sectionedDescription/summary:
🏡梦境藏海🌊几度/夕阳🌇遍照曼谷
        日落跌进星海✨
        留给不昧旅人的着迷😍
        极致魅惑的欢喜💋
       当一扇16M枢轴大门开启，呈现给您的是私藏度假天堂。这里有波光粼粼的瀑布大泳池，闪耀着万象光芒；看不尽的星海，椰林环绕的城池；现代美学设计，客厅320°落地玻璃窗，3米长的北极熊网红沙发会给您带来一丝清凉，松鼠🐿️清晨随时到访；阳台为落日公路露营🏕️地，实现您未完成的度假梦想；在别墅内还有金色海浪风动空中酒Sky  Lounge Bar，200寸I MAX投影幕布，矩阵式BMB KTV可以和您的朋友尽情歌唱；花式台球案伴着🍷以球会友，以球传情；星级酒店标准床品拥JIA人入梦乡～万千块乐高积木增添童趣的色彩，在打卡墙前拍摄📸靓丽照片，美爆pyq～

sectionedDescription/description:
Located in the best area of Bangkok, few minute walk to famous shopping malls (MBK, and Siam Center), dining and entertainment places. Only 5 minute walk from BTS Ratchathewi station (about 500 m.). Unlike other hostels in big cities, our dorm rooms are very spacious, quiet and clean, perfect for rest and relaxation after your long day.

Description:
By walking (10-15 minute walk);
•Shopping centers: MBK, Siam Center, Siam Square, Siam Paragon, Central World.
•Cultural heritage: Jim Thomson Museum, Erawan Shine, Bangkok Art and Cultural Center.
•Old-town sceneries: Baan Krua Community that used to be the origin of Thai silk made for Jim Thompson, Saen Saeb waterside Community.

By BTS skytrain (only 5 minute walk from the hostel to BTS skytrain);
•World-renowned weekend and night markets: Chatuchak market and Patpong market.

By boat taxis (only 10-minute walk from the hostel to boat pier);
•Old city: Rattanakosin island, Grand Palace, Wat Phra Kaew, Thanon Khao San, (Khao San Road)

Enjoy your stay with our facilities; vending washing and dryer machines, refreshments and snack bar (24 hrs), hot and cold water dispenser, TV, free internet and WIFI, shared bathroom and toilet. 

Room's facilities:
• Free WIFI access
• Personal locker (except Private room)
• Electronic keycard access
• Air-conditioning
• Single bed
• Towels (hire)
• Personal locker
• Personal reading light
• Personal electronic socket
• Bathroom amenities
• Drinking water
• Personal electronic outlet
• Shared bathrooms with hair dryer
• Laundry area
• Free Internet and WIFI

Our office hour is 7:00 am – 10:00 pm. 

If you want to check-in after our office hour, please inform us in advance.

sectionedDescription/description:
If you are looking for a nice hotel located right in the heart of Bangkok’s shopping paradise that is just a 10-minute walk from either Airport Rail Link or BTS Skytrain Station, Vince hotel is your absolute choice.

How can you experience the true Bangkok flair unless you visit Pratunam, one of the most vibrant, bustling neighborhood in Bangkok. While Pratunam is packed with dozens of hotels, Vince is not just another hotel here where you just check in and sleep. It’s a stylishly hybrid hotel boasting a uniquely innovative interior and charming decor. ‘Fun’, ‘easy’, and ‘style’ are what you will experience while staying here.
Behind the stunningly modern facade, inside is a classical-looking hotel with a contemporary edge. It’s like classic and modern design languages in dialog. A warm Siamese welcome awaits your arrival. The minute you arrive, you know you are somewhere where you can be yourself, kick back and relax. Let our professional, friendly staff attend to your desires. Here at Vince, you can always expect new twists.

- Private Room with inside toilet
- Twin bed
- Air conditioner
- Hot Shower separate with toilet
- Dressing table with half body mirror
- Hair Dryer
- Kettle
- In room safe
- Open wore drop and cloth hanker
- Shampoo, Hand wash, Shower Gel and body lotion are provide on refill bottle
- Drinking water, Tea, coffee set are provided 1 time on arrival date

..

Pratunam Market

..

- Cleaning service 300 THB / time (included all linen changed)
- Breakfast 220 THB net / pax for buffet breakfast (advance purchase at front desk to get this rate)
- Set of amenities (included toothbrush, comb, razor, shower cab, sanitary bag, cotton bud) will be charge 100 THB
- Drinking water set pack  2 bottles will be charge 60 THB
- Extra bed with full bedding faciliteis will be charge 600 THB
- Extra towel, bathmat, Bathrobe will be charge 100 THB / Pcs. (1 time pay no charge)
- Extra Pillow, blanket, bedsheet is 200 THB / pcs. ( 1 time pay no charge)

sectionedDescription/description:
Including daily cleaning 

This 120 sqm sumptuous Two-Bedroom Suite offers two spacious bedrooms and an expansive living space - this accommodation type is ideal for families. One of the bedrooms features a King-size bed, the other a queen-size bed or twin-double (whichever you prefer).

The residences are located are located in a five-star luxury hotel in Lumphini, downtown Bangkok. The hotel offers all the expected amenities: restaurant, gym and rooftop pool.

Bolstered by hardwood, marble flooring, premium furnishings and superior amenities the Two-Bedroom Suite is richly appointed and fully equipped for business or leisure.

Guests enjoy complete access to the entire Family Suite and all of its facilities and amenities:
- Fully-equipped kitchen
- Washer/dryer
- Custom mattresses
- PC connection point
- Hardwood & Marble flooring
- Personal safe
- Fully stocked minibar
- LED Television
- Radio
- Tea/coffee facilities
- Swimming pool on 4th floor
- 2 bathrooms
- Individual air-conditioning.
- Guest toilet
- Personal Wine Fridge & Minibars
- Safety box is available in the master bedroom
- Tea & coffee making facilities
- TV and DVD player
- WiFi Internet
- Butler service
- Full marble bathroom
- Separate glass-enclosed shower
- Double-sink vanity
- Telephone

Should you have any additional questions or requests before booking or during your stay, please do not hesitate to reach out to me!

Due to the perfect location of this accommodation, the following points of interest are within easy reach:

Shopping:
- Central Embassy (800m), 
- Central Chidlom (1.0km), 
- Siam Paragon (2.2km)

Hospitals:
- BNH Hospital (3.6km), 
- Bumrungrad Hospital (2.6km)

Parks:
- Lumpini Park (500m)

Transport:
- Ploenchit BTS Station (600m), 
- Chit Lom BTS Station (1.0 km)

The following services are included in the rates:
- Local newspaper
- Evening turndown
- Complimentary wireless Internet access
- Daily housekeeping
- Shuttle Service to Central Embassy and Nearby Hospitals

The following services can be provided upon request at additional charges:
- International newspaper

name: 【曼谷市区700平网红高端奢华五房泳池别墅】中文房东旅行路线规划
address: Khet Bang Sue, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
曼谷市区700平高端奢华泳池别墅，别墅配有私家泳池，客厅全自动遥控落地窗，周边7-11，Big C大型超市，步行5分钟至地铁口，也是集美宿，娱乐，会议，轰趴，烹饪为特色的多样式别墅之一

房型概要
别墅共有五间卧室，最多可入住12人
每间卧室都舒适的双人床
*纯棉柔软的四件套
*每间卧室两条浴巾
*吹风机
*洗发水
*沐浴露
*全自动智能马桶
*二楼两间主卧有舒适的泡澡浴缸

设施齐全的厨房
*锅具碗筷
*冰箱
*配有洗洁精
*热水壶
*电饭煲
*烤箱
*电磁炉
*煤气灶
*烧烤炉

客厅有可容纳10以上的大餐桌

房源内配有洗衣机和免费的无线网覆盖，整个房源都是中央空调，给您最佳的入住体验

★安全保障★
房源外装有24小时监控设施

可提供一站式接车旅行路线规划服务，配有中英文双语管家

所有床品均一客一换，入住期间如需保洁请提前联系我们，需付费

步行就可以走到大型商超Big C，地铁站，7便利店，加油站等等交通非常方便，附近开车到20分钟车程可以去到大皇宫，暹罗广场，廊曼机场等等景点，非常适合家庭出游或者朋友聚会活动

name: Clean Check-in My Hostel (Private 4 beds)
address: Ratchathewi, Bangkok, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in time is 2PM - 10PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Located in the best area of Bangkok, few minute walk to famous shopping malls (MBK, and Siam Center), dining and entertainment places. Only 5 minute walk from BTS Ratchathewi station (about 500 m.). Unlike other hostels in big cities, our dorm rooms are very spacious, quiet and clean, perfect for rest and relaxation after your long day.

Description:
By walking (10-15 minute walk);
•Shopping centers: MBK, Siam Center, Siam Square, Siam Paragon, Central World.
•Cultural heritage: Jim Thomson Museum, Erawan Shine, Bangkok Art and Cultural Center.
•Old-town sceneries: Baan Krua Community that used to be the origin of Thai silk made for Jim Thompson, Saen Saeb waterside Community.

By BTS skytrain (only 5 minute walk from the hostel to BTS skytrain);
•World-renowned weekend and night markets: Chatuchak market and Patpong market.

By boat taxis (only 10-minute walk from the hostel to boat pier);
•Old city: Rattanakosin island, Grand Palace, Wat Phra Kaew, Thanon Khao San, (Khao San Road)

Enjoy your stay with our facilities; vending washing and dryer machines, refreshments and snack bar (24 hrs), hot and cold water dispenser, TV, free internet and WIFI, shared bathroom and toilet. 

Room's facilities:
• Free WIFI access
• Personal locker (except Private room)
• Electronic keycard access
• Air-conditioning
• Single bed
• Towels (hire)
• Personal locker
• Personal reading light
• Personal electronic socket
• Bathroom amenities
• Drinking water
• Personal electronic outlet
• Shared bathrooms with hair dryer
• Laundry area
• Free Internet and WIFI

Our office hour is 7:00 am – 10:00 pm. 

If you want to check-in after our office hour, please inform us in advance.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
- Not suitable for children (2-12 years)
- No pets allowed
- No smoking allowed
- No parties and events allowed
sectionedDescription/interaction:
Our office hour is 7:00 am – 10:00 pm. 

If you want to check-in after our office hour, please inform us in advance.
sectionedDescription/name: Clean Check-in My Hostel (Private 4 beds)

name: Punntara Botanic Home Grand Villa ‘Wang’
address: Tambon Bang Kachao, Chang Wat Samut Prakan, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in time is 12PM (noon) - 11PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Escape to a serene haven along the enchanting Chao Phraya River with our charming villa, perfect for family getaways. Embrace the tranquility of nature as you unwind amidst lush surroundings. With the convenience of being a mere 5-minute walk from the port, embark on a stay of life time which allows peace tranquility away from Bangkok but a mere river crossing distance to Bangkok.

2006 Time magazine called Bangkachao the best urban oasis of Asia.

🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴 
Punntara Botanic Home offers an exquisite retreat with three grand villas, each boasting four spacious rooms. Nestled by the edge of the illustrious Chao Phraya River, these villas epitomize luxury living amidst nature's splendor. Among its unique features is a magnificent boat house, gracefully resting on the tranquil surface of a serene pond, adding an element of charm and tranquility to the estate. Alongside these opulent accommodations, guests enjoy a range of amenities, including breakfast and catering options suitable for various occasions, from professional gatherings to casual get-togethers. Additionally, our property provides kayaking opportunities for guests, allowing them to embark on tranquil journeys along the majestic river, immersing themselves in the breathtaking natural beauty that surrounds Punntara Botanic Home. For those seeking relaxation and recreation, each villa is equipped with its own private pool, providing the perfect oasis to unwind and rejuvenate amidst the lush surroundings.
🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴

Our facilities
☑ Spacious private pool
☑ Beautiful Nature feel
☑ 3 bedrooms with ensuit bathrooms
☑ 1 Boat House with ensuit bathroom
☑ Sunbed by the pool
☑ Free Parking space
☑ High speed Wi-Fi
☑ Fridges

Guests at Punntara Botanic Home can easily reach our attentive staff for assistance or inquiries via Airbnb messaging or direct communication channels.

NO PETS
We would like to inform you that pets are not allowed inside the property.

NO PARTY
We value our neighbours and local communities as much as we value our guests. To ensure that everyone enjoys a peaceful and pleasant stay, we have a NO PARTY policy. However we do allow for gathering for events. We seek for more quiet time after 9pm to allow for other guest to have a relaxing time. We hope you understand and enjoy your stay at our villa while being mindful of others around you.

BREAKFAST
We want to inform you that we do provide breakfast, but there is an extra charge of 200 Baht per person. 

CATERING SERVICE
We offer catering services for events which you hold on the VILLA. Please reach out to us for more information. 

EXTRA BED
We do offer extra bed on the property but it will be subject to availability and there is a cost of 700 baht per person.

EARLY CHECK-IN 
Basic Rules
Standard Check-in : 14:00
Standard Check-out : 11:00

If you want to check - in early, please follow our policy below.

Early Check In
Early check-in is subject to the availability of the room, If there’s no other guest in the morning of your check-in day, we may be able to speed up your check-in time for free. 

Please inform us at least 12 hours prior the time you want to do early check in, otherwise we can't accommodate your early check in.

LATE CHECK-IN
Yes, you can. We will inform you of the location of the villa keys and how to access the villa. Please let us know your arrival time in advance, and more importantly, please take note of the address details that we gave you upon confirming your reservation, it will help you to find the accommodation easily.

LEAVING LUGGAGE POLICY
• Check-in: Unfortunately, storing luggage prior to the standard check-in time is not permitted.
• Check-out: We're unable to offer luggage storage post check-out due to check-out policy.

LATE CHECK-OUT
Please be informed that our check-out time is at 12 noon. Late check-out is subject to availability and might involve an extra charge as well.

NO WEEDS ALLOWED. 
We do not allow smoking of weeds in our Villa for safety reasons. 

NO SMOKING 
We do not allowed smoking in all rooms. 

KEY CARD
If you misplace the key card there is a replacement fee of 500 Baht.

name: Private Residence in Sukhumvit
address: Khet Ratchathewi, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
Private living in Sukhumvit. This place provides homey stay in a convenient location with great facilities.

Our location is next to Makkasan airport link. We also provide free shuttle to BTS Nana. 

Our 2-storey residence provides 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 powder room, maid's room (which you can use it as your storage space too). Guests have free access to great common facilities - swimming pool, fitness and sky lounge.
sectionedDescription/name: Private Residence in Sukhumvit
sectionedDescription/summary:
Private living in Sukhumvit. This place provides homey stay in a convenient location with great facilities.

Our location is next to Makkasan airport link. We also provide free shuttle to BTS Nana. 

Our 2-storey residence provides 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 powder room, maid's room (which you can use it as your storage space too). Guests have free access to great common facilities - swimming pool, fitness and sky lounge.

sectionedDescription/description:
来到曼谷素坤逸地区的豪华民宿——皇家宫廷别墅！
位置请在搜索 Baan Sukjai

民宿坐落于曼谷素坤逸地区的心脏地带，为您提供了一个奢华舒适的度假体验。度假或者是商务出差，这个拥有3间卧室、3间卫生间和3个车库的别墅都能满足您的需求。

四卧三卫两厅，户外游泳池。民宿坐落于曼谷素坤逸地区的心脏地带，为您提供了一个奢华舒适的度假体验。度假或者是商务出差，这个拥有3间卧室、3间卫生间和3个车库的别墅都能满足您的需求。
大厅精致的雕刻细节营造出宫廷的氛围，让您仿佛置身于皇家殿堂之中。室内装饰以暖色调为主，充满温暖和舒适感。厨房设备一应俱全，您可以尽情发挥您的烹饪技巧。

别墅外的庭院是一个放松和娱乐的理想场所。您可以在奢华的户外区域打卡拍照，或者在泳池畅游，尽情享受阳光和清新的空气。让您和家人或朋友共度美好时光。

此外，别墅还提供了充足的停车空间，方便您随时停放您的私家车辆。
除了别墅本身的豪华设施，曼谷素坤逸地区也是曼谷最繁华的商业区，您可以前往附近的商场和夜市，或者skybar 以及泰国最著名的夜店一条街RCA.从街头小吃到高级餐厅，再到夜店，红灯区全部近在咫尺。

无论您是追求浪漫之旅还是商务考察，皇家宫廷别墅都是您在泰国曼谷地区的完美选择。预订您的住宿，让我们为您打造一段令人难忘的奢华体验。我们期待着为您提供无与伦比的服务，并让您的曼谷之行成为一段美好的回忆。

距离BTS ekkmai 400米

name: 72+ ppl stay in siam hostel in middle of bangkok
address: Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Not safe or suitable for children (0-12) and pets
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Renting place for 72 (contact us for more guests) at Siam Stadium Hostel. Each person will get their own bed with towel, locker, and water. We have curtain and working space. 

Who are we? 
We are family run hostel locates in the heart of Bangkok. Only 3 mins walk to sky train station National Stadium, near by convenience store, MBK Shopping mall,  24-hours gym, local street food.

Share space (Common room) is opened 24 hours.

For more information visit our website: https://siamstadium.com/en/

26.5 sqm room. 4FT bed size with personal lockers & work space

Guest will have access to their own room, bathroom, small kitchen, laundry area, common area and outside terrace

Staff will be there to help you 24 hours.

Surrounded by famous restaurant such as local Thai restaurant, Jamie's burger, and Somboon seafood. Across from us is Tesco Lotus, a big super market where you can go sim card and groceries. Next to us are Thai message that opened until 22.00 p.m. and National Sport Stadium where you can run, swim, and play other sport activities.

We are closed to BTS National Stadium (Skytrain), easy access to other location by car, taxi, bike, bus and tuktuk. Although guests  can simply walk to many famous attractions in Bangkok. We can help you find a service car for a reasonable price and guide you through your travel plan. Parking space is available for 100 Baht per night.

Living in the hostel means that you have to share your space with others, therefore we required guest to follow our rules such as no noise after 23:00pm for the peaceful environment.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: We offer house cleaning service daily, additional cleaning request is possible. No serious cooking, we do provide refrigerator and microwave; many local foods and big restaurants and be found with in 5 minutes walk also we are located next to 24 hrs convenience store. Quite time after 23:00. Please always bring key card with you. Do not disturb other guests. Smoking is permitted outside the building.

name: 火车夜市Central Plaza全新一居室公寓1BR免税店RCA免费泳池健身房高速WIFI D26
address: Khet Huai Khwang, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
This is my cozy 1 bedroom. This apartment has several facilities such as kitchen, washing machine, and internet access with WIFI. There is a pool & gym that you can access for free (6 am to 10 pm). There are also a coffee shop, Thai restaurants, Japanese restaurant, supermarket (7-Eleven), massage shop, and laundry shop, respectively.

The room size is 42 sq.m. There is 1 Bedroom with the best view included a fridge, microwave, TV, air-con, swimming pool, fitness and etc. The condominium is not far from Show DC shopping mall, RCA, MRT Rama 9 (subway), Central Plaza Grand Rama 9, Esplanade Ratchada, Fortune Town (IT mall), Local Night Market. We’re sure that you would enjoy and very happy to live with us.

Swimming pool, Infinity Fitness, Garden, Thai restaurant, Japanese restaurant, Coffee shop, Salon, Massage shop, 7/11 store 24/7, Laundry and Pharmacy.

My apartment is located in Khet Huai Khwang, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand.
It's very lively neighborhood. Great area for shopping, dining out and having fun. With Central Plaza, Fortune Town (IT mall) and Esplanade, Show DC Mall, Big C very close by or about 10-15 min walk. RCA only 5 min walk, with a good variety of bars, restaurants, and clubs. There is Thai street food all around is Rama 9 soi 7, only 5 min walk. Every weekend there is a market close by called the Train market and located behind The Esplanade shopping mall. It's an antique & retro Thai hipster market, not on the beaten tourist path. I highly recommend folks to check it out. it's open every Thursday -Sunday from 6:00 - 0:00.

Easy access to airport only 25 minutes taxi ride. Its a 10-15 min walk to MRT station Phra Rama 9. There is a scheduled shuttle a few times an hour from the condo as well as it's easy to take a motorbike taxi to the station. From Rama 9 its only 2 stations to Sukhumvit. Being near a train station in Bangkok is key.

name: Exclusive Pool Villa in Prime Thonglor
address: Khet Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 9PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
This stylish unique 400m2 pool mansion is a genuine green oasis nestled away amidst the hustle and bustle of the prime Thonglor area. Conveniently located near BTS, with a private pool/jacuzzi in a lush garden, a perfect place to spend your vacation.

The ultimate urban accommodation is this luxury 400m2 4 bedroom pool villa with a lush garden, large living and dining room and a fully equipped  kitchen,  located in the heart of one of Bangkok's most prestigious neighborhood which is the prime Thonglor area.

1. Swimming pool
2. Parking space for 1 car
3. Roof top garden

Owner can assist with recommendations anytime during stay if necessary.

Located in the heart of the vibrant City of Angels, the villa is a peaceful escape where you can enjoy the luxury of a home with  a private pool and a roof top garden. Very quiet neighborhood surrounded by small shopping malls, boutiques, massage and spa, hospitals, supermarkets, cafes and all the best restaurants in Bangkok ranging from street food to fine cuisine.

An ideal location, 10 minutes walk to BTS Thonglor Station which will take you to any part of Bangkok, such as the Siam Discovery, Siam Square, Paragon, Central World, Central Embassy, Silom, Marboonkrong, the Sunday Market etc...Taxis and motorcycles also available.

1. If you plan to organize events, please inform us first. A minimum 3 day stay is required.
2. We can organize in house chef with cooking demonstration for private functions. Please check price and availability.
3. The 4th bedroom with a single bed does not have airconditionner. Can be used for maid's or driver's room.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
1.Being a family home, we have a no smoking policy (although you are welcome to smoke either out on the balcony or in the garden)
2.Please turn off lights and the A/C when not in use or leaving the house. Also leaving windows and doors open with A/C on, or setting the temperature at the minimum or below 21 degrees will not help to cool any faster. This will cause the compressors to overload. It may take days to get fixed and will cause a lot of inconvenience and discomfort for your stay. As we are in a hot country,  we ask that you keep the temperature between 21-24 degrees for your comfort.
3. We have a no shoes policy inside our home to ensure we keep the floor squeaky clean for our guests, . This is also a Thai custom.
4.Check-in is at 3pm, and checkout is by 11am. Arriving slightly earlier, or want that extra hour to sleep? Should be fine, but please check with us first.
5.Whilst we do a thorough professional cleaning between each guest stay, we kindly ask that prior to leaving, you clean and put away any dishes or kitchenware used and put any dirty towels in the hamper. It helps us get through our cleaning process quicker and allows us to keep cleaning costs down for you and future guests.
6.Please keep the rooms condition same as check-in condition for full security deposit refund.
7.The easiest way to disrupt an enjoyable stay is a plumbing problem. To prevent this, we kindly ask you to please place sanitary napkins and toilet paper in the sanitary bin we’ve provided in the bathroom, and please do not put waste food in the kitchen sink.
8.What you do in your personal time is entirely up to you, but when staying at our place we have a strict no drug use policy. This is just the law… not so much one of our rules.
9.We understand that accidents happen. But we do ask that you please let us know when they do. Chances are we can fix them as effortlessly as possible which also means better chances of having your full security deposit returned too.
10.If you’re coming to Bangkok to party you’ve picked a great city to do so. Unfortunately, just not at our place. Though we’re sure it won’t come to it, serious complaints of unruly behavior will unfortunately result in you being asked to leave. 
11.For security reasons, we do not allow outside guests or any strangers to come over or use any of our facilities. Any undeclared guests will be charged 5,000 Baht per guest and we reserve the right to cancel the reservation with no refund. There are surveillance cameras in the common areas.
12.Doors and windows left open will welcome blood-seeking mosquitoes in. Front gates should also be locked when you leave the house to avoid any mishap.
13.Lost of key will be charged 500 Baht, key card 1,000 Baht, magnet key 5,000 Baht.
14.Any non returned items, such as towels, slippers, hair dryer, cutlery, other decorative items will be deducted from the security deposit.
15. For less than 1 week stay, we provide each guest with one set of towels and bed linens. Please hang your towels to dry.
16. The pool is closed at 9 pm.
17. For long term stay, electricity bill should not exceed 200 USD per month, or 7 USD per day. Any excess usage of electricity will be charged back to the guest. 
18. All guests must provide a photocopy of their ID's. 
19.If the house rules are not respected, we reserve the right to cancel the reservation without penalty.

name: 2BR - PRIME 11 Condo ✰Sukhumvit  11
address: Bangkok, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
New in Town! 

“A PRIME high-rise condominium on AIR BnB — Bangkok.”
═══════════════════════════════════════

Travelling can become a wonderful journey if you... find a great LOCATION and connect with travel-savvy PEOPLE. 
____________ 
SOME/THINGS — I am proud to offer you :

✰ A breathtaking view of the Bangkok skyline,
✰ An optimal location in the heart of Sukhumvit, on one of the best Sois (streets) of Bangkok,
✰ Accessibility : 3-minutes walk from SkyTrain [Nana]    
✰ Two bedrooms, both with comfortable beds (one King-size and another Queen-size) and a bathroom each, 
  ✰ A minimalistic-decorated living room with TV, 
✰ A built-in kitchen with fridge, microwave, cooking utensils, dishes, and cutlery,
✰ A stylish dining space between the living room and the kitchen,
✰  Unlimited Wi-Fi, 
✰ Fitness, resort-style pool with panoramic view, and sauna,
____________ 
SOME/THINGS — You will be happy, if you pick me!

 •  Many tourist attractions accessible by SkyTrain,

• Organizers of exciting tours right on the doorstep,

 • Restaurants, lounges, bars including the coolest Bangkok spots such as: • Bed Supperclub  • Long Table  • Q-Bar  • Levels • Above 11, among others, all within walking distance,

• Spas, massages, and beauty salons available nearby, on the Soi and in the neighbourhood. 

____________ 
I will be happy to share tips with you on what to do and see, where to eat and shop, and make other recommendations should you need them, or leave you to explore on your own… either way. You can always contact me!

Have a wonderful day.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
"Mi Casa, your Casa! Please treat with love, respect and responsibility.”

a)	Language: You can address to me in English or Spanish.

b)	There is a key deposit of 500 baht upon check-in, and returnable at check-out. I will also require a copy of your passport, preferably scanned and emailed to me before you arrive. This is merely for security issue and rest assured that I will keep all information confidential. Your passport copies will be deleted from my system 1 week after check out.

c)	You will be required to indicate a time of arrival upon confirmation of reservation and to provide contact details, if any.

d)	Please be considerate to your neighbors this is a living space and not suitable for loud late-night parties... Most of your neighbors have to work 8-5.

e)	As is customary in Thailand, no shoes are to be worn inside private residences. As such I would kindly ask guests to take off their shoes and keep them inside behind the door whilst in the unit. I do provide domestic slippers in the room. Please feel free to use them.

f)	Please, no smoking or open flames including candles anywhere in the apartment. Smoking is allowed only on the balcony with the balcony door shut. 
  
g)	Save the planet: Please turn off the Air Conditioning Units and all electrical devices when not in use. (Very important)

h)	The tenant is responsible for the cleanliness of the property during the letting period. You can request a cleaning service during the time of your stay, should you need it, at the cost of 500 THB cleaning. The cleaning lady would also take care of the laundry.

i)	Kitchen area and all kitchen services are available.

j)	If keys are lost tenant should tell at the reception, lost key will be charged from the tenant.

k)	Tenant should not keep trash, garbage and any spoiled things in the room, should throw away to the garbage container.

l)	On check-out, please leave the keys inside the room and keep the front door "locked"  

m)	 Please try to leave the room as you first saw it.

n)	The tenant also needs to apply proper care to the furniture and equipments. Any loss or damage of items and to the property will be charged according to the actual costs of replacement.

✰ Accessibility : 3-minutes walk from SkyTrain [Nana]    
✰ Two bedrooms, both with comfortable beds (one King-size and another Queen-size) and a bathroom each, 
  ✰ A minimalistic-decorated living room with TV, 
✰ A built-in kitchen with fridge, microwave, cooking utensils, dishes, and cutlery,
✰ A stylish dining space between the living room and the kitchen,
✰  Unlimited Wi-Fi, 
✰ Fitness, resort-style pool with panoramic view, and sauna,
____________ 
SOME/THINGS — You will be happy, if you pick me!

 •  Many tourist attractions accessible by SkyTrain,

• Organizers of exciting tours right on the doorstep,

 • Restaurants, lounges, bars including the coolest Bangkok spots such as: • Bed Supperclub  • Long Table  • Q-Bar  • Levels • Above 11, among others, all within walking distance,

• Spas, massages, and beauty salons available nearby, on the Soi and in the neighbourhood. 

____________ 
I will be happy to share tips with you on what to do and see, where to eat and shop, and make other recommendations should you need them, or leave you to explore on your own… either way. You can always contact me!

Have a wonderful day.

name: 火车夜市Central Plaza全新一居室公寓1BR免税店RCA免费泳池健身房高速WIFI D14
address: Khet Huai Khwang, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
这间小家有一间独立卧室和独立客厅,这样游玩一天回来可以让您得到充分安静的休息｡卫生间提供柔软舒适的毛巾及浴巾,浴室准备好了品牌的洗发水及浴液,请放心使用哦｡牙刷牙膏我们响应曼谷政府关于海洋环保的号召,并没有提供,希望您自备心爱的牙具｡这里距离如今大热的拉差达火车夜市直线距离1200米(夜市的网红酸排骨强烈推荐一试,但不喜欢辣的朋友可以不打卡了,喜欢的要有排长队的准备哦)这里还是曼谷新CDB核心,最近的景点是RCA,几分钟车程｡去往四面佛､考山路､王权免税店､唐人街､暹罗广场都是十几分钟车程,去往素万那普机场20分钟,去往廊曼机场30分钟,去往大皇宫30分钟:)

游泳池位于8楼,玻璃屋健身房及儿童游乐屋也在同一楼层,配有沐浴间及卫生间,带好浴巾即可｡公共洗衣机及烘干机在一楼 (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) 铢),停车场也在这一层｡小区内有7-11便利店,还可以用 (Hidden by Airbnb) 支付哦｡还有曼谷汇率最好的钱庄,在A栋门外底商｡小区底商还有一家手法非常好但价格极其实惠的按摩店,里面的大妈们都很热情｡小区内还有干洗店､咖啡厅､西餐厅､泰餐店､小食店､ATM｡

车程10分钟可到Lama 9商圈的最大购物中Central Plaza,Lama 9地铁站(MRT线)也在此｡也可到著名的火车夜市､Big C大型综合超市｡小区北门马路对面,有一个当地人跑步休闲的湖景公园,黄昏的时候去景色十分迷人｡湖里有成群的超大鱼,可以在旁边的买到喂鱼的饲料,也可以自己带一些面包｡湖边还有漂亮的慢跑跑道,早晚喜欢运动的您可以去放松一下｡这里还有曼谷著名的RCA,出门即是｡步行5分钟有一家非常好吃的自助烤肉,大众点评搜索King Kong Yakiniku Buffet ,每人人民币不到100块,肉质不要太好!

从机场抵达公寓,打车大约200~300铢左右,看是否会堵车｡所以我比较建议直接在国内淘宝或是 (Hidden by Airbnb) 这类网站预约用车,不仅有中文举牌接机,价格也合适,一口价不计时｡
小区提供有偿班车接驳往返至Lama9地铁站(车程时间10分钟左右),单程每人15铢｡具体时间参考大堂发车时间表,基本每小时都有｡上车地点在小区的711便利店门口,车身上写有大大的TC Green的银色商务车即是,如果天气热记得去里面等哦~~~
如果接驳车时间不合适,您可以让公寓大堂的前台帮您叫计程车,只需在凉爽的大堂稍等片刻,出租车司机会开进小区来接您｡
如果您想体验曼谷特色的摩托计程车,小区北门就有,您只需朝北门马路对面的摩托骑手们招手示意即可,通常到Lama9地铁站每人20-30铢(车程5分钟左右)｡请放心这边穿橘色马甲的摩托车都是政府登记在案的,非常安全｡

夜间22:00之后请您和您的家人朋友稍稍放低音量,我们共同维护一个安静美好的休息环境｡非常感谢您的理解和配合!

address: Khet Ratchathewi, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand

sectionedDescription/description:
If you are looking for a nice hotel located right in the heart of Bangkok’s shopping paradise that is just a 10-minute walk from either Airport Rail Link or BTS Skytrain Station, Vince hotel is your absolute choice.

How can you experience the true Bangkok flair unless you visit Pratunam, one of the most vibrant, bustling neighborhood in Bangkok. While Pratunam is packed with dozens of hotels, Vince is not just another hotel here where you just check in and sleep. It’s a stylishly hybrid hotel boasting a uniquely innovative interior and charming decor. ‘Fun’, ‘easy’, and ‘style’ are what you will experience while staying here.
Behind the stunningly modern facade, inside is a classical-looking hotel with a contemporary edge. It’s like classic and modern design languages in dialog. A warm Siamese welcome awaits your arrival. The minute you arrive, you know you are somewhere where you can be yourself, kick back and relax. Let our professional, friendly staff attend to your desires. Here at Vince, you can always expect new twists.

- Private Room with inside toilet
- Queen bed
- Air conditioner
- Hot Shower separate with toilet
- Dressing table with half body mirror
- Hair Dryer
- Kettle
- In room safe
- Open wore drop and cloth hanker
- Shampoo, Hand wash, Shower Gel and body lotion are provide on refill bottle
- Drinking water, Tea, coffee set are provided 1 time on arrival date

...

...

...

- Cleaning service 300 THB / time (included all linen changed)
- Breakfast 220 THB net / pax for buffet breakfast (advance purchase at front desk to get this rate)
- Set of amenities (included toothbrush, comb, razor, shower cab, sanitary bag, cotton bud) will be charge 100 THB
- Drinking water set pack  2 bottles will be charge 60 THB
- Extra bed with full bedding faciliteis will be charge 600 THB
- Extra towel, bathmat, Bathrobe will be charge 100 THB / Pcs. (1 time pay no charge)
- Extra Pillow, blanket, bedsheet is 200 THB / pcs. ( 1 time pay no charge)

The Two-Bedroom Premier is designed to maximise space for two bedrooms, two bathrooms and separate living and dining areas. These comfortable luxury apartments come at 100sqm, and will comfortably accommodate up to 4 guests.

name: 曼谷摩洛哥风格之绝色之城
address: Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
位于曼谷空提区的一个私密具有摩洛哥风格别墅民宿。六卧、四卫、KTV、免费WiFi、洗衣机、烘干机、现代化厨房、专属停车位等功能区展示不凡面貌。更有一名专职保姆打造优品环境卫生。附近是曼谷最繁华商业区，可以轻松前往购物中心、夜市、SKY BAR酒吧、RCA夜店一条街。从网红小吃到高档餐厅，应有尽有。
      别墅仿佛是一座跨越历史的宫殿，独特的风格带领您穿越数世纪的时光隧道，追寻优雅、神秘与梦想。墅内多处绝美的网红拍照打卡点，让来宾体验异域国度魅力。现代与传统的完美结合，散发着豪华与优雅。为了让您完全投入舒适写意之大境，绿茵围绕着泳池、亭外休闲区，更让您亲身体验韵味十足的绝色之城。

Super Big Private Pool Villa located on Ramkamhaeng rd. Soi 14 alley. The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place.

The rate starts at 30,000 Thb per night for 14 bedrooms rental on the 1st and 2nd floor.

The whole building can reach its maximum capacity at 26 Bedrooms when combined 3 floors altogether, and the price would be at 45,000 Thb per night.

* All bedrooms have their own private bathroom

name: Loft Style 2-bedroom Duplex 145sqm
address: Bangkok, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 2PM - 12AM (midnight) and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
This 2 bedroom Grand Duplex is stylishly decorated and surrounded by floor-to-ceiling windows that provide dramatic views across Bangkok's glittering skyline. The luxurious suites feature two bedrooms with king size beds, a large living room with a dining area where guests can relax and unwind, and a study area. The bathroom has a separate shower and bathtub fully equipped with luxurious Bvlgari bath and body products.

Our duplex suite is all about rest and relaxation and is a place where guests can rediscover the pleasures of sleeping late and indulging in special soundproof rooms, this coupled with top quality beds, a wide choice of pillows and environmentally-friendly bed linen ensure optimum comfort.

Guests enjoy complete access to the entire duplex and all of its amenities and facilities:
- 2 bedrooms
- 2 ensuite bathrooms 
- All rooms feature Air Conditioning
- Livingroom
- Dining area
- Safety box is available in the master bedroom
- Tea & coffee making facilities
- TV 
- WiFi Internet

Guests also enjoy access to the 5-star hotel amenities:
- Pool area 
- Fitness area 
- Restaurant
- Lounge

Should you have any additional questions or requests before booking or during your stay, please do not hesitate to reach out to me!

Due to its perfect location, the followings points of interest are within easy reach:
- Siam Discovery (0.5 Km / 6 min walk)
- Siam Center (0.5 Km / 6 min walk)
- Siam Paragon (0.6 Km / 8 min walk)
- Pantip Plaza IT Mall (0.6 Km / 8 min walk)
- Skytrain-station Ratchathewi 0,1 km
- Museum Jim Thompson House 0,4 km
- Bangkok Art & Culture Centre 0,5 km
- Madame Tussauds Bangkok 0,5 km
- Siam Center 0,5 km
- National Stadium BTS Skytrain Station 0,5 km
- KidZania Bangkok 0,6 km
- Pantip Plaza 0,6 km
- Winkelcentrum Siam Paragon 0,6 km
- Skytrain-station Siam 0,6 km
- Central Embassy 1,7 km
- BTS-Sala Daeng 2,5 km
- Tempel Wat Saket 2,7 km
- Skytrain-station Asok 3,5 km
- Soi Cowboy 3,6 km
- BTS-Saphan Taksin 4 km
- Bangkok City Pillar 4,1 km
- Koninklijk Paleis van Bangkok (Grand Palace) 4,3 km
- Tempel Wat Arun 4,7 km

We also provide complimentary Tuk Tuk service (one way), daily service from 9 AM to 7 PM right at the doorsteps of shopping centres and a short ride will take you to the shopping areas that have made Bangkok such a favoured destination, including MBK, Siam Paragon, Siam Center, Siam Discovery and Central World.

...we have multi-lingual staff, including Chinese speaking, are available as well...

The pool is open daily from 07:00 – 22:00 hours. The rooftop pool is ideal for a morning water workout, to work on your tan while you sip your favourite beverage, or just people watch.

As day turns to night, relax on the comfortable deck loungers with spectacular views of the city.

Spa service is available upon request and we have a fitness club for your convenience + lounge/bar etc.

name: 曼谷繁花S1别墅Fantasy Villa泰国民宿
address: Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12AM (midnight)
sectionedDescription/name: 曼谷繁花S1别墅Fantasy Villa泰国民宿
sectionedDescription/summary: 位于曼谷市中心素坤逸49巷的翠澜繁花秘境大宅，可容纳18人尽享尊贵时光。宽敞庭院，百平米花海摇曳生姿，一层一天地，散发着泰兰德独有的芬芳。“会呼吸的泳池”簇拥茂密的热带雨林🌴-私密、深邃而迷人；KTV采纳隔音全包，配备美国JBL专业矩阵音响与激光摇头灯为客人打造震撼的视听盛宴，让曼谷之夜璀璨夺目。一层公区两处，均近百平的空间巧妙平衡了功能商务会客与娱乐休闲区，全屋高定款法国罗奇堡家私。雪茄品鉴区、台球、餐区等区域大面积拼色撞色，带来全新视觉体验。多处打卡📷区-“维多利亚的秘密”秀场翅膀、中空8米西瓜红配色背景墙作为视觉焦点，增加打卡属性，瞬间燃爆🔥朋友圈。

name: 泰国皇家园林豪华别墅  曼谷繁华商业区  私家豪华泳池 欢迎入住
address: Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
体验曼谷的奢华与活力，入住皇家新泰式园林别墅
位于素坤逸地区豪华别墅民宿，为您提供舒适与便利的住宿体验
        如果您想在曼谷享受一段难忘的度假或商务之旅，那么皇家园林别墅是您的理想之选。
这是一个拥有新泰式风格的豪华别墅民宿，让您感受到泰国的传统与现代的完美结合

可接待十位尊贵客人的别墅
    有私家豪华游泳池，超大卧室，享受空调、百寸电视、洗衣机、烘干机、WiFi、蓝牙音响等现代设施。
烤箱、冰箱设备齐全的中央厨房里展示您的厨艺。
     更有一名专职保姆照顾生活起居
     私家园林庭院里打卡拍摄精美照片，在泳池畅游，享受阳光和清新的空气。
    三个免费专属停车库停放您的私家车，方便您随时出行。

别墅位于素坤逸地区，是曼谷最繁华商业区，您可以轻松前往附近的购物中心、夜市、水母空中酒吧、RCA酒吧一条街。
从网红小吃到高档餐厅，再到红灯区和夜市 这个街区应有尽有。

距离素万那普国际机场30分钟
距离廊曼国际机场20分钟

name: 曼谷市区豪华别墅 度假圣地 超大泳池 管家服务 KTV包房
address: Khet Phra Khanong, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
当一扇16米的枢轴大门开启，呈现给您的是私藏度假天堂。
这里有波光粼粼的瀑布大泳池，闪耀着万象光芒；
看不尽的星海，椰林环绕的城池；
现代美学设计，客厅320°落地玻璃窗
3米长的北极熊网红沙发会给您带来一丝清凉，松鼠清晨随时到访；
   阳台为落日公路露营地，实现您未完成的度假梦想；在别墅内还有金色海浪风动空中酒Sky  Lounge Bar，200寸I MAX投影幕布，矩阵式BMB KTV可以和您的朋友尽情歌唱；
花式台球桌伴着美酒可以以球会友，以球传情；星级酒店标准床品拥人入梦乡～
万千块乐高积木增添童趣的色彩，在打卡墙前拍摄靓丽照片，美爆朋友圈

  5卧4卫，可容纳10人入住，设有家庭房。
享受空调、洗衣机、烘干机、WiFi、蓝牙音响等现代设施；
烤箱、冰箱设备齐全的中、西厨房；
专属停车区停放您的私家车；
配备一名专职保姆打造优品

别墅位于曼谷市中心-素坤逸71巷最繁华的Sukhumuvit地区
距离7-11便利店仅需要300米
Top one club(水母酒吧)2公里 ;
日式商场 getaway 1.8公里 ;
BTS phra khanong 天铁站 600m;
贵妇商场Eoprium 3公里;
21航站楼 4.5公里;
siam paragon 尚泰百丽宫 、四面佛、网红火车头夜市、红灯区约5.5公里

素万那普机场Suvarnabhumi Airport28公里 、45分钟车程;
廊曼机场Don Mueang Airport 30公里、50分钟车程。

name: Luxurious Penthouse Loft At Nana
address: วัฒนา, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Enjoy This Super Luxurious 4 bedroom, 4 bathroom, 2 Story Penthouse Loft With High 30 Foot Ceiling In The Best Central Bangkok Location Connected to Sky Train Nana BTS.   

Includes a personal concierge/maid for the entire duration of your stay from 7am  to 8pm daily upon request.

Close to Terminal 21, Asok, Sukumvit Soi 11, Nana, Soi Cowboy, KoreaTown & more!experience at this centrally-located place.

You will have the entire 4 bedroom penthouse loft to yourself

We will meet and greet you and personally check your group in.

This penthouse condo is connected to NANA BTS via Skywalk.
You use taxis, Grab, Bolt or even motorcycle taxis for your transportation needs.

Fully equipped luxurious 4 bedroom and 4 bathroom penthouse loft with high speed WIFI, all necessary kitchen utensils, pots, pans, cutlery, large AI washer & dryer, premium shampoo conditioner and body wash, hairdryers, fridge, stove, balcony to smoke, 70 inch smart TV with Netflix, YouTube, connected to Harman Kardon Soundbar,  

The Beautiful Wraparound Pool, Gym, Kids playroom, sauna, Jacuzzi are also accessible on the 5th of the condo.

Includes a personal concierge/maid for the entire duration of your stay from 7am to 8pm daily upon request.

AC included and in every room

Smart TVs are also in all 4 bedrooms and living room

name: ลงผิดอย่าจองเด็ดขาด
address: Bangkok, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Not safe or suitable for children (0-12) and pets
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
ที่ของฉันใกล้กับขนส่งสาธารณะ และ ใจกลางเมือง คุณจะรักสถานที่ของฉันเพราะความอบอุ่น, มุมมอง, และ ตำแหน่งที่ตั้ง ที่พักของฉันเหมาะกับคู่รัก, นักผจญภัยเดี่ยว, นักเดินทางเพื่อธุรกิจ, และ ครอบครัว (พร้อมเด็กๆ)

Room Details

Room functions

- It is a private room meaning there will be no shared areas. This room includes 1 bedroom, 1 toilet, the terrace, and all included furniture for living.

- The bed size is 5 ft. with comfy bedding.

- The living area in this room is also provided by comfy sofa, dining table, air conditioner, working table, refridgerator, microwave, cloth iron, and many more.

- The toilet also has a wash basin, cloth racks,  hair dryer, bath cream, conditioner and shampoo, and laundry detergent.

-The room has high speed internet wifi available and cloth racks at the room's terrace.

- Staying in this room also enables our guests to access several facilities including Swimming Pool, and training fitness.

There are several convenient ways to travel around.
- 2 minutes walk to Gateway Ekkamai shopping mall which has several entertaining facilities and Ekkamai Skytrain (BTS)

-250 metres away from several restaurants, local and international bars, and nightclubs

BTS SkyTrain Ekkamai station

sectionedDescription/space:
Room Details

Room functions

- It is a private room meaning there will be no shared areas. This room includes 1 bedroom, 1 toilet, the terrace, and all included furniture for living.

- The bed size is 5 ft. with comfy bedding.

- The living area in this room is also provided by comfy sofa, dining table, air conditioner, working table, refridgerator, microwave, cloth iron, and many more.

- The toilet also has a wash basin, cloth racks,  hair dryer, bath cream, conditioner and shampoo, and laundry detergent.

-The room has high speed internet wifi available and cloth racks at the room's terrace.

- Staying in this room also enables our guests to access several facilities including Swimming Pool, and training fitness.

There are several convenient ways to travel around.
- 2 minutes walk to Gateway Ekkamai shopping mall which has several entertaining facilities and Ekkamai Skytrain (BTS)

-250 metres away from several restaurants, local and international bars, and nightclubs
