name: Punntara Botanic Home Medium Villa ‘Yom’
address: Tambon Bang Kachao, Chang Wat Samut Prakan, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in time is 11AM - 11PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Escape to a serene haven along the enchanting Chao Phraya River with our charming villa, perfect for family getaways. Embrace the tranquility of nature as you unwind amidst lush surroundings. With the convenience of being a mere 5-minute walk from the port, embark on a stay of life time which allows peace tranquility away from Bangkok but a mere river crossing distance to Bangkok.

2006 Time magazine called Bangkachao the best urban oasis of Asia.

🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴 
Punntara Botanic Home offers an exquisite retreat with three grand villas, each boasting four spacious rooms. Nestled by the edge of the illustrious Chao Phraya River, these villas epitomize luxury living amidst nature's splendor. Among its unique features is a magnificent boat house, gracefully resting on the tranquil surface of a serene pond, adding an element of charm and tranquility to the estate. Alongside these opulent accommodations, guests enjoy a range of amenities, including breakfast and catering options suitable for various occasions, from professional gatherings to casual get-togethers. Additionally, our property provides kayaking opportunities for guests, allowing them to embark on tranquil journeys along the majestic river, immersing themselves in the breathtaking natural beauty that surrounds Punntara Botanic Home. For those seeking relaxation and recreation, each villa is equipped with its own private pool, providing the perfect oasis to unwind and rejuvenate amidst the lush surroundings.
🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴🌳🌴

Guests at Punntara Botanic Home can easily reach our attentive staff for assistance or inquiries via Airbnb messaging or direct communication channels.

NO PETS
We would like to inform you that pets are not allowed inside the property.

NO PARTY
We value our neighbours and local communities as much as we value our guests. To ensure that everyone enjoys a peaceful and pleasant stay, we have a NO PARTY policy. However we do allow for gathering for events. We seek for more quiet time after 9pm to allow for other guest to have a relaxing time. We hope you understand and enjoy your stay at our villa while being mindful of others around you.

BREAKFAST
We want to inform you that we do provide breakfast, but there is an extra charge of 200 Baht per person. 

CATERING SERVICE
We offer catering services for events which you hold on the VILLA. Please reach out to us for more information. 

EXTRA BED
We do offer extra bed on the property but it will be subject to availability and there is a cost of 700 baht per person.

EARLY CHECK-IN 
Basic Rules
Standard Check-in : 14:00
Standard Check-out : 11:00

If you want to check - in early, please follow our policy below.

Early Check In
Early check-in is subject to the availability of the room, If there’s no other guest in the morning of your check-in day, we may be able to speed up your check-in time for free. 

Please inform us at least 12 hours prior the time you want to do early check in, otherwise we can't accommodate your early check in.

LATE CHECK-IN
Yes, you can. We will inform you of the location of the villa keys and how to access the villa. Please let us know your arrival time in advance, and more importantly, please take note of the address details that we gave you upon confirming your reservation, it will help you to find the accommodation easily.

LEAVING LUGGAGE POLICY
• Check-in: Unfortunately, storing luggage prior to the standard check-in time is not permitted.
• Check-out: We're unable to offer luggage storage post check-out due to check-out policy.

LATE CHECK-OUT
Please be informed that our check-out time is at 12 noon. Late check-out is subject to availability and might involve an extra charge as well.

NO WEEDS ALLOWED. 
We do not allow smoking of weeds in our Villa for safety reasons. 
 
KEY CARD
If you misplace the key card there is a replacement fee of 500 Baht.

address: Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Bangkok, Thailand
sectionedDescription/interaction:
无论您是来旅游还是短期居住，我们都乐于与您分享曼谷的各种生活体验，希望您可以把我们这里当作您在曼谷的家一样～我们也一直在努力！

在您确认定定房后，我们会提供中文、英文English客服服务！有任何问题随时与我们联系～

Feel free to contact with me when you need any support~
sectionedDescription/name: S1 可住18-20人  靠近asoke 会呼吸的泳池 9卧 KTV 台球桌 24 小时管家
sectionedDescription/space:
位于曼谷市中心素坤逸49巷的翠澜繁花秘境大宅，可容纳18人尽享尊贵时光。宽敞庭院，百平米花海摇曳生姿，一层一天地，散发着泰兰德独有的芬芳。“会呼吸的泳池”簇拥茂密的热带雨林🌴-私密、深邃而迷人；KTV采纳隔音全包，配备美国JBL专业矩阵音响与激光摇头灯为客人打造震撼的视听盛宴，让曼谷之夜璀璨夺目。一层公区两处，曼谷“繁花🌸”S1别墅
                     ---Fantasy Villa泰国民宿

 🏡别墅共有三层。9间卧室，9个卫生间。现代设施一应俱全，中央空调、洗衣机、烘干机、WiFi、留声机等现代设施；设备齐全的中、西厨房，满足您各种烹饪需求；专属停车区可停放6辆私家车；配备两名专职保姆致力于为您打造优质的环境卫生！均近百平的空间巧妙平衡了功能商务会客与娱乐休闲区，全屋高定款法国罗奇堡家私。雪茄品鉴区、台球、餐区等区域大面积拼色撞色，带来全新视觉体验。多处打卡📷区-“维多利亚的秘密”秀场翅膀、中空8米西瓜红配色背景墙作为视觉焦点，增加打卡属性，瞬间燃爆🔥朋友圈

sectionedDescription/description:
My apartment is on Central of Bangkok, near subway station, Central department store. You can find easy way to the airport by subway, or express way. My apartment has 1 bed room, kitchen, living room, each room is separate, fitness, swimming pool.


This Thai style apartment has all things you need. You can stay with comfortable feeling like your own home.

Free Wifi 24 hours (High speed internet)
Electrical appliances
- LED TV 32"
- Refrigerator
- Hob and Hood
- Air conditioner X 2 units
- Microwave
- Electric stove with cooking hood

Furniture items
- Leather sofa
- King size Bed (6')
- Wardrobe
- TV cabinet
- 2 units of hanging shelves
- Dinning table + chairs
- Working table + chair
- Dim out curtains
- Bookshelf
- Shoes Cabinet

Just 3-minute walk, you can go to subway station Rama9, Central Rama 9 department store, Starbucks, many resteraunts, supermarket.

Subway station, Rama9 is very close to my apartment just 3-minute walk. You can go to Silom, Sathon, Siamsquare and Suvannaphum airport by subway. It's very easy.


There has 24 hours security guards, keycard system.

sectionedDescription/description: เดินทางเข้าสู่โลกของความสะดวกสบายและความสงบสุขที่บ้านเช่า ที่มีพื้นที่กว้างขวางให้คุณและครอบครัวมากมายเพื่อให้ทุกคนได้สัมผัสประสบการณ์ชีวิตที่สมบูรณ์แบบ ด้วยห้องนอนที่ทันสมัยและสะดวกสบาย พร้อมกับห้องน้ำที่สะอาดและเป็นระเบียบ เพื่อให้คุณมีช่วงเวลาที่ผ่อนคลายและสบายใจ ที่บ้านเช่าของเรา คุณจะพบความอบอุ่นและความสงบที่เหมาะสำหรับการพักผ่อนหรือเป็นที่พักอาศัยในช่วงเวลายาวนาน ตอนเย็นสงบสุขของคุณจะเติบโตขึ้นเมื่อคุณมองเห็นพระอาทิตย์ตกลงไปในท้องฟ้า และคุณจะรู้สึกอุ่นใจเมื่อเห็นครอบครัวชาวบ้านกำลังเพลิดเพลินกับชีวิตของพวกเขาในบรรยากาศที่สดใสของบ้านเช่านี้ ที่นี่ไม่เพียงแค่บ้าน แต่เป็นที่รวมตัวของความสุข

name: Spacious 3-Bedroom Luxury Suite
address: Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Indulge in luxurious style and expansive accommodations with our three bedroom suite, a duplex serviced apartment spanning 135sqm. Nestled in the vibrant Sukhumvit area, celebrated for its upscale shopping and dining experiences. Just 40-minutes away from Bangkok's Airport. Immerse yourself in the flawless fusion of opulence and space, ensuring an unforgettable stay, complete with complimentary breakfast for six.

This elegant three-bedroom suite features with king, queen-size and twin beds in the three bedrooms, the bedding arrangements can be modified to your liking, ensuring a personalized experience. Generously proportioned combined living and dining spaces provide ample room for relaxation and meals.
Entertainment is at your fingertips with widescreen TVs with satellite channels in each bedroom, and a well-appointed kitchenette comes equipped with standard appliances and kitchenware for your convenience. Complimentary WiFi ensures you remain connected throughout your stay.
Outside the suite, you can enjoy the shared swimming pool, fully equipped gym, on-site restaurant, and access all the amenities available within the complex.

The unit is 100% yours. You have access to all the facilities of the complex. It includes swimming pool, fitness center, the restaurant, support services at the reception, and 24hrs security.

We have a small and lovely team to take care of our guests and properties.
Originally from France, I settled in South-East Asia in 1998 and I continue to consider it’s a blessing to live here. During the summer months, I go back to Europe (Greece, France and Spain) and become a digital nomad, like so many guests we have the privilege to host. My passion to share is intact: I never cease to bless each new day. And I see the same spark in each one of my colleagues. Live the dream!

Sukhumvit, is a dynamic neighborhood enriched with a myriad of attractions. From the iconic Terminal 21 shopping mall with its unique global-themed floors to the serene Benjasiri Park, where locals gather for leisurely strolls and picnics, Sukhumvit offers a diverse tapestry of experiences, ensuring there's something to enchant every resident and visitor alike.

To navigate this area efficiently, consider using the extensive public transportation system, including the Bangkok Skytrain (BTS) and the metro (MRT) to easily reach key landmarks. Alternatively, exploring on foot or renting a bicycle can provide a more immersive and leisurely way to discover the neighborhood's hidden gems, local eateries, and vibrant street life.

Our price is all-inclusive: in particular, there is no extra Airbnb service fees to add to the rental price. Check-out cleaning and light-speed WIFI are also included. 
Children and infants are welcome, and we can provide a baby cot and a baby chair upon request. There is no extra charge for children, until 12 years old, sharing an existing bed.
A damage deposit is requested upon check-in. Your deposit will be refunded in full on check-out, subject to an inspection of the property.
Breakfast is complimentary for 2 people. For an additional fee, you can also enjoy delicious meals in our restaurant.
The pool is shared with other guests.
After you’ve completed your booking, we will open a group chat on your favorite app and send you all the information relevant to your arrival and stay in Phuket. You will be able to reach us for the duration of your vacation through the group chat or by phone from 9 am to 6 pm for any questions you may have or anything you may need. We are always available, smiling, and helpful.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: Our goal is to provide you with a high standard of accommodation together with quality hospitality services and a personal touch to make sure you have the best environment to enjoy your holidays. A damage deposit is requested upon check in. Your deposit will be refunded in full on check-out, subject to an inspection of the property. When you arrive, we will give you a checklist to remind you about the following points: check-in and check-out times (as per our listing), maximum capacity (as per our listing), no smoking inside the suite (allowed in the designated areas), no illegal activities, respect of the property, respect of the neighbors (no parties, no loud noise after 10 pm), and elementary safety precautions. In accordance with Thai law, we will also make a copy of all passports to register the TM30 immigration forms.

name: Arttra Pool Villa Bangkachao
address: Tambon Bang Kachao, Chang Wat Samut Prakan, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Stay on an island in Bangkok at a Private Pool Villa by the Chaopraya River just minutes away from the city center. Arttra Villa is a truly unique and charming vacation rental that offers a wide range of amenities and activities for guests. Accessible by car or a private pier,  saltwater pool, musical instruments, and a rooftop bar with a view of the Bangkok skyline, Arttra's kitchen serves up a variety of delicious and healthy cuisines made with freshest local ingredients and a full bar.

Bangkachao Island - Bangkok's Green Lung

Phra Prapadaeng, also known as Bangkok’s “Green Lung,” is an area protected from commercial development. Nestled in the horseshoe of the Chao Phraya River, the Green Lung is a lush oasis in the heart of the city. This small jungle is home to several villages, bike rentals, walking trails, and more.

How to get there
To visit Phra Prapadaeng, you’ll need to take a boat across the river to Bang Krachao. You can catch a boat from the city at the Wat Klong Toey pier, for a fare of just 20 baht. From there, you could hail a motorbike taxi to explore the area. But the most popular form of transit for visitors are bicycles, which can be rented for around 50 baht for a half day or 100 baht for a full day.

What to see during your visit to the Green Lung
There’s plenty to see during your visit, but if you plan to navigate the area by bike, be careful. Riding a bike in Phra Prapadaeng does take a bit of skill. Many of the roads and walkways are elevated, because much of the area is a marsh and is prone to flooding. Some of these walkways do not have railings, so you’ll have to be able to balance on a bike to stay dry.

Bangnampueng Floating Market
The most famous floating market on the weekend where you will see hundreds of shops selling street food, local fresh fruits, organic vegetables, Thai snacks, handicrafts, gifts and list goes on. Experience a floating market so charming like no other with friendly and charming vendors who will never rip you off!

Sri Nakhon Khuan Khan Park
Once you’ve rented your wheels, you can begin exploring the area. About a half kilometer from the boat dock is the start of the Sri Nakhon Khuan Khan Park. This sanctuary is home to several square kilometers of untouched jungle, and is also a bird sanctuary. There are plenty of side trails and viewing areas where you can relax, take in the fresh air, and maybe catch sight of a few rare birds native to the area.

green lung map bangkok
Visit The Floating Market
One of the most popular attractions in Phra Prapadaeng is Bang Nam Pheung floating market. Open on Saturdays and Sunday, the name of this market is mostly for show. Only a few of the vendors operate on boats, and the rest are on land, but the market is still a must-see. Shop for t-shirts and homemade items, and of course, delicious Thai cuisine.

Fighting Fish Gallery
Also, located in the Green Lungs is the Siamese Fighting Fish Gallery. Open on Saturdays and Sundays and free to visit, this gallery is the only of its kind in the world. Like the floating market, don’t let the name fool you. The fish here don’t fight but you will enjoy viewing tank after tank of colorful, exotic Siamese Fighting Fish.

Learn how to Tie-Dye
Nestled in a quiet area of the green lung is a small outdoor area where you can learn to Tie-Dye and make incense with the help of the locals. You can purchase what you’ve made. This is a great way to spend an hour or two enhancing your skills and knowledge. It also means you will have a souvenir to act as a reminder of your day spent on the green lung.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
No illegal activities
Please be kind and respectful to everyone
Please treat the villa with care

name: Private 3 BedRoom / Kitchen / Pool / Fitness /BTS
address: Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM
sectionedDescription/description:
Sleek, modern high-rise an easy 5-minute stroll from the nearest metro stop. Silom Road shopping and dining is a short drive away. Or shop local-style and hit as many of the 8,000 stalls as you can handle at the Chaktuchak Weekend Market.

**Ascott Cares covers 9 commitments to maintaining high levels of hygiene and cleanliness standards as well as safe distancing to continue providing our guests and staff a safe environment. **

At the end of an adventurous day, return to the luxury residence to rejuvenate. Ascott Sathorn Bangkok offers guests the comforts and little luxuries that make them feel welcome and thoroughly at home.

The expansive 167 3-Bedroom Deluxe apartment epitomises living in the lap of luxury, with three bedrooms, two bathrooms fitted with amenities courtesy of Appellis, one toilet, and a six-seater dining table in the separate dining area. Guests may also choose to gather in the apartment’s well-equipped kitchenette and whip up a meal together.

The spacious apartment is fitted with a king-size bed in the master bedroom, a queen-size bed in the second bedroom and twin single beds in third, perfect for a group of six. An extra guest may be accommodated with an extra bed.

Each apartment also comes with a washing machine and dryer, separate living and dining space, television, USB port access and speaker systems (in selected residences), and individually controlled air-conditioning.

Daily housekeeping service and Wi-Fi connectivity are also available.

LIVING/DINING
•	1 armchair
•	6-seater dining table
•	Cooker hob & hood
•	Flat screen television with cable channels
•	HiFi system
•	Sofa set
•	Telephone (with IDD)
•	Work desk & chair

BATHROOM(S)
•	Eco-friendly bath amenities
•	Bathroom with a bathtub/shower combination
•	En-suite bathroom with a separate bathtub and shower area
•	Towels & toiletries

BEDROOM(S)
•	1 king-size bed (master bedroom)

Sights worth visiting in Bangkok include the Chaktuchak Weekend Market, an expansive market that houses as many as 8000 stalls and 27 sections, hawking everything from home wares to footwear, pet poodles to fine silver jewellery. For something different, visit some of the most famous temples such as Wat Pra Kaew, Wat Arun and Wat Pho, accessible by still-functioning water taxis along the Chao Phraya River. 

It is in the very heart of this multifaceted metropolis where Ascott Sathorn Bangkok lies. The luxury residence sits squarely on South Sathorn Road, just a 2-minute walk to Saint Louis station or 7-minute walk to Chong Nonsi skytrain station and the renowned nightlife and shopping districts on the Silom Road are just a short drive away. The residence is also a mere 1-hour drive to the Suvarnabhumi International Airport and Don Muang Airport.

On Sathorn road, next to Saint Louis BTS by only a few step walking.
Easy connect to every part of the city.

sectionedDescription/space:
At the end of an adventurous day, return to the luxury residence to rejuvenate. Ascott Sathorn Bangkok offers guests the comforts and little luxuries that make them feel welcome and thoroughly at home.

The expansive 167 3-Bedroom Deluxe apartment epitomises living in the lap of luxury, with three bedrooms, two bathrooms fitted with amenities courtesy of Appellis, one toilet, and a six-seater dining table in the separate dining area. Guests may also choose to gather in the apartment’s well-equipped kitchenette and whip up a meal together.

The spacious apartment is fitted with a king-size bed in the master bedroom, a queen-size bed in the second bedroom and twin single beds in third, perfect for a group of six. An extra guest may be accommodated with an extra bed.

Each apartment also comes with a washing machine and dryer, separate living and dining space, television, USB port access and speaker systems (in selected residences), and individually controlled air-conditioning.

Daily housekeeping service and Wi-Fi connectivity are also available.

sectionedDescription/description:
Epitomising contemporary, quality living in the heart of Bangkok is the spacious 240 sqm 3-Bedroom Premier apartment.

Embodying an oasis in the bustling city of skyscrapers and gold-tinged spires, the 3-Bedroom Premier set in the heart of Bangkok is designed to make our guests feel right at home. Each of the 3-bedroom apartments is modernly furnished and fitted with floor-to-ceiling windows, which offers guests an unparalleled view of the bustling metropolis.

Sprawling across an impressive 240 sqm, the apartment is fitted with a king-size bed in the master bedroom and twin single beds in the second and third bedrooms, making it a choice abode for up to six guests. However, a seventh guest may be accommodated with the inclusion of an additional bed.

Living and dining rooms are designed to be separate, truly encapsulating the specifics of a home. Guests are also welcome to make full use of the kitchenette fitted with modern appliances to prepare their own meals from locally sourced produce for dining in.

Each apartment is also decked with three en suite bathrooms fitted with eco-friendly amenities and a toilet, a separate living and dining space, a flat screen television with cable channels connected to a home entertainment system and individually controlled air-conditioning.

Housekeeping services and Wi-Fi connectivity are also available.

sectionedDescription/description:
Explore Thailand’s past and present

Located within a high-end condominium residence in the heart of Bangkok – the capital city of Thailand – Marriott Vacation Club at The Empire Place is conveniently located near Sathorn Road and Taksin Bridge. It also offers spacious, elegantly appointed accommodations and warm Thai hospitality.

Important Alerts
Guests should be aware of the following:

Construction Updates


Beginning June 19, 2023 to Jan. 19, 2024, Bangkok Empire Place will be undergoing lobby renovation project. Work will occur daily during daytime hours, so please anticipate construction noise during this time. All other Club Residence amenities are expected to remain open and fully operational for your enjoyment.

Service Animal Policy
Due to condominium restrictions, it’s important to note that family pets, trained service animals, and emotional support animals are not permitted in any apartments or common areas.

Amenity Status
The current status of resort amenities and services is subject to change at any time. Please continue to check this website frequently for updates prior to your upcoming reservation.

Open

Limited capacity.

Advance reservations recommended for tennis courts.

Kitchen Amenities:

refrigerator

Resort Amenities

Located in the heart of Bangkok
Fitness center with sauna and steam rooms
Tennis court
Swimming pool with whirlpool spa and children’s pool
Children’s play area
High-speed Internet access in apartments*

A vacation home that feels like home.

Located in the heart of Bangkok, Marriott Vacation Club at The Empire Place provides convenient access to the city’s modern rail services. Explore this magnificent metropolis and experience its unique and diverse culture. Or retreat from the city and enjoy an array of on-site amenities just steps from your spacious apartment.

Dining
During your stay in Bangkok, you’ll enjoy diverse dining options nearby. Choose from Asian-fusion and traditional Thai delights to international cuisines such as Italian, Indian, Mediterranean and Japanese.

Exercise & recreation
Maintain your workout routine with an on-site fitness center, including sauna and steam rooms. Serve up some fun with an invigorating game of tennis. Or relax by the outdoor pool while children stay active in the play area.




Spa
Take a break from the pulse of the city and unwind with a pampering treatment at one of the area’s many spas

Discover historic and modern marvels

Whether you prefer touring ancient monuments or exploring modern marvels such as multilevel shopping malls, you’ll find something to make your Thailand adventure truly memorable.

Arts & culture

No trip to Bangkok is complete without a visit to the Grand Palace, home of the Temple of the Emerald Buddha. Camera-worthy opportunities abound in this city landmark consisting of several buildings with highly decorated architectural designs. Within the complex, Wat Phra Kaew enshrines the famed Emerald Buddha.

Family fun

Discover unique treasures at Chatuchak Weekend Market, Thailand’s largest market covering more than 35 acres and upwards of 5,000 stalls. It’s a bargain-hunter’s paradise with thousands of local products for sale, including food, clothing, handicrafts and more.

Shopping

For more modern shopping opportunities, visit MBK Center, an eight-story shopping center with 2,300 shops offering everything from mobile phones and electronics to furniture and fashion. Central Chidlom Shopping Center is a one-stop shopping destination with virtually any and everything you can imagine under one roof. It also offers special services for visitors, including interpreters, currency exchange and a shipping service.

Tours

When the afternoon Thai temperatures rise, enjoy a refreshing Klong (canal) tour and visit the majestic Royal Barges National Museum on the north bank of the Bangkok Noi Canal. See magnificent barges used in royal river processions, including one more than 50 meters long.


Owner favorites

Visit the Royal Barges Museum

sectionedDescription/space:
Important Alerts
Guests should be aware of the following:

Construction Updates


Beginning June 19, 2023 to Jan. 19, 2024, Bangkok Empire Place will be undergoing lobby renovation project. Work will occur daily during daytime hours, so please anticipate construction noise during this time. All other Club Residence amenities are expected to remain open and fully operational for your enjoyment.

Service Animal Policy
Due to condominium restrictions, it’s important to note that family pets, trained service animals, and emotional support animals are not permitted in any apartments or common areas.

Amenity Status
The current status of resort amenities and services is subject to change at any time. Please continue to check this website frequently for updates prior to your upcoming reservation.

Kitchen Amenities:

refrigerator

Silverware and Dishware

Resort Amenities

Located in the heart of Bangkok
Fitness center with sauna and steam rooms
Tennis court
Swimming pool with whirlpool spa and children’s pool
Children’s play area
High-speed Internet access in apartments*

A vacation home that feels like home.

Located in the heart of Bangkok, Marriott Vacation Club at The Empire Place provides convenient access to the city’s modern rail services. Explore this magnificent metropolis and experience its unique and diverse culture. Or retreat from the city and enjoy an array of on-site amenities just steps from your spacious apartment.

Dining
During your stay in Bangkok, you’ll enjoy diverse dining options nearby. Choose from Asian-fusion and traditional Thai delights to international cuisines such as Italian, Indian, Mediterranean and Japanese.

Exercise & recreation
Maintain your workout routine with an on-site fitness center, including sauna and steam rooms. Serve up some fun with an invigorating game of tennis. Or relax by the outdoor pool while children stay active in the play area.




Spa
Take a break from the pulse of the city and unwind with a pampering treatment at one of the area’s many spas

Discover historic and modern marvels

Whether you prefer touring ancient monuments or exploring modern marvels such as multilevel shopping malls, you’ll find something to make your Thailand adventure truly memorable.

Arts & culture

No trip to Bangkok is complete without a visit to the Grand Palace, home of the Temple of the Emerald Buddha. Camera-worthy opportunities abound in this city landmark consisting of several buildings with highly decorated architectural designs. Within the complex, Wat Phra Kaew enshrines the famed Emerald Buddha.

Family fun

Discover unique treasures at Chatuchak Weekend Market, Thailand’s largest market covering more than 35 acres and upwards of 5,000 stalls. It’s a bargain-hunter’s paradise with thousands of local products for sale, including food, clothing, handicrafts and more.

Shopping

For more modern shopping opportunities, visit MBK Center, an eight-story shopping center with 2,300 shops offering everything from mobile phones and electronics to furniture and fashion. Central Chidlom Shopping Center is a one-stop shopping destination with virtually any and everything you can imagine under one roof. It also offers special services for visitors, including interpreters, currency exchange and a shipping service.

Tours

When the afternoon Thai temperatures rise, enjoy a refreshing Klong (canal) tour and visit the majestic Royal Barges National Museum on the north bank of the Bangkok Noi Canal. See magnificent barges used in royal river processions, including one more than 50 meters long.


Owner favorites

Tour the Grand Palace and the Emerald Buddha Temple
Visit the Royal Barges Museum
Take a dinner cruise along the Chao Phraya river
Relax with a traditional Thai massage

EXERCISE & RECREATION

Pools
Swimming pool with jacuzzi
Children's pool
Sports and Fitness
Fitness center
Sauna room
Steam room
Tennis court
Children's play area

SERVICES
Newspaper in lobby
High-speed internet
Concierge desk
sectionedDescription/summary:
Explore Thailand’s past and present

Located within a high-end condominium residence in the heart of Bangkok – the capital city of Thailand – Marriott Vacation Club at The Empire Place is conveniently located near Sathorn Road and Taksin Bridge. It also offers spacious, elegantly appointed accommodations and warm Thai hospitality.

address: Khet Khlong San, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Located in Bangkok, 6.3 km from Wat Arun, the property provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. All rooms are fitted with a kettle, while selected rooms come with a balcony and others also offer pool views. Each room has bed linen and towels.

At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving international cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested.

Wat Pho is 6.4 km from the hotel, while Temple of the Emerald Buddha is 6.8 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 30 km from the property.

sectionedDescription/description:
位于市中心素坤逸Sukhumuvit39巷，1000㎡超现实奇境城市大宅。三层别墅🏡，5卧6卫。中央空调、洗衣机、烘干机、WiFi🛜、开放式中、西厨房，院内私家停车区可停3-4辆🚘，专职保姆打造优质环境。
        曼谷最高12M炫酷奢华KTV🎤，商务洽谈的优选亦是举家欢聚的绝佳场，英国玛田矩阵音响、专业级舞美灯效、200寸巨幕LED电视、法国罗奇堡家私、尽享极致视听盛宴。“最美夕阳”🌇落脚于此，暮风徐徐摆渡船🛶激起水浪🌊交响的篇章，荟萃东南亚珍稀植物🌳、精心造景尽享贵族至尊。1.2层均设有Lounge区，270°落地窗，多处网红拍照打卡区，永生苔藓墙、顶尖设计师款沙发，尽情捕捉美好瞬间，让泰兰德的夏天永不停歇。独特的中空无边泳池，白墙蓝池交织出🇹🇭Bangkok梦想。

name: C06 - Elite Dude @ Pratunam Bangkok
address: Khet Ratchathewi, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Not safe or suitable for infants (under 2 years) and pets
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
If you are looking for a nice hotel located right in the heart of Bangkok’s shopping paradise that is just a 10-minute walk from either Airport Rail Link or BTS Skytrain Station, Vince hotel is your absolute choice.

How can you experience the true Bangkok flair unless you visit Pratunam, one of the most vibrant, bustling neighborhood in Bangkok. While Pratunam is packed with dozens of hotels, Vince is not just another hotel here where you just check in and sleep. It’s a stylishly hybrid hotel boasting a uniquely innovative interior and charming decor. ‘Fun’, ‘easy’, and ‘style’ are what you will experience while staying here.
Behind the stunningly modern facade, inside is a classical-looking hotel with a contemporary edge. It’s like classic and modern design languages in dialog. A warm Siamese welcome awaits your arrival. The minute you arrive, you know you are somewhere where you can be yourself, kick back and relax. Let our professional, friendly staff attend to your desires. Here at Vince, you can always expect new twists.

- Private Room with inside toilet
- Twin bed
- Air conditioner
- Hot Shower separate with toilet
- Dressing table with half body mirror
- Hair Dryer
- Kettle
- In room safe
- Open wore drop and cloth hanker
- Shampoo, Hand wash, Shower Gel and body lotion are provide on refill bottle
- Drinking water, Tea, coffee set are provided 1 time on arrival date

- Cleaning service 300 THB / time (included all linen changed)
- Breakfast 220 THB net / pax for buffet breakfast (advance purchase at front desk to get this rate)
- Set of amenities (included toothbrush, comb, razor, shower cab, sanitary bag, cotton bud) will be charge 100 THB
- Drinking water set pack  2 bottles will be charge 60 THB
- Extra bed with full bedding faciliteis will be charge 600 THB
- Extra towel, bathmat, Bathrobe will be charge 100 THB / Pcs. (1 time pay no charge)
- Extra Pillow, blanket, bedsheet is 200 THB / pcs. ( 1 time pay no charge)

name: 曼谷市中心超大庄园别墅 可住18人 占地2000平方米  超大泳池 豪华ktv
address: Khet Suan Luang, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
位于曼谷繁华的On Nut 地区。
周边配套：距离7-11超市450米、Rca夜店街5.5公里、曼谷最繁华商业区素坤逸6公里。
   整个庄园占地2000平方米，9卧6卫，可容纳18+人同时入住。
  泳池：120平米(12m*10m)曼谷唯一私人超大泳池，达到普通公共泳池难以企及的规模，宛如一颗璀璨的宝石点缀整间别墅。
 可容纳20余人的私人豪华KTV绝无仅有，矩阵式专业音响，舞美激光秀，尽情释放激情。
   庄园内三栋楼宇风格各异，超大客厅含有罗奇堡家私、网红打卡草莓熊背景墙、3米高彩兔镜、未来女战士等等拍摄元素，随意角度都可拍出与众不同的美图，让您的朋友圈点赞爆棚。配备现代化的设施，可享受空调、百寸电视、洗衣机、烘干机、WiFi、蓝牙音响等，同有烤箱、冰箱等厨房设施。赛博朋克与森林系中古风庄园级体量民宿，既融合了未来的科技感，又结合了自然园林的舒适氧吧体验感。无论是沐浴阳光、纳凉休憩，庭院休闲区精心设计的布局让人感受到无尽的惬意与放松。
    另配备2名专职管家负责庄园的安全和卫生环境。

Spectacular view of Central Bangkok skyline (14th floor)

Ideally located in the heart of Bangkok (walking distance to BTS Asok, MRT Sukhumvit) 
2 min walk from Chuwit Garden and Benjakitti Park.
1 Master bedroom (king size bed) with walk in closet and bathroom. 1 guest room (queen size bed) with bathroom. 1 study room with sofa bed (for kid). 1 Living room toilet. 1 greeny Balcony with table and chairs. 1 large and open kitchen & bar with all equipments. 
Up to 5 persons comfortably fit in the unit. 

Full access to shared condo facilities (pool, fitness room, tennis table…)
Fully equipped kitchen (modern american fridge, oven, microwave, gaz piano cooking station, coffee machine, kettle, toaster...) 
Washing machine available. 
Cable TV, DVD player available in each room, 3 large TVs.
Wifi and Internet   
One car parking space is also available.

I reply very quickly to emails and inquiries.
I can be available for advices about your Bkk stay.

Filled with restaurants, bars, clubs, 5 stars hotels, shopping malls, parks... this neighborhood combines an International and vibrant atmosphere with the unique Thai friendliness.
This is the heart of Bangkok Business Central District but the condo is extraordinarily quiet in a charming street off Sukhumvit main road.



BTS skytrain and MRT underground 7 min walk away.
Taxis available at request (see Security Guards at the lobby)
Motorway access 5 min away. 30 min from airport.
One car parking space is also available.
2 min walk from busy Sukhumvit main road where taxis are always available.

No shoes (slippers provided)
No pets (condo rules). Smoking on the balcony.
No parties in the unit.
Check-in at 14:00 (2PM) and check-out at 11:00 (11AM)

name: Admiral Suite RO- 1BR Suite with Balcony
address: Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
Admiral Premier is 4 stars service apartment located in Bangkok down town (Sukhumvit - Asok), you could easily to get a public transportation such as MRT (Subway) Sukhumvit Station, and BTS (Sky Train) Asok Station. We also provide Tuk Tuk Service for in-house guest to get a public transportation.

The most spacious room type of the hotel, the Admiral One Bedroom Suite at 65 sqm is roomy with a separate living room and bedroom. You can enjoy a fulfilling meal at the dining area or stretch out on the sofa bed in the living room, or even lay down on the king-sized bed in the comforts of the bedroom while watching films on various satellite TV channels. This One Bedroom Suite also provides an outdoor balcony, a fully equipped kitchenette, and an en suite bathroom with a bathtub and separate walk-in shower.

We always available to help you with any questions. Our staff at Admiral Premier are up for your service 24 hours a day; hence we have 24 hours reception service for your convenience.

Located along Sukhumvit road of Bangkok city on Sukhumvit Soi 23, Admiral Premier is a 10-minute walk to both the Asok BTS Skytrain Station and Sukhumvit MRT Underground Station.

There are also a number of well-established dining and entertainment outlets, spa and massage outlets, and fashion boutique stores en route. The location also within easy reach of corporate offices, embassies, parks, and the Queen Sirikit National Convention Center.

Due to our property is Service Apartment, we may have in-house guest and you may stay in the same building with our guests. However, if you have any assistance my colleague at lobby are welcome and available to help you all the time (24 hours a day).
sectionedDescription/houseRules: Guests must be at least 18 years of age to check in.Please present your ID card /Passport upon check in. Deposit may require upon check-in for guaranteed others expenses during stay.Check In time : 14:00 pm / Check out time : 12: 00 pm. (For special request Early Check-In and Late Check-Out are subject to room availability.) Pets are not allowed.There is no charge for children below the age of 12 years sharing a room with parent(s) on existing bedding. If an extra bed is required, regardless of age, an extra bed charge will be incurredChildren 12 years and above are charged the full adult breakfast price of THB 250.00 nettChildren between the ages of 5 and 11 years are charged a rate of THB 150.00 nett per child/breakfastChildren 4 years and below eat breakfast for free

sectionedDescription/description: This beautiful, spacious villa connected to a mirrored twin via a charming gate, offering a unique and expansive retreat for an unforgettable stay. Located in the heart of the city, offering easy access to all of the local attractions. You'll be just a short distance from restaurants, shopping, supermarkets, and entertainment options, as well as the sky train for easy travel. The Villa is newly renovated and very spacious with a private pool and a fully equipped kitchen.

name: Siri Sala Private Thai Villa
address: Bangkok, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in time is 3PM - 9PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Thai homes were the inspiration for this villa. Ponds, gardens & saltwater pool  create a natural setting that pay tribute to traditional waterside homes on stilts. The 3 modern 'ruens' or thai houses sharing a common courtyard are complemented by a reconstructed wooden heritage house, and all feature original details like murals and reclaimed teak furniture. The best of Bangkok is reachable by car or boat through the property's private pier. Featured in major travel & design publications.

BEDROOM & BATHROOM
Ruen Bangkok Noi
Bedroom 1 - Primary:  King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower

Ruen Hor
Bedroom 2:  King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower & bathtub

RUEN SIRI SUITES

Ruen Siri Rudee
Bedroom 3: 2 Twin size beds, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, Alfresco bathtub

Ruen Siri San
Bedroom 4: 2 Twin size beds,  Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower & bathtub

Ruen Siri Kasem
Bedroom 5: 2 Twin size beds, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower 

Ruen Siri Suk
Bedroom 6: 2 Twin size beds, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower & bathtub

FEATURES & AMENITIES
• Library
• Wine cooler
• More under “What this place offers” below

SERVICES INCLUDED
• Welcome drinks upon arrival
• Laundry service
• More under “What this place offers” below


SERVICES AT EXTRA COST 
• Cooking classes
• More under “Add-on services” below

The guests will have exclusive use of the entire villa, without having to share any spaces with others.

Our villa manager will work with the rest of the team to provide you services to customise your stay.  This can include the preparation of special meals, organizing tours, reservations at top restaurants & procurement of transportation.

Located in historic Bangkok Noi, a community in Bangkok that centers around life by the river. This villa has its own private pier so that guests can explore the Chao Praya, temples, shopping malls, and other sites easily.

Please contact us about arranging a car and driver on stand by daily for your group, or a boat and caption, for an additional fee.

There is a private parking lot in the villa monitored by a security guard 24/7 if you would like to bring your own car.

This is the only waterside private villa available in all of Bangkok.  Comes with full staff (villa manager, housekeeping, chefs, security) trained to 5 star hotel standards.

Siri Sala has been featured in Conde Nast Traveller's "Best Hotels in Bangkok" list 2023 and Travel + Leisure's "top 10 Private Pool Villas for Indulgent Group Getaways" in 2022.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
All credit card holders must be aged 25 years and older at check-in.

Kindly note that there are 2 rollaway extra beds (single size) available in the villa and it can be set up only in Ruen Bangkok Noi and Ruen Hor

Children ages 6 years and up are considered adults and must have their own bed

Please note this Host requires a supplemental contract to be signed at the time of check-in.

address: Ratchathewi, Bangkok, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in time is 2PM - 10PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
- Check-in My Hostel is located in the best area of Bangkok, 10-15 minute walk to famous shopping malls (MBK, Siam Square and Siam Paragon), dining and entertainment. 10 minute walk from BTS Ratchathewi station. 

- The easiest way to get to our hostel is by public taxi from airport.  Please let the taxi driver call us for direction to our hostel. our mobile number are; 089 129 9265 and 081 639 5144. Let the taxi charge you by meter. the taxi fare from airport to our hostel is around THB 250-300, depending on traffic. And you have to pay airport fee-THB 50- to the taxi driver.

- Please see map to our hostel in Airbnb's mobile and internet application.

Our office hour is 7:00 am – 10:00 pm. 

If you want to check-in after our office hour, please inform us in advance.

- No pets allowed
- No smoking allowed
- No parties and events allowed

name: C01 - Economy Alone @ Pratunam Bangkok,
address: Khet Ratchathewi, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Not safe or suitable for infants (under 2 years) and pets
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
If you are looking for a nice hotel located right in the heart of Bangkok’s shopping paradise that is just a 10-minute walk from either Airport Rail Link or BTS Skytrain Station, Vince hotel is your absolute choice.

How can you experience the true Bangkok flair unless you visit Pratunam, one of the most vibrant, bustling neighborhood in Bangkok. While Pratunam is packed with dozens of hotels, Vince is not just another hotel here where you just check in and sleep. It’s a stylishly hybrid hotel boasting a uniquely innovative interior and charming decor. ‘Fun’, ‘easy’, and ‘style’ are what you will experience while staying here.

Behind the stunningly modern facade, inside is a classical-looking hotel with a contemporary edge. It’s like classic and modern design languages in dialog. A warm Siamese welcome awaits your arrival. The minute you arrive, you know you are somewhere where you can be yourself, kick back and relax. Let our professional, friendly staff attend to your desires. Here at Vince, you can always expect new twists.

- Private Room with inside toilet
- Queen bed
- Air conditioner
- Hot Shower separate with toilet
- Dressing table with half body mirror
- Hair Dryer
- Kettle
- In room safe
- Open wore drop and cloth hanker
- Shampoo, Hand wash, Shower Gel and body lotion are provide on refill bottle
- Drinking water, Tea, coffee set are provided 1 time on arrival date

...

Pratunam Market

- Cleaning service 300 THB / time (included all linen changed)
- Breakfast 220 THB net / pax for buffet breakfast (advance purchase at front desk to get this rate)
- Set of amenities (included toothbrush, comb, razor, shower cab, sanitary bag, cotton bud) will be charge 100 THB
- Drinking water set pack  2 bottles will be charge 60 THB
- Extra bed with full bedding faciliteis will be charge 600 THB
- Extra towel, bathmat, Bathrobe will be charge 100 THB / Pcs. (1 time pay no charge)
- Extra Pillow, blanket, bedsheet is 200 THB / pcs. ( 1 time pay no charge)

name: NUE Noble ngamwongwan
address: Mueang Nonthaburi District, Nonthaburi, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
เติมพลังชีวิตด้วยแสงแดดยามเช้าได้ตั้งแต่ที่ริมหน้าต่าง ที่พักตั้งอยู่ในใจกลางเมืองนนทบุรี มีห้องนอน ห้องนั่งเล่น ห้องครัว ห้องน้ำ และระเบียงเหมาะสำหรับผู้เข้าพัก 2 ท่าน เป็นยูนิตส่วนตัว 

ใกล้ห้างสรรพสินค้าขนาดใหญ่ เดอะมอลล์ ไลฟ์ สโตร์ งามวงศ์วาน การเดินทางโดยรถไฟฟ้าไปใจกลางเมืองหรือทุกที่ในกรุงเทพได้สะดวก สยามพารากอน อยู่ห่างออกไป 18 กม. ส่วนวัดพระแก้วอยู่ห่างออกไป 18 กม. สนามบินที่ใกล้ที่สุด คือ สนามบินนานาชาติดอนเมืองอยู่ห่างจากที่พัก 10 กม.

- Sri-rat Express 
- Bus Stop (Bus AC No.522 go to Victory Monument by express way)

name: 2 Night Cruise from Bangkok to Ayutthaya
address: Bangkok, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Not safe or suitable for children (0-12) and pets
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 1PM and check out by 4PM
sectionedDescription/description:
Cruise the Chao Phraya river onboard the Mekhala, a traditional Thai rice barge. The Mekhala is one of only a few boats that offer an overnight cruise between Bangkok and Ayutthaya, a former capital of Thailand.  

The price includes accommodation in an air-conditioning cabin, all meals during the cruise and tours during the stops.

The Mekhala boat has only six cabins. Each cabin is equipped with amenities and has an en-suite bathroom. 

You will get on the Mekhala at the Oriental Pier, Bangkok, at 1.30 pm. Then, start cruising upstream passing the  magnificent Grand Palace and the Temple of Dawn. Observe the way of lives of people who live along the river.

In the afternoon, you will visit a fresh market where local people shop for food and fresh produce.

At sunset, the boat will dock at a Buddhist temple located in a tranquil rural village. An exquisite candlelit dinner of Thai cuisine will be served on the deck. You will spend the night in an air-conditioning cabin.

The next day, you will visit a riverside village in the morning. Then, Enjoy a tour at Bang Pa In Summer Palace. Discover a complex of royal residences originally built around the 17th century to serve as a summer palace of Ayutthaya kings and reconstructed in the 19th century. We will stop at the pier near the summer palace for an overnight stay.

On the last day, we will start cruising back to Bangkok. En route, we will stop for a tour at an ethnic Mon community and witness its unique culture and craftsmanship of clay pottery. Take part in a pottery making class with local artisan.

Return to Bangkok about 16:00 hrs.

Enjoy a panoramic view of the river from the deck.

This is not a private cruise. You will share common area with other guests in the boat.

The Oriental pier where you embark and disembark is located near the Mandarin Oriental Hotel, Bangkok.

If you want to book more than one cabin, please write to me.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: No pet No Extra guest who is not in the list
sectionedDescription/interaction: This is not a private cruise. You will share common area with other guests in the boat.

sectionedDescription/summary:
位于市中心素坤逸Sukhumuvit39巷，1000㎡超现实奇境城市大宅。三层别墅🏡，5卧6卫。中央空调、洗衣机、烘干机、WiFi🛜、开放式中、西厨房，院内私家停车区可停3-4辆🚘，专职保姆打造优质环境。
        曼谷最高12M炫酷奢华KTV🎤，商务洽谈的优选亦是举家欢聚的绝佳场，英国玛田矩阵音响、专业级舞美灯效、200寸巨幕LED电视、法国罗奇堡家私、尽享极致视听盛宴。“最美夕阳”🌇落脚于此，暮风徐徐摆渡船🛶激起水浪🌊交响的篇章，荟萃东南亚珍稀植物🌳、精心造景尽享贵族至尊。1.2层均设有Lounge区，270°落地窗，多处网红拍照打卡区，永生苔藓墙、顶尖设计师款沙发，尽情捕捉美好瞬间，让泰兰德的夏天永不停歇。独特的中空无边泳池，白墙蓝池交织出🇹🇭Bangkok梦想。

name: NaturBliss Boutique House
address: Bangkok, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 2PM - 10PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
My place is close to the airport, art and culture, . You’ll love my place because of the people, the location, the neighborhood, and the outdoors space. My place is good for couples, business travelers, families (with kids), big groups and holiday.

Naturbliss Resort Village , located in Ramintra village, is a fantastic option if you're travelling as a group or value having your own space and the Boutique home is family-friendly, perfect for holiday home and a transit hotel between on Don Mueang International Airport and Suvarnabhumi Airport, Bangkok, is a popular choice for travelers. Guests can enjoy services from traditional Thai massage shop nearby and sightseeing attraction nearby. Guests interested in exploring the Pottery Village can visit Koh Kret Island in the Chao Phraya River which is accessible within a 30-minute drive from the property.

The property is near big shopping center as well as traditional Thai culture areas, such as famous Lumpinee Muay Thai boxing Stadium, Fashion Island and the promenade Shopping Mall and Central Shopping Mall, Safari World Zoo, Panya Golf Club, Impact Arena Exhibition & Convention Center, Kwan-Riam Floating Market, Koh Krat, Siam Park, Moca Museum, Chatuchak Weekend Market, Siam Niramit show, Thai Temples, restaurant and nearby Phyathai Hospital

We provide 24 hourse room service and always accessible by phone. We can assist you with personal local advise on good food, services, places.

Attractions nearby : 
Fashion Island Shopping Mall , the promenade Shopping Mall and Central Shopping Mall, Safari World Zoo, Golf Club, Lumpinee Muay Thai boxing Stadium, Impact Arena Exhibition & Convention Center, Kwan-Riam Floating Market, Koh Krat, Siam Park , Thai Temples and restaurant. The hotel is located around 35 minutes from Suvarnabhumi Airport, Thailand. Seven Eleven, family markt and Tesco Lotus Supermarket are just near the hotel and restaurant is just 50 metres from the hotel.

1. Get on the the shuttle bus from Suvarnabhumi Airport to the public transportation terminal in Suvarnabhumi Airport . 
Next, Get on the first station by bus no.554. From 20 mins.(approx.) the bus will pass the Fashion Island shopping mall. From Fashion Island shopping mall 2 kms. then ask the bus driver to get off the bus station at km.7 or Ramintra 67 ( in thai call ' Kilo jed' ). Bus no.554 Bus fares 35 THB ( One-way ). Afer getting off the bus station 'Kilo Jed' then across the bridge , turn left and go straight 30 meters, across the road , the hotel is just next to seven eleven convenience store.

2.Taxi Service at Suvarnabhumi Airport. 
Public taxi stand is located on Level 1 (Ground Level).
- Contact Taxi counter, Level 1 - Ground Level, near entrances 3, 4, 7 and 8.
- Pick up area: taxi stand Level 1 - Ground Level
- Taxi fare: metered taxi fare plus 50 THB airport surcharge, expressway fees , Taxi meter cost
200 THB (approx.)( One-way ) During rush hours, it might cost more. 
- Public taxis serving Bangkok's Suvarnabhumi airport must be less than 5 years old.
- Public taxi drives must be certified by Airports of Thailand. 

3. Transfers & Ground Transport 
Private Arrival Transfer or Shared Airport Transfer : Need airport transfer from Suvarnabhumi International Airport or Don Mueang International airport to NaturBliss Boutique House . Save time! by booking this private comfortable and efficient airport before you land in Thailand.

Check-in: from 2.00 pm. Check-out: 12.00 am. The reception is closed from 22.00 hours till 07.30 hours. You can still check in after 22.00 hours by informing us in advance or contact our room service 24 hrs. You can also checkout before 07.30 hours if needed. There is an option to drop off your key door and contact our room service 24 hrs. if you have an early departure. Early arrivals are welcome to use our luggage storage by contact our receiption to get the luggage tag and sign the receipt luggage tag. Please make sure you have your receipt luggage tag with you on the day you check out from the hostel. Towels are included in all rooms. Age limit is 15 to 60 years. We have an age limit of 60 years. (If you are older, we request you to book in double room ). This is a non-smoking premises.

sectionedDescription/description: Escape to Tree Villa, your perfect blend of tranquility and city vibes. Nestled near Sathorn's nightlife, this design gem offers 6 bedrooms across three stylish extensions (1BR, 2BR, 3BR), accommodating 12 guests. Revel in our shared living room and pool. With Sukhumvit a quick 15-min taxi ride via Rama 3 and 4, enjoy seamless access to urban delights. Ideal for those who cherish both peaceful retreats and lively explorations. The house is seminar friendly
sectionedDescription/houseRules: Our villa is event-friendly until 6 PM. Please note, in compliance with Thai law, parties are not permitted after 8 PM. We're located in a family-friendly neighborhood and ask our guests to respect the peaceful environment by keeping noise to a minimum.
sectionedDescription/name: Tree Sathorn House Villa
sectionedDescription/summary: Escape to Tree Villa, your perfect blend of tranquility and city vibes. Nestled near Sathorn's nightlife, this design gem offers 6 bedrooms across three stylish extensions (1BR, 2BR, 3BR), accommodating 12 guests. Revel in our shared living room and pool. With Sukhumvit a quick 15-min taxi ride via Rama 3 and 4, enjoy seamless access to urban delights. Ideal for those who cherish both peaceful retreats and lively explorations. The house is seminar friendly

name: Stunning, Modern & Contemporary
address: Pathum Wan, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description: Your ultimate million dollar home away from home! Located in Bangkok's most elite neighborhood, and nestled in the epicenter of the luxury shopping and five-star dining district, a five-minute walk to Lumpini Park and Central Embassy shopping center. European imported furnishings and fixtures, including Italian flooring and a bespoke Italian kitchen. Furniture from designers like Philip Starck, Ligne Roset, & Matthew Hilton, with accents from Fornasetti & Alessi. Pool, fitness, sauna, and steam.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: The condominium building boasts exclusivity and high-security measures, with round-the-clock staff dedicated to admitting only residents and their authorized guests. However, owing to the lavish European designer furnishings and Italian Fornaseti and Allesi accents adorning the unit, we enforce a stringent no-guest policy. Only the lessee of the unit will be granted entry.

name: 市中心庄园别墅 可住18人 占地2000㎡ 超大泳池 豪华ktv
address: Khet Suan Luang, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
位于曼谷繁华的On Nut 地区。
周边配套：距离7-11超市450米、Rca夜店街5.5公里、曼谷最繁华商业区素坤逸6公里。
   整个庄园占地2000平方米，9卧6卫，可容纳18+人同时入住。
  泳池：120平米(12m*10m)曼谷唯一私人超大泳池，达到普通公共泳池难以企及的规模，宛如一颗璀璨的宝石点缀整间别墅。
 可容纳20余人的私人豪华KTV绝无仅有，矩阵式专业音响，舞美激光秀，尽情释放激情。
   庄园内三栋楼宇风格各异，超大客厅含有罗奇堡家私、网红打卡草莓熊背景墙、3米高彩兔镜、未来女战士等等拍摄元素，随意角度都可拍出与众不同的美图，让您的朋友圈点赞爆棚。配备现代化的设施，可享受空调、百寸电视、洗衣机、烘干机、WiFi、蓝牙音响等，同有烤箱、冰箱等厨房设施。赛博朋克与森林系中古风庄园级体量民宿，既融合了未来的科技感，又结合了自然园林的舒适氧吧体验感。无论是沐浴阳光、纳凉休憩，庭院休闲区精心设计的布局让人感受到无尽的惬意与放松。
    另配备2名专职管家负责庄园的安全和卫生环境。

位于曼谷繁华的On Nut 地区。
周边配套：距离7-11超市450米、Rca夜店街5.5公里
曼谷最繁华商业区素坤逸6公里。

name: Mea Nam Luxury Suite 90 sqm
address: Bangkok, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 2PM - 12AM (midnight) and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Our spirit is to create a luxury experience embracing every moment and every individual with sincerity, integrity and a passion for service.

Our luxury urban resort in Bangkok providing sincere and intuitive service for our guests, staff and partners, whilst creating a memorable experience for all.

All Mae Nam Suites are located in the Main Residence adjacent to the spa, with convenient access to our gym, library and meeting room.

Amenities:

- Riverside infinity pool (shared) 
- Breakfast in the restaurant
- WiFi
- Butler service
- Private boat shuttle between hotel & Saphan Taksin.

Size: 90 sqm

Distance to:

Throne Hall

> 15 minutes
Wat Po
Grand Palace Emerald Buddha Temple of Dawn
> 30 minutes
Silom Road
Siam Paragon
BTS skytrain at Taksin Bridge Chatuchak weekend market
> 45 minutes to
Suvarnabhumi International Airport Don Muang Airport

Private boat shuttle between hotel & Saphan Taksin.

address: Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
Our cozy villa is only 14 km. Away from BKK Airport. (25-30 mins)

We’re a small boutique hotel offering an option for a small group of travelers who interested to rent the whole floor which includes 7 rooms; one triple room for 3 persons , 2 superior double rooms, and 4 deluxe double rooms can accommodate up to 15 people. Only a triple room has shower. The other rooms have bathtubs in each room. 

Our villa has outdoor saltwater pool, barbecue area, and a fitness center within the building.

7 rooms that you will get to stay are on the 3rd floor of the villa! The whole floor is yours.

 35 square meters room with shower for 3 persons - 1 king size bed, 1 single bed

Breakfast area by the pool, outdoor swimming pool, gym, BBQ Grill (shared with other guests)

During your stay my staff will be there helping you with all the luggages while checking in and out, getting a cab, booking massage, ordering food etc.

Calm and peaceful neighborhood

name: Duplex Pool Suite, 89sqm - Chao Phraya River
address: Khet Khlong San, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Located in Bangkok, 6.3 km from Wat Arun, the property provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. All rooms are fitted with a kettle, while selected rooms come with a balcony and others also offer pool views. Each room has bed linen and towels.

At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving international cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested.

Wat Pho is 6.4 km from the hotel, while Temple of the Emerald Buddha is 6.8 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 30 km from the property.

name: Marriott VC at the Empire Place 3BD Sleeps 8
address: Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 4PM and check out by 10AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Embrace the mystery and magic of Thailand. Located within a high-end condominium residence, Marriott Vacation Club at The Empire Place puts you in the heart and soul of Bangkok. Here, you're among the diverse and unique culture of locals, and perfectly positioned to fill your Bangkok vacation with the ancient architectural wonders and modern marvels of Thailand.
Marriott Vacation Club at The Empire Place is conveniently located near Sathorn Road and Taksin Bridge.

A vacation home that feels like home.

Located in the heart of Bangkok, Marriott Vacation Club at The Empire Place provides convenient access to the city’s modern rail services. Explore this magnificent metropolis and experience its unique and diverse culture. Or retreat from the city and enjoy an array of on-site amenities just steps from your spacious apartment.

3-bedroom/3-bath apartment
Approximately 1,680 square feet
Sleeps up to 8

General Amenities:
Alarm Clock
Coffee Maker
Pillows: Down/Feather
Pull Out Sofa Bed


Kitchen Amenities:
Electric Cooking Stove
Refrigerator
Microwave Oven
Toaster
Pots, Pans, serving dishes
Silverware and Dishware

EXERCISE & RECREATION

Pools
Swimming pool with jacuzzi
Children's pool
Sports and Fitness
Fitness center
Sauna room
Steam room
Tennis court
Children's play area


SERVICES
Newspaper in lobby
High-speed internet
Concierge desk

Resort Amenities

Located in the heart of Bangkok
Fitness center with sauna and steam rooms
Tennis court
Swimming pool with whirlpool spa and children’s pool
Children’s play area
High-speed Internet access in apartments*

Dining
During your stay in Bangkok, you’ll enjoy diverse dining options nearby. Choose from Asian-fusion and traditional Thai delights to international cuisines such as Italian, Indian, Mediterranean and Japanese.

Exercise & recreation
Maintain your workout routine with an on-site fitness center, including sauna and steam rooms. Serve up some fun with an invigorating game of tennis. Or relax by the outdoor pool while children stay active in the play area.


Spa
Take a break from the pulse of the city and unwind with a pampering treatment at one of the area’s many spas.

Discover historic and modern marvels
Whether you prefer touring ancient monuments or exploring modern marvels such as multilevel shopping malls, you’ll find something to make your Thailand adventure truly memorable.

Arts & culture
No trip to Bangkok is complete without a visit to the Grand Palace, home of the Temple of the Emerald Buddha. Camera-worthy opportunities abound in this city landmark consisting of several buildings with highly decorated architectural designs. Within the complex, Wat Phra Kaew enshrines the famed Emerald Buddha.

Family fun
Discover unique treasures at Chatuchak Weekend Market, Thailand’s largest market covering more than 35 acres and upwards of 5,000 stalls. It’s a bargain-hunter’s paradise with thousands of local products for sale, including food, clothing, handicrafts and more.

Shopping
For more modern shopping opportunities, visit MBK Center, an eight-story shopping center with 2,300 shops offering everything from mobile phones and electronics to furniture and fashion. Central Chidlom Shopping Center is a one-stop shopping destination with virtually any and everything you can imagine under one roof. It also offers special services for visitors, including interpreters, currency exchange and a shipping service.

Tours
When the afternoon Thai temperatures rise, enjoy a refreshing Klong (canal) tour and visit the majestic Royal Barges National Museum on the north bank of the Bangkok Noi Canal. See magnificent barges used in royal river processions, including one more than 50 meters long.

Owner favorites

Tour the Grand Palace and the Emerald Buddha Temple
Visit the Royal Barges Museum
Take a dinner cruise along the Chao Phraya river
Relax with a traditional Thai massage
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
From 16:00

Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in.

Check-out
Until 10:00

Cancellation/
prepayment
Cancellation and prepayment policies vary according to accommodation type. Please check what conditions may apply to each option when making your selection.

name: 五房四卫 巴洛克艺术风格 私人泳池 带保姆
address: Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
曼谷X5别墅🌳
                     ---XIANG豪华系泰国民宿
  🏡天鹅绒、锦缎、水晶等郁郁葱葱的选材以及与众不同的配色构成了自由、毫无保留的宇宙。复古、优雅、精致、奢华，如梦如幻，夜晚泳池旁、庭院间、鸡蛋花树下萤火虫灯星光点点，爱和梦的实体呈现。

        5卧4卫，私家豪华游泳池，宽敞庭院，超大卧室，家庭房，享受空调、百寸电视、洗衣机、烘干机、WiFi、蓝牙音响等现代设施。烤箱、冰箱设备齐全的中央厨房里展示您的厨艺。更有一名专职保姆打造优品🏡环境卫生。

您可以拥有使用整栋别墅五卧四卫和独立的泳池，我们还有24小时保姆为您提供每日清洁服务，如果您需要早餐服务，请提前跟我们预约，我们有付费早餐服务和付费接机包车服务

无论您是来旅游还是短期居住，我们都乐于与您分享曼谷的各种生活体验，希望您可以把我们这里当作您在曼谷的家一样～我们也一直在努力！

在您确认定定房后，我们会提供中文、英文English客服服务！有任何问题随时与我们联系～

Feel free to contact with me when you need any support~

name: X2 独立别墅泰式绝美泳池 24小时保姆 台球桌 私人KTV

sectionedDescription/description:
🌴曼谷“香印”2号Bangna别墅🌴
                                      
    900㎡的曼谷豪华别墅，光与多面积阴翳形成的私家庭院，拥有超大中央泳池，在水中尽情畅游。景观设计别具匠心，热带植物、波光粼粼的海洋系美陈装置、偶尔垂落的鸡蛋花，营造出自然浪漫的氛围。🏡是拍照打卡的绝佳点，无论是阳光下、泳池边，还是夜晚的灯光下，都能拍出高颜值的美

    🏡有4间卧室，可以轻松容纳8-10人入住。舒适的大床、空调，让您享受安静私密的休息空间。5个独立卫生间都有干湿分离的淋浴间和洗漱用品，主卧的冲浪双人浴缸让人充满遐想。

无论您是来旅游还是短期居住，我们都乐于与您分享曼谷的各种生活体验，希望您可以把我们这里当作您在曼谷的家一样～我们也一直在努力！

sectionedDescription/description:

位置请在搜索 Baan Sukjai

民宿坐落于曼谷素坤逸地区的心脏地带，为您提供了一个奢华舒适的度假体验。度假或者是商务出差，这个拥有3间卧室、4间卫生间和3个车库的别墅都能满足您的需求。

三卧四卫两厅，户外游泳池。民宿坐落于曼谷素坤逸地区的心脏地带，为您提供了一个奢华舒适的度假体验。度假或者是商务出差，这个拥有3间卧室、4间卫生间和3个车库的别墅都能满足您的需求。
大厅精致的雕刻细节营造出宫廷的氛围，让您仿佛置身于皇家殿堂之中。室内装饰以暖色调为主，充满温暖和舒适感。厨房设备一应俱全，您可以尽情发挥您的烹饪技巧。

别墅外的庭院是一个放松和娱乐的理想场所。您可以在奢华的户外区域打卡拍照，或者在泳池畅游，尽情享受阳光和清新的空气。让您和家人或朋友共度美好时光。

此外，别墅还提供了充足的停车空间，方便您随时停放您的私家车辆。
除了别墅本身的豪华设施，曼谷素坤逸地区也是曼谷最繁华的商业区，您可以前往附近的商场和夜市，或者skybar 以及泰国最著名的夜店一条街RCA.从街头小吃到高级餐厅，再到夜店，红灯区全部近在咫尺。

无论您是追求浪漫之旅还是商务考察，皇家宫廷别墅都是您在泰国曼谷地区的完美选择。预订您的住宿，让我们为您打造一段令人难忘的奢华体验。我们期待着为您提供无与伦比的服务，并让您的曼谷之行成为一段美好的回忆。

sectionedDescription/description:
梦境藏海🌊几度/夕阳🌇遍照曼谷
        日落跌进星海✨
        留给不昧旅人的着迷😍
        极致魅惑的欢喜💋
       当一扇16M枢轴大门开启，呈现给您的是私藏度假天堂。这里有波光粼粼的瀑布大泳池，闪耀着万象光芒；看不尽的星海，椰林环绕的城池；现代美学设计，客厅320°落地玻璃窗，3米长的北极熊网红沙发会给您带来一丝清凉，松鼠🐿️清晨随时到访；阳台为落日公路露营🏕️地，实现您未完成的度假梦想；在别墅内还有金色海浪风动空中酒Sky  Lounge Bar，200寸I MAX投影幕布，矩阵式BMB KTV可以和您的朋友尽情歌唱；花式台球案伴着🍷以球会友，以球传情；星级酒店标准床品拥JIA人入梦乡～万千块乐高积木增添童趣的色彩，在打卡墙前拍摄📸靓丽照片，美爆pyq～

        5卧4卫，可容纳10人入住，设有家庭房。享受空调、洗衣机、烘干机、WiFi、蓝牙音响等现代设施；烤箱、冰箱设备齐全的中、西厨房；专属停车区停放您的私家车；配备一名专职保姆打造优品🏡环境卫生。

name: Rueanthai Raminthra - Wedding Villa
address: Bangkok, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in time is flexible and check out by 3PM
sectionedDescription/description:
The perfect venue for your wedding ceremony or event.

We welcome you to celebrate a memorable marriage at this marvelous traditional Lanna-style teak house located in a splendid garden of 1600m2. Our reception and banquet facility has all features to accommodate your need from elegant rooms for the unforgettable wedding ceremony to a beautifully decorated dining area with a capacity of seating up to 220 guests.

Guests can access all areas of the property with no limitation.

Guests will always be provided assistance throughout their stay (person nearby and/or available by phone).

Our venue is conveniently located 5 minutes away drive from Ram Intra Expressway exit. Big parking is available.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: No specific rules really.  However, as it is a wooden house, we would like to invite our guests to refrain from smoking inside the premises (ground-floor is OK) and to go upstairs with shoes.

name: New Orleans Suites 2 Bldg/ 40PPL/ 20BD/ 24BATH
address: Khet Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Not safe or suitable for infants (under 2 years) and pets
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
+ Bourbon St, located on Sky Train Line. Convenient downtown area, comfortable travel around and atmosphere of the city lifestyle from day time to night light.

+ A resident decoration inspired by a street building in New Orleans. A historic street of the third largest metropolis in the heart of the French Quarter of New Orleans USA, a premier residential and a famous place of nightclubs lined by the 1940s and 1950s. Most famous is the annual Mardi Gras celebration.

+ Building A + Building B.

1. Our residents, we provide restaurant service open for public and our guests. 2 floors of restaurant and roof top banquet room at 7th floor. 

2. Open daily from 7:00 ( Morning )  - 01:00 ( After Midnight ).

3. Special : Roof Top Banquet Room.
A privacy place for your privacy party. We would love to serve all our residents to enjoy their dinner or party we offer our residents Free  of charge for 3 hours, just  order up to 10,000 Baht food and beverages from our restaurant services at 12:00 ( noon ) - 24:00 ( Midnight ).

4. New Orleans Resident is included 2 buildings A and B (Right and Left Wing)

5. Suitable for a big group travel stay maximum 42 people. 

6. Building A 
There are 3 apartments with 10 STUDIO ROOMS + 12 BATHROOMS + 2 LIVING ROOMS on three floors from 4th to 6th floor included;

6.1) 4th floor apartment;
3 Bedrooms + 1 Living room + 4 Private Bathrooms ( 6 Guests ).

6.2) 5th floor apartment;
3 Bedrooms + 1 Living room + 4 Private Bathrooms ( 6 Guests ).

6.3) 6th floor apartment;
4 Bedrooms + 4 Private Bathrooms ( 8 Guests ).

7. Building B 
Building B is separated 2 wings as Left Wing ( B1) & Right Wing (B2). There are 8 Studio Rooms + 2 Suite Rooms.

7.1) 2nd floor;
2 Studio Rooms + 2 Bathrooms (B1) ( 4 Guests ).
1 Suite Room + 2 Private Bathrooms + 1 Living room (B2) ( 2 Guests ).

7.2) 3rd floor;
2 Studio Rooms + 2 Private Bathrooms (B1) ( 4 Guests ).
1 Suite Room + 2 Private Bathrooms + 1 Living room (B2) ( 2 Guests ).

7.3) 4th floor;
4 Studio Rooms + 4 Private Bathrooms (B1+B2) ( 8 Guests ).

7.5) 5th floor;
2 Studio Rooms + 2 Private Bathrooms (B1+B2) ( 8 Guests ).

All bedrooms has;
+ Air-Conditioning.
+ Comfy memory foam hotel standard mattress.
+ Shower heaters.
+ Closets.
+ Large flat screen TV & cable TV.
+ Safe box
+ Hangers
+ Coffee & tea
+ Glasses
+ Coffee cups

For your safety and convenience,  there is an elevator reach to all floors, our guests are provided the house key for main entrance and individual room key card. In every room, safety box and safety code individually. 

Offering the accommodation features Air-Conditioning, a flat screenTV and sofa seating area. It comes with the slippers, an electric kettle, cups, glasses and refrigerator. ฺBody Towels,  Hair Towels, free toiletries, shower caps can be found in private bathroom. 

Internet; WIFI is available in the room and free of charge.

Daily House Keeping service for all rooms.  Moreover, laundry service DIY., we provide the automatic vending laundry machine, also provide the special care laundry and ironing services are additional charge. and of course catering service, we also provide a la carte and other menu serve through your room.

Parking, free private parking is available on site (reservation is not needed)

Our neighborhoods are the land mark of place, start from the place in front of alley, is a famous cinema and fitness center, also the coffee club on the ground floor, next to is a community mall Park Lane a shopping center that you can find many shopping brands, restaurant, banks and supper market. Next to our Boubon Street are many restaurant, international restaurants all you can choose, and 500 meter away (approximate) A convenient store Big C and Home Decoration Mall INDEX are ready for your shopping. This alley is connectable to other Thonglo alley the nearby famous place dining and unique shopping boutique and also a famous Japanese Shopping Mall     DON DON DONKI the FOOD, FUN, CULTURE & AMUSEMENT MALL.

New Orleans is the good location, located the central of Sukhumvit Road on SKY TRAIN routes. A famous place we recommend is the Science Center for Education (Bangkok Planetarium), the top hit presentation is Astronomy presented on dome ceiling inside the hall. Reach this place is very easy, Science Center is opposite the Cineplex, next to the center is a Transportation Station, The central of transportation to the east of Bangkok, to the beach city such as PATAYA, CHONBURI, RAYONG etc. 
Travel by the BTS Sky Train, is very convenience that keep you going so fast around Bangkok and connected to MRT subway of Bangkok. We recommended the nearest shopping center the Luxury and the shopping district of Bangkok M District just 10 minutes by sky train (approximate) or 5 minutes (approximate) by sky train to Thong Lo Alley shop and dine inside the alley will be with you a whole day activity. For more information, we can advise, please ask.

sectionedDescription/description:
Modern 5 story Thong Lo townhouse.

Great location in the heart of Thong Lo, walking distance to high quality restaurants, grocery stores, night clubs, etc.

High speed fibre optic internet. Main room has a huge 4k TV with Netflix.

We turned the bottom floor into a workspace, so if you wish to work from home there's a desk available for you. There's two of us currently living here, we're in our mid-late 20s and both work in the tech/crypto space.

sectionedDescription/name: 曼谷市区豪华别墅 度假圣地 3米长超大泳池 管家服务 KTV包房
sectionedDescription/summary:
当一扇16米的枢轴大门开启，呈现给您的是私藏度假天堂。
这里有波光粼粼的瀑布大泳池，闪耀着万象光芒；
看不尽的星海，椰林环绕的城池；
现代美学设计，客厅320°落地玻璃窗
3米长的北极熊网红沙发会给您带来一丝清凉，松鼠清晨随时到访；
阳台为落日公路露营地，实现您未完成的度假梦想；在别墅内还有金色海浪风动空中酒Sky  Lounge Bar，200寸I MAX投影幕布，矩阵式BMB KTV可以和您的朋友尽情歌唱；
花式台球桌伴着美酒可以以球会友，以球传情；星级酒店标准床品拥人入梦乡～
万千块乐高积木增添童趣的色彩，在打卡墙前拍摄靓丽照片，美爆朋友圈

name: Designer Pool Villa near Emquartier
address: Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 4PM and check out by 10AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Experience the epitome of Scandinavian style in our 5-bedroom, 5-bathroom City Center Pool Villa.

Bathed in natural light, this tranquil oasis offers sleek design, a private pool, and lush surroundings. With modern amenities and a central location, immerse yourself in the vibrant city while enjoying the serenity of this luxurious retreat.

Perfect for families or groups seeking an unforgettable Scandinavian-inspired getaway. Book now for an exceptional experience!

As you enter the villa, you will immediately notice the contemporary design and the clever use of space. The open-plan living room with high ceilings is bright and airy, with large windows that allow plenty of natural light to flood the room. The living room leads directly to the pool area, where you can relax and enjoy the tropical climate.

The villa has a fully equipped modern kitchen, complete with high-end appliances, sleek cabinetry, and ample counter space. The dining area is adjacent to the kitchen, making it easy to entertain guests while cooking.

The five spacious bedrooms are designed to offer maximum comfort and relaxation. Each bedroom has its own en-suite bathroom, complete with a rain shower, modern fixtures, and luxurious finishes. The bedrooms are elegantly furnished, with plush beds, soft linens, and plenty of storage space.

The outdoor area is designed to offer the ultimate in luxury and relaxation. The private pool is the perfect place to cool off on a hot day, while the poolside lounge chairs provide a comfortable spot to soak up the sun. The villa also has a covered terrace, complete with outdoor seating and a BBQ area, making it the perfect spot for al fresco dining and entertaining.

Overall, your 5 bedroom 5 bathroom luxury pool villa in Scandinavian style is a stunning example of modern architecture and design, offering the perfect combination of luxury, comfort, and style.

Less than 10 minutes to Phrom Phong/ Thong Lor BTS.

Nearby:
-Emquartier, Emporium
-The Commons/ Beer Belly
-DONKI Mall Thonglor
-Samitivej Sukhumvit Hospital
-J Avenue Thonglor

Three queen mattresses can be provided to accommodate up to 16 guests upon request.

Perfect for families or groups seeking an unforgettable Scandinavian-inspired getaway. Book now for an exceptional experience!
