name: 3 Bedrooms River View Balcony with Breakfast
address: Khet Bang Rak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 2PM - 2AM (next day) and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
lebua at State Tower has been certified as a SHA Extra Plus hotel accredited by the Tourism Authority of Thailand.

The suite of choice for large groups and families seeking the ultimate five-star lebua luxury experience, with plush interiors, unforgettable city views.

Two king bedrooms, One twin bedroom, Two full bathrooms, One guest bathroom, Living room, Kitchen and dining area

• Daily breakfast at luxury hotel 
• Wifi
• Coffee making machine
• 266m² / 2,863ft²

Security Deposit THB 5,000 by cash or credit will be collected at arrival , this money will be return after check out

Known for its finest cuisines, the hotel features a range of dining outlets including the 2 Michelin-starred Mezzaluna restaurant and Chef's Table, Sirocco and Sky Bar and the award-winning Pan-Asian restaurant - Breeze. All restaurants and bars offer spectacular views of the river and the city of Bangkok. A selection of bars such as lebua No.3 - The newest modern, upscale Gin and Caviar & Vodka Bar, Flute - Champagne Bar and Chivas - alfresco 64 are also available on site.

• Mezzaluna (2 Michelin Starred) : Open 5 - 11 pm Monday - Saturday 
• Chef's Table (2 Michelin Starre) : Open 5 - 11 pm Tuesday - Sunday 
• Sirocco: Open 5 - 11 pm
• Breeze: Open 5 - 11 pm 
• lebua No.3 - The newest modern, upscale Gin and Caviar & Vodka Bar: Open 5 - 11 pm
• Alfresco 64 - A Chivas Bar: Open 5 - 11 pm
• Breeze: Open 5 - 11 pm 
• Flute A Perrier Jouet Bar: Open 5 - 11 pm 
• Ocean 52: Open 5 - 11 pm
• Sky Bar: 4 - 11 pm

RESTAURANT POLICIES

Based on the invaluable feedback of our guests, we adhere to specific policies at The Dome at lebua. Our standards are designed to ensure that all guests of our restaurants and bars are afforded the pleasant atmosphere they have come to expect, and to ensure their privacy, comfort and safety.

SMART CASUAL DRESS CODE

Athletic or sports uniforms, slippers, beach sandals and flip-flops are not permitted at our Michelin starred restaurants, Mezzaluna and Chef's Table. Gentlemen must avoid any sleeveless clothing, shorts and open shoes. Please note that our smart casual dress code applies to children as well.


PHOTOGRAPHY

Photography is permitted at our establishments, with the exception of select areas. The use of drones, tripods, extensions and external flash units are not allowed.

CHILDREN

Children are welcome at our restaurants however the dress code applies to children at our Michelin starred restaurants, Mezzaluna and Chef's Table. Bar entrants must be at least 20 years of age.


RESTAURANT POLICY

Reservations can be amended or canceled up to 72 hours prior to the reservation time without incurring any charge.

Any cancellation, no-show, or amendments made less than 72 hours prior to the reservation time will forfeit the deposit. Once we receive your booking inquiry, we will send you an email with a link to an online payment gateway system called “Red Dot Payment”, a secure online way of paying with your credit card. Please note that we cannot guarantee your booking until this deposit has been received.

CANCELLATION POLICY

Any reservation made by a guest/company can be amended or canceled up to 72 hours prior to the reservation time without incurring any charge. Any cancellation, no-show or change made less than 72 hours prior to the reservation time will incur a cancellation fee of the deposit which will be applied without any prior notice. The deposit will be adjusted against dinner at the restaurant.

• Full Service Hotel
• 24-hour receptionist
• 24-hour sanitized

Great location - lebua at State Tower features a prime location near the Chao Phraya River

• 1.6 km. - ICONSIAM 
• On the corner of Charoen Krung and Silom Roads, a short stroll from the Chao Phraya River.
• 5 minute walk to the BTS Sky Train Saphan Taksin Station. 
• Easy access via expressways that connect north and south Thailand
• 2.5 km. - Asiatique The Riverfront - Bangkok Night Market
• 3 km. - Siam Paragon Mall / Mahboonkrong (MBK)
• 4 km. - The Grand Palace

From its prime location near the Chao Phraya River and access to BTS SkyTrain and hi-speed expressway, the entire city is within reach, with many attractions just minutes away. It is a great choice for travelers interested in convenient public transportation, friendly locals and street food.

Deposit Policy:
• We do have refundable deposit policy at Tower Club i.e. THB 5000 per night per room and we will expect the same on arrival. It can be paid either cash or credit card. If you consume anything during your stay, the amount can be adjusted against this deposit and balance will be refunded to you. If you pay the deposit by credit card, the bank takes 1-2 weeks to reverse an international transaction

Balcony Policy:
• Suite balcony doors will be unlocked upon personal request provided all guests are at least 14 years old. A Balcony Usage Form must be signed upon check-in.

Check-In and Check-Out Time: 
• Check-in time at 1400 hrs / Check-out time at 1200 hrs (noon) 
• Early check-in is available for an extra charge, subject to availability. Guests may contact the hotel directly for further information.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
POLICY: PAYMENT 
For any payments made by credit or debit card, the card holder must be present upon check-in. He/she must also present the credit or debit card, as well as relevant identification documents.

GUARANTEE ON ARRIVAL:
Upon arrival you will need to guarantee for all expenses occurred during your stay. Additionally to the Accommodation rate, we request a guarantee per suite, per night for any incidentals. Please note that all transactions and receipts are processed in local currency.

BALCONY POLICY:
Suite balcony doors will be unlocked upon personal request provided all guests are at least 14 years old. A Balcony Usage Form must be signed upon check-in.

CHILD POLICY 0-11 YEARS:

One extra bed or baby cot will be provided as a compliment for a child aged 11 years and below. 

MAXIMUM OCCUPANTS IN OUR SUITES:

Maximum occupants in 1-Bedroom Suite is 3 persons with one extra bed (2 adults and 1 child or 2 adults and 1 infant)
Maximum occupants in 2-Bedroom Suite is 5 persons with one extra bed
Maximum occupants in 3-Bedroom Suite is 7 persons with one extra bed

TOWER CLUB LOUNGE and THE DOME AT LEBUA – DRESS CODE & POLICIES:
Based on the invaluable feedback of our guests, The Dome at lebua adheres to specific policies. Our standards are designed to ensure that all guests of our restaurants and bars are afforded the pleasant atmosphere they have come to expect, and to ensure their privacy, comfort and safety.

Smart Casual Dress Code: We do not permit athletic or sports uniforms, torn clothing, slippers, beach sandals and flip-flops. Gentlemen must avoid any sleeveless clothing, shorts, and open shoes. Please note that our smart casual dress code applies to children.

Children: Children seven and older are welcome at Sirocco and Breeze if accompanied by an adult, and children twelve and older are welcome at Mezzaluna.

Photography: Photography is permitted at our establishments, with the exception of select areas.  The use of tri-pods, extensions, and external flash units is not allowed.

Luggage: Backpacks, shopping bags, suitcases and other luggage are prohibited. We regret that we cannot provide storage for your personal belongings.

name: 高端大平层3卧3卫公寓高层270度俯瞰湄南河，近Iconsiam
address: Khet Khlong San, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description: 高端公寓位于座落在泰国的母亲河湄南河边上，270度河景房，公寓正对面是曼谷的最奢华的五星级嘉佩乐酒店和四季酒店以及公寓。公寓距离泰国最奢华的商场ICONSIAM  1.5公里。距离初次来曼谷的必打卡景点大皇宫6.6公里。距离著名景点唐人街5.6公里，公寓的河对岸就是曼谷著名的摩天夜市Asiatique 。属于优质的学区房，河对岸就是曼谷舒兹伯利国际学校。如果你担心曼谷交通拥堵，你可以到楼下乘坐公寓的专船短短几分钟即可到达轻轨口，在堵城曼谷实现“丝滑”到站的感觉。公寓楼下也有不少米其林老字号小吃店。交通便利，一下楼便是大马路，有24小时门卫看守。电梯独户到家让你更是感受到满满的高级安全感。41楼俯瞰曼谷市，总面积140+平米，三房三卫。
sectionedDescription/houseRules: 入住的公寓进入小区的时候，要是有安保人员问起来，需要说是房东的朋友。

name: Somerset Ekamai Bangkok, Three Bedroom Deluxe Apt
address: Khet Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Upscale corporate apartment living in a mixed-use development in the heart of the city, with hotel-style perks like a fitness room and outdoor pool. The onsite Cured Chamber Restaurant offers cutting-edge cuisine starring the future of the ancient tradition of food curing.

The 3-Bedroom Deluxe offers a large space for families on relocation. Each unit is fully equipped with refined furnishing, modern appliances and a private balcony. Each unit is fully-furnished with a king-size bed in the master bedroom and queen-size beds in the second and third bedroom, an en-suite bathroom with a walk-in shower and a separated shower rooms, a dining and living space with LCD Smart televisions and a fully-equipped kitchen with cooking hob & hood, microwave oven, refrigerator and a washing machine & dryer. There is also a maid’s bedroom with private shower room that can convert to an extra storage room in each unit.

LIVING/DINING
•	1 armchair
•	1-seater sofa
•	2 cushion armchairs
•	2-seater sofa
•	8-seater dining table
•	Coffee table
•	Flat screen television with cable channels
•	Work desk & chair

BATHROOM(S)
•	En-suite bathroom with towels & toiletries
•	Standing shower

BEDROOM(S)
•	1 armchair
•	1 king-size bed (master bedroom)
•	1 queen-size bed
•	1 queen-size bed (second bedroom)
•	1-seater sofa
•	Flat screen television with cable channels
•	In-room electronic safe (master bedroom)
•	Walk-in closet
•	Work desk & chair

KITCHEN(ETTE)
•	Cooker hob & hood
•	Microwave oven
•	Refrigerator
•	Washing machine & dryer

OTHER AMENITIES & SERVICES
•	Air-conditioning with individually controlled thermostats
•	Laundry & dry cleaning service *

The space offers:
Residence Features & Amenities
•	Fully-equipped kitchen
•	Home entertainment system
•	En-suite bathroom with towels & toiletries
•	Washing machine & dryer
•	Telephone (with IDD)

Rest & Relax
•	Children's play area
•	Fully-equipped gymnasium
•	Residents' lounge
•	Residents' programmes
•	Swimming pool

Comfort & Convenience
•	24-hour reception
•	Airport transfer service *
•	Carpark
•	Convenience store
•	Daily breakfast *
•	Doctor-on-call *
•	Housekeeping service
•	Limousine service *
•	Room service *
•	Shuttle bus services as per schedule

Business Matters
•	Audio visual equipment *
•	Business centre services *
•	Courier services *
•	Wireless internet connectivity (WiFi)

Security
•	24-hour security & CCTV
•	Electronic key card access

Optional Services
•	Babysitting service *
•	Car hire referrals *
•	Carpark
•	Doctor on call (upon request)
•	Laundry & dry cleaning services *

* Charge Apply

Somerset Ekamai Bangkok is conveniently located just an 6-minute walk from Ekamai BTS Skytrain station. A scheduled shuttle van service runs from the property to Ekamai BTS Skytrain station as well.  

Conveniently travel to Eastern Thailand by walking to take a tour bus at Ekamai Bus Terminal.

Only 200 meters from Property you will reach to a convenience store and just across the road you will find the Community Mall with restaurants, hair salons, supermarkets. Moreover, there is also a movie theater that can be reached within walking distance.

Ascott Cares covers 9 commitments to maintaining high levels of hygiene and cleanliness standards as well as safe distancing to continue providing our guests and staff a safe environment.

If you consume anything during your stay, the amount can be adjusted against this deposit and balance will be refunded to you. If you pay the deposit by credit card, the bank takes 1-2 weeks to reverse an international transaction

Balcony Policy:
• Suite balcony doors will be unlocked upon personal request provided all guests are at least 14 years old. A Balcony Usage Form must be signed upon check-in.

Check-In and Check-Out Time: 
• Check-in time at 1400 hrs / Check-out time at 1200 hrs (noon) 
• Early check-in is available for an extra charge, subject to availability. Guests may contact the hotel directly for further information.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
POLICY: PAYMENT 
For any payments made by credit or debit card, the card holder must be present upon check-in. He/she must also present the credit or debit card, as well as relevant identification documents.

GUARANTEE ON ARRIVAL:
Upon arrival you will need to guarantee for all expenses occurred during your stay. Additionally to the Accommodation rate, we request a guarantee per suite, per night for any incidentals. Please note that all transactions and receipts are processed in local currency.

BALCONY POLICY:
Suite balcony doors will be unlocked upon personal request provided all guests are at least 14 years old. A Balcony Usage Form must be signed upon check-in.

CHILD POLICY 0-10 YEARS:

One extra bed or baby cot will be provided as a compliment for a child aged 10 years and below. 

MAXIMUM OCCUPANTS IN OUR SUITES:

Maximum occupants in 1-Bedroom Suite is 3 persons with one extra bed (2 adults and 1 child or 2 adults and 1 infant)
Maximum occupants in 2-Bedroom Suite is 4 persons with one extra bed
Maximum occupants in 3-Bedroom Suite is 6 persons with one extra bed

TOWER CLUB LOUNGE and THE DOME AT LEBUA – DRESS CODE & POLICIES:
Based on the invaluable feedback of our guests, The Dome at lebua adheres to specific policies. Our standards are designed to ensure that all guests of our restaurants and bars are afforded the pleasant atmosphere they have come to expect, and to ensure their privacy, comfort and safety.

Smart Casual Dress Code: We do not permit athletic or sports uniforms, torn clothing, slippers, beach sandals and flip-flops. Gentlemen must avoid any sleeveless clothing, shorts, and open shoes. Please note that our smart casual dress code applies to children.

Children: Children seven and older are welcome at Sirocco and Breeze if accompanied by an adult, and children twelve and older are welcome at Mezzaluna.

Photography: Photography is permitted at our establishments, with the exception of select areas.  The use of tri-pods, extensions, and external flash units is not allowed.

Luggage: Backpacks, shopping bags, suitcases and other luggage are prohibited. We regret that we cannot provide storage for your personal belongings.

name: X6 夏日马卡龙 四卧三卫BTS 网红餐厅 日式商场
address: Khet Khlong Toei, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
极致独特的夏日马卡龙配色，灵感起源追潮到1862年法国的法式甜点。因其色彩缤纷而深受人们喜爱。 
位于素坤逸地区豪华别墅民宿，为您提供舒适与便利的住宿体验
如果您想在曼谷享受一段难忘的度假或商务之旅，遇见马卡龙X6别墅，遇见属于你的幸福浪漫和甜美气息。优雅诱惑在眼眸里绽放。
        4.5卧3卫的宽敞房间，享受空调，百寸电视，WiFi、洗衣机、烘干机和私人游泳池等现代设施。设备齐全的厨房里展示您的厨艺。更有一名专职保姆打造优品环境卫生。
        陶醉在马卡龙甜蜜的世界里，打卡拍摄精美照片，在泳池畅游，享受阳光和清爽的空气。三个免费专属停车库停放您的私家车，方便您随时出行。不仅如此，别墅位于素坤逸地区，是曼谷最繁华商业区，您可以轻松前往附近的购物中心、夜市、SKY BAR酒吧、RCA夜店一条街。从网红小吃到高档餐厅，应有尽有。
       让我们为您打造一段令人难忘的甜蜜体验吧。期待着为您提供无与伦比的服务，并让您的曼谷之行成为美好的回忆。

       4.5卧3卫的私家豪华游泳池，超大卧室，享受空调、百寸电视、洗衣机、烘干机、WiFi、蓝牙音响等现代设施。烤箱、冰箱设备齐全的中央厨房里展示您的厨艺。更有一名专职保姆和管家打造优品🏡环境卫生。

sectionedDescription/description:
We offers accommodation in Bangkok, 300 m from Queen Sirikit National Convention Center MRT Station. Free WiFi is provided .

Featuring a balcony, the air-conditioned apartments comes with a seating area and a dining area. All units feature a small kitchen equipped with a microwave and refrigerator. We also includes a fitness centre.

Suvarnabhumi International Airport is a 40-minute drive from the property.

Khlong Toei is a great choice for travellers interested in nightlife, shopping for clothes and shopping.

sectionedDescription/name: 曼谷市中心素坤逸6卧泳池别墅，可住12人
sectionedDescription/summary:
位于曼谷空提区的一个私密具有摩洛哥🏺风格别墅民宿。六卧、四卫、免费WiFi、洗衣机、烘干机、现代化厨房、专属停车位等功能区展示不凡面貌。更有一名专职保姆住在房子里可随时打扫房间。附近是曼谷最繁华商业区，可以轻松前往购物中心、夜市、SKY BAR酒吧、RCA夜店一条街。从网红小吃到高档餐厅，再到🏮区，应有尽有。
     唯一的要求就是晚上不能在室外大声，不能打扰邻居休息，泰国人喜欢安静，我们外国人过来要入乡随俗。这个一定要遵守。                                         别墅仿佛是一座跨越历史的宫殿，独特的风格带领您穿越数世纪的时光隧道，追寻优雅、神秘与梦想。墅内多处绝美的网红拍照📸打卡点，让来宾体验异域国度魅力。现代与传统的完美结合，散发着豪华与优雅。为了让您完全投入舒适写意之大境，绿茵围绕着泳池、亭外休闲区，更让您亲身体验韵味十足的绝色之城。🧿

  期待您的莅临！˜☺

name: 3-Bedroom Premier
address: Khet Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
Designed for families or large travelling groups, these spacious 3 bedroom apartments in Bangkok are duplex serviced abodes that spans across 140sqm, offering our guests privacy and comfort with a view of the Bangkok skyline.
 
Fitted with a king and queen-size beds, an en-suite bathrooms and smart televisions in each bedroom, a fully-equipped kitchenette, and separate living and dining areas. With the generous amount of space, this is a perfect option for a groups of up to 6 persons.

name: Fynn Asoke泼水节短住
address: Khet Huai Khwang, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
在曼谷千万不要租这个公寓！！因为住了不想走，交通便利是的另一个亮点，不管是去siam商圈，还是去贵妇商场，还有新开业的em商场都近在咫尺。位于曼谷的中心地带，曼谷唯一的BTS与MRT换乘站，公寓有免费摆渡车到BTS站。无论是到达商业区，还是探访曼谷的文化地标，都无比便捷，出门就要花米千万不要租这里。
公寓位置就在素坤逸路上，位于许多便利设施的中心位置。靠近，Terminal 21购物商场，附近有素坤逸喜来登酒店，威斯汀素坤逸酒店，等五星酒店，公寓后门可步行到班嘉琦缇皇后公园，国际学校，康民医院也都在附近，EmQuartier贵妇商场1站路，到siam，central world2站路。
公寓内还有星级酒店式大堂，健身房，瑜伽，泳池，豪华公共休息区，烧烤区，屋顶花园。
Fynn Asoke公寓为你开启曼谷的壮阔天际。每一次望出窗外，都是一次与城市灵魂的对话，夜幕下的曼谷，更是如同璀璨星河，等你来探索。
一室一卫的精致生活空间，每一处细节都经过精心设计，旨在为你营造一个舒适的居住环境。无论是家庭聚会，还是个人的静谧时光，都能在这里找到属于自己的角落。

name: fantasy villa tonglor   KTV 台球桌 9卧9卫
address: Watthana, Bangkok, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
曼谷“繁花🌸”S1别墅
                     ---Fantasy Villa泰国民宿

 🏡别墅共有三层。9间卧室，9个卫生间。现代设施一应俱全，中央空调、洗衣机、烘干机、WiFi、留声机等现代设施；设备齐全的中、西厨房，满足您各种烹饪需求；专属停车区可停放6辆私家车；配备两名专职保姆致力于为您打造优质的环境卫生！

位于曼谷市中心素坤逸49巷的翠澜繁花秘境大宅，可容纳18人尽享尊贵时光。宽敞庭院，百平米花海摇曳生姿，一层一天地，散发着泰兰德独有的芬芳。“会呼吸的泳池”簇拥茂密的热带雨林🌴-私密、深邃而迷人；KTV采纳隔音全包，配备美国JBL专业矩阵音响与激光摇头灯为客人打造震撼的视听盛宴，让曼谷之夜璀璨夺目。一层公区两处，曼谷“繁花🌸”S1别墅
                     ---Fantasy Villa泰国民宿

 🏡别墅共有三层。9间卧室，9个卫生间。现代设施一应俱全，中央空调、洗衣机、烘干机、WiFi、留声机等现代设施；设备齐全的中、西厨房，满足您各种烹饪需求；专属停车区可停放6辆私家车；配备两名专职保姆致力于为您打造优质的环境卫生！均近百平的空间巧妙平衡了功能商务会客与娱乐休闲区，全屋高定款法国罗奇堡家私。雪茄品鉴区、台球、餐区等区域大面积拼色撞色，带来全新视觉体验。多处打卡📷区-“维多利亚的秘密”秀场翅膀、中空8米西瓜红配色背景墙作为视觉焦点，增加打卡属性，瞬间燃爆🔥朋友圈

9卧9 卫，私家豪华私家游泳池，宽敞庭院，打造曼谷第一个特色会呼吸的泳池 仿真植物和超美灯光让您尽情打卡 超大卧室，家庭房，享受空调、百寸电视、洗衣机、烘干机、WiFi、留声机 等现代设施。冰箱设备齐全的中央厨房里展示您的厨艺。更有2名专职保姆打造优品🏡环境卫生。

无论您是来旅游还是短期居住，我们都乐于与您分享曼谷的各种生活体验，希望您可以把我们这里当作您在曼谷的家一样～我们也一直在努力！

在您确认定定房后，我们会提供中文、英文English客服服务！有任何问题随时与我们联系～

Feel free to contact with me when you need any support~

泰式别墅现代泳池别墅5+1房，4卫。保姆房一房一卫。花园仍在改造升级当中。面积大概500平米左右。.....泰式别墅位于曼谷富人区铜锣25巷口1公里处的别墅区，巷子里的餐厅满目琳琅。巷口便是个泰式连锁糕点店。紧接着进到巷口便是一家很有名的日式餐厅Miyabi Kappo，往前走泰餐厅ZAO LARB ซาวลาบ，意大利餐厅Pasta等.....
距离BTS Thonglor  2公里，距离曼谷贵妇商场EMQuartier  2公里，距离曼谷医院4公里，距离市中心四面佛8公里。距离素万那普机场和廊曼机场都是27公里。

sectionedDescription/name: 曼谷市中心豪华3层别墅 9个客房 可住18人 超大泳池 KTV房
sectionedDescription/space:
别墅共有三层。9间卧室，9个卫生间。现代设施一应俱全
    中央空调、洗衣机、烘干机、WiFi、留声机等现代设施；
     设备齐全的中、西厨房，满足您各种烹饪需求；
    专属停车区可停放6辆私家车；
     配备两名专职管家服务于您
sectionedDescription/summary:
别墅位于曼谷市中心素坤逸49巷，可容纳18人在这里聚集。
宽敞庭院，散发着泰国独有的风格。庭院内簇拥茂密的热带雨林植物
KTV采纳隔音全包，配备美国JBL专业矩阵音响与激光摇头灯为您打造震撼的视听盛宴，让曼谷之夜璀璨夺目。
一楼有两处公共区域，都是100㎡的功能商务会客与娱乐休闲区，全屋高定款法国家具。
雪茄品鉴区、台球、餐区等大面积豪华装修，带来全新视觉体验。
中空8米的西瓜红配色背景墙作为视觉焦点，增加打卡属性，瞬间燃爆朋友圈
sectionedDescription/transit:
距离素万那普机场Suvarnabhumi Airport 28公里 、45分钟车程;
距离廊曼机场 Don Mueang Airport  30公里、50分钟车程。

This homely serviced apartment offers top-class family accommodation in Bangkok and is fitted with king, queen-size and twin beds in the three bedroom, an en-suite bathroom and smart televisions , kitchenette, separate living and dining areas. This is a perfect option for a groups of up to 6 persons.

name: Luxury Riverside Pool Villa  130 sqm - Dusit area
address: Bangkok, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 2PM - 12AM (midnight) and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
For absolute luxury and privacy, while staying in the heart of Bangkok, retreat to our unique and intimate Pool Villa with river view in our 5-star Hotel.

The 130 sqm villa features a large bedroom, a sumptuous bathroom, a lush internal patio garden with private plunge pool and an open-air terrace. 

The 5-star hotel amenities are all waiting for you to enjoy. Swimming pool, outstanding Spa, English garden, reading room, restaurant, bar,  etc.

Step into your private urban sanctuary; a unique and very private pool villa in a stunning, luxury hotel, replete with exquisite art & antiques and set amidst 3 acres of lush gardens on the Chao Phraya River, adjoining Bangkok’s must-see historical and cultural attractions.

No hyperbole here. Our Pool Villas have literally been known to make guests gasp, as they step first into their lush private courtyard, then past the intimate pool before retreating into a stunningly decorated bedroom.

Last but not least, an outrageously opulent bathroom to enjoy.

What our Guests say:
“The pool villa was beyond what I thought it would be just by looking though the website photos.”

ROOM
Full-size executive desk and ergonomic chair
Ample wardrobe space and luggage racks
Temperature controlled air conditioning
Laptop safe
Mini bar with complimentary water and local snacks
Coffee machine, kettle, tea & coffee
Choice of newspapers and magazines
Fresh flowers and fruit

BATHROOM
Twin sinks
Bathtub
Separate walk-in shower and toilet cubicle
Luxurious toiletries
Bathrobes and slippers

All stays at our Pool Villa include:
Daily breakfast at restaurant
Butler Service
Complimentary Wi-Fi property wide
4G enabled mobile with complimentary data, local & International calling
Shuttle boat between the hotel and Bangkok’s central Sathorn pier

Guests enjoy complete access to the villa, the hotel and all of its facilities and amenities.

Should you have any additional questions before booking or during your stay, please do not hesitate to contact me!

Due to the perfect location of the hotel on the Chao Phraya river side in Dusit, the following points of interest can easily be reached from the villa:

Less than 10 minutes by car:
- Dusit Zoo
- Throne Hall
- Chitlada Palace Vimanmek Teak Palace Royal Elephant Museum

Less than 15 minutes by car:
- Wat Po
- Grand Palace Emerald Buddha Temple of Dawn

Less than 30 minutes by car:
- Silom Road
- Siam Paragon
- BTS skytrain at Taksin Bridge Chatuchak weekend market

Less than 45 minutes by car:
- Suvarnabhumi International Airport Don Muang Airport

Bangkok offers great private and public transportation, over water or over the road. We are happy to arrange any transportation for you on a moment's notice.

The following services are included in the rates:
- Breakfast in the restaurant
- WiFi
- Butler service
- Private boat shuttle between hotel & Saphan Taksin

name: 900㎡的曼谷豪华别墅 4间卧室 8-10人入住 5个独立卫生间
address: Khet Bang Na, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
900㎡的曼谷豪华别墅，光与多面积阴翳形成的私家庭院，拥有超大中央泳池，在水中尽情畅游。景观设计别具匠心，热带植物、波光粼粼的海洋系装扮、偶尔垂落的鸡蛋花，营造出自然浪漫的氛围。 是拍照打卡的绝佳点，无论是阳光下、泳池边，还是夜晚的灯光下，都能拍出高颜值的美照。
    有4间卧室，可以轻松容纳8-10人入住。舒适的大床、空调，让您享受安静私密的休息空间。5个独立卫生间都有干湿分离的淋浴间和洗漱用品，主卧的冲浪双人浴缸让人充满遐想
配备豪华现代的娱乐设施，度过难忘的泰兰德美好时光。在矩阵音响KTV唱心声，在台球室挑战技巧。也可在夜色下的巨幕泳池影院观看电影，在游戏机中体验刺激游戏。此外，提供免费WiFi、中央厨房、洗衣机、烘干机等便利设备，让您感受到尊享服务。
   您也可以用于party，无论是亲友聚会、生日派对、公司团建，主题气氛满满。
有一名专职保姆负责打扫卫生，让您无需担心环境问题

别墅位于bangna商业中心附近，距离市区只需十几分钟车程，交通便利。
步行50m就会有泰式餐厅、多个便利超市和夜市等，均可满足您的需求。

距离素万那普国际机场25分钟
距离廊曼国际机场30分钟

name: Luxury Pool Villa - in Riverside Hotel - Dusit
address: Bangkok, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 2PM - 12AM (midnight) and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
For absolute luxury and privacy, while staying in the heart of Bangkok, retreat to our unique and intimate Pool Villa with garden view in our 5-star Hotel.

The 130 sqm villa features a large bedroom, a sumptuous bathroom, a lush internal patio garden with private plunge pool and an open-air terrace. 

The 5-star hotel amenities are all waiting for you to enjoy. Swimming pool, outstanding Spa, English garden, reading room, restaurant, bar,  etc.

Step into your private urban sanctuary; a unique and very private pool villa in a stunning, luxury hotel, replete with exquisite art & antiques and set amidst 3 acres of lush gardens on the Chao Phraya River, adjoining Bangkok’s must-see historical and cultural attractions.

No hyperbole here. Our Pool Villas have literally been known to make guests gasp, as they step first into their lush private courtyard, then past the intimate pool before retreating into a stunningly decorated bedroom.

Last but not least, an outrageously opulent bathroom to enjoy.

What our Guests say:
“The pool villa was beyond what I thought it would be just by looking though the website photos.”

ROOM
Full-size executive desk and ergonomic chair
Ample wardrobe space and luggage racks
Temperature controlled air conditioning
Laptop safe
Mini bar with complimentary water and local snacks
Coffee machine, kettle, tea & coffee
Choice of newspapers and magazines
Fresh flowers and fruit

BATHROOM
Twin sinks
Bathtub
Separate walk-in shower and toilet cubicle
Luxurious toiletries
Bathrobes and slippers

All stays at our Pool Villa include:
Daily breakfast at restaurant
Butler Service
Complimentary Wi-Fi property wide
4G enabled mobile with complimentary data, local & International calling
Shuttle boat between the hotel and Bangkok’s central Sathorn pier

Guests enjoy complete access to the villa, the hotel and all of its facilities and amenities.

Should you have any additional questions or requests before booking or during your stay, please do not hesitate to reach out to me!

Due to the perfect location of this villa the following points of interest can easily be reached from the villa:

Less than 10 minutes by car:
- Dusit Zoo
- Throne Hall
- Chitlada Palace Vimanmek Teak Palace Royal Elephant Museum

Less than 15 minutes by car:
- Wat Po
- Grand Palace Emerald Buddha Temple of Dawn

Less than 30 minutes by car:
- Silom Road
- Siam Paragon
- BTS skytrain at Taksin Bridge Chatuchak weekend market

Less than 45 minutes by car:
- Suvarnabhumi International Airport Don Muang Airport

Bangkok offers great private and public transportation, over water or over the road. We are happy to arrange any transportation for you on a moment's notice.

A private boat shuttle between hotel & Saphan Taksin is available.

The following services are included in the rates:
- Breakfast in the restaurant
- WiFi
- Butler service
- Private boat shuttle between hotel & Saphan Taksin.

name: The Bloom Garden Cafe 布魯姆花園咖啡館
address: Khet Bang Bon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 12PM (noon) - 10PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
บ้านหรูหราตั้งอยู่ในกรุงเทพมหานครเมืองหลวง ด้วยทำเลที่สะดวกเดินทางไปยังสถานที่ท่องเที่ยวได้อย่างง่ายดาย เพลิดเพลินกับความสุขยามเช้าด้วยบรรยากาศดี ๆ ธรรมชาติสุด ๆบรรยากาศริมน้ำ การจิบกาแฟดีๆ ที่ร้านกาแฟที่ตั้งอยู่ในนี้ ชื่อ The Bloom Garden Café สนุกกับกิจกรรมถ่ายรูป เพลิดเพลินกับการชมวิวสวย ๆ รอบๆ วิวทะเลสาบ มีสระว่ายน้ำ มีสิ่งอำนวยความสะดวก เครื่องปรับอากาศ ทีวี ตู้เย็น น้ำดื่มบรรจุขวด มีผ้าขนหนู สถานที่ท่องเที่ยวที่โดดเด่นคือสยามพารากอน ไอคอนสยาม แพลทตินั่ม วัดพระเชตุพนวิมลมังคลาราม (วัดโพธิ์)

- 7-eleven 2 กม.
- เซ็นทรัลพระราม 2 11 กม. 
-mrt หลักสอง 12 กม. 
-British Columbia International School  15 กม.
- เดอะมอลล์บางแค 19 กม.
- ตลาดน้ำอัมพวา 65 กม. 
-สนามบินสุวรรณภูมิ (ฺBKK) 60 กม. 
-สนามบินนานาชาติดอนเมือง (DMK) 55 กม.
- สยามพารากอน 31 กม. 
-ไอคอนสยาม 22 กม. 
-แพลทตินั่ม 22 กม. 
-วัดพระเชตุพนวิมลมังคลาราม

ที่พักมีที่จอดรถให้บริการฟรี ซึ่งผู้เข้าพักสามารถนำรถไปจอดเองได้อย่างสะดวกง่ายดาย หากท่านต้องการท่องเที่ยวเดินทางในกรุงเทพด้วยรถยนต์ส่วนตัว สามารถจัดหาบริการแท็กซี่ หรือรถตู้บริการให้ท่านได้ มีบริการรับส่งสนามบินมีค่าใช้จ่าย
sectionedDescription/houseRules: มีบริการอาหารเช้า ค่าใช้จ่ายเพิ่ม เด็กอายุ 0-12 ปี: พักห้องเดียว กับพ่อแม่หรือผู้ปกครองได้ฟรี สำหรับเตียงเสริม 1 เตียง สูงสุด 1-2 คนต่อห้อง ที่พักมอบส่วนลด 10% ที่เดอะบลูมการ์เด้นคาเฟ่ ใช้ได้กับอาหารและเครื่องดื่ม ไม่อนุญาตให้จัดงานปาร์ตี้ งดส่งเสียงดังตั้งแต่เวลา 22.00 น. ห้ามทำอาหาร ห้ามทำสิ่งผิดกฎหมาย

name: Cabanaz Pool Villa & Spa Bangkok, Thailand
address: Khet Chatuchak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 6PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
ที่พักที่ไม่เหมือนใคร ตั้งอยู่ในใจกลางซอย รัชดาภิเษก 36 (ซอยเสือใหญ่)
มีสระว่ายน้ำ และห้องพักส่วนตัว 7 ห้อง
สามารถพักได้สูงสุด 14 ท่าน
***สำหรับไม่เกิน 10 ท่าน ใช้ 4 ห้องชั้นพูลวิลล่า+เตียงเสริม หากต้องการเข้าพักจำนวนมากกว่านั้นชั้นบนอีก 3 ห้อง จะมีค่าใช้จ่ายเพิ่มเติมกรุณาสอบถามในข้อความอีกครั้ง***

📍 มีค่าประกันความเสียหาย 10,000.- บาท/คืน

มีร้านอาหาร บุฟเฟ่ต์ ไอศกรีม ชานมไข่มุก ร้านเสริมสวย เครื่องซักผ้า 7-11 mini-bigc เดินลงมามีครบทุกอย่าง
🌳 สภาพแวดล้อมดี บรรยากาศถ่ายเท มีมุมให้นั่งชิวๆ
🌆 สถานที่เรียนเดินทางสะดวก ใกล้ Bts รัชโยธิน เสนานิคม MRT ลาดพร้าว มหาวิทยาลัยราชภัฏจันทรเกษม
sectionedDescription/houseRules: งดใช้เสียงหลัง 5 ทุ่ม
sectionedDescription/name: Cabanaz Pool Villa & Spa Bangkok, Thailand
sectionedDescription/summary:
ที่พักที่ไม่เหมือนใคร ตั้งอยู่ในใจกลางซอย รัชดาภิเษก 36 (ซอยเสือใหญ่)
มีสระว่ายน้ำ และห้องพักส่วนตัว 7 ห้อง
สามารถพักได้สูงสุด 14 ท่าน
***สำหรับไม่เกิน 10 ท่าน ใช้ 4 ห้องชั้นพูลวิลล่า+เตียงเสริม หากต้องการเข้าพักจำนวนมากกว่านั้นชั้นบนอีก 3 ห้อง จะมีค่าใช้จ่ายเพิ่มเติมกรุณาสอบถามในข้อความอีกครั้ง***

📍 มีค่าประกันความเสียหาย 10,000.- บาท/คืน

มีร้านอาหาร บุฟเฟ่ต์ ไอศกรีม ชานมไข่มุก ร้านเสริมสวย เครื่องซักผ้า 7-11 mini-bigc เดินลงมามีครบทุกอย่าง
🌳 สภาพแวดล้อมดี บรรยากาศถ่ายเท มีมุมให้นั่งชิวๆ
🌆 สถานที่เรียนเดินทางสะดวก ใกล้ Bts รัชโยธิน เสนานิคม MRT ลาดพร้าว มหาวิทยาลัยราชภัฏจันทรเกษม

name: 6-Bedroom at PRIYA Boutique House
address: Khet Phra Nakhon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Not suitable for children (2-12 years) and pets
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Wanna explore unique experience & lifestyle?

Welcome to PRIYA boutique hotel,  a historical house long standing for 100 years. Generation after generation, until renovation project to a cozy & private property keeping its nostalgic characters with a touch of new refurbishment and safety system in place to ensure safety of our guests. 

This place is run by our family members so you can expect our hospitality. Any suggestion / assistance before, during, and after your stay are welcomed.

For a whole property, we provide 6 separated bedrooms for up to 14 guests.
Each bedroom has its own characters and private bathroom within. It is common that you will be fighting with your friends over choosing your preferred room!

Contact us for date availability.

- Reception
- Spiral staircase to patio & rooftop
- Backyard
- Dining area
- Garden

Located in the heart of retro welcoming local community but accessibility is convenient.

Walking distance to heritage landmark and well-known street food such as
5 mins walk to: Rajadamnern Rd
10 mins walk to:  
- Golden Mountain
- Loha Prasat (Metallic Castle)
- Democracy Monument
- Famous street food; Jay Fai, Pad Thai Tipsamai
- Boat Transfer ( alternative linkage to CBD and shopping mall)

15 mins walk to:
- Kao Sarn Road
- Bang Lamphu 
- Giant Swing
- Krua Apsorn (another famous restaurant)

25 mins walk to:
- Grand Palace 
- Wat Pho 

And many more such as cozy café and hidden bar! (Suggestion upon arrival)

Let's make this place even more unique!

Welcome drinks: locally brewed craft beers! Some of those batches are even brewed at this property.

PS. please state your request during booking confirmation or a couple weeks before arrival so we can ensure that you will NOT missing out experiencing our craft beers.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
No party is allowed.
Drinking and chilling are acceptable.

name: Sukhumvit Thonglor25 Swimming pool Villa素坤逸铜锣泳池别墅
address: Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 3PM and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
泰式泳池别墅位于曼谷市中心富人区铜锣25巷口1公里处的别墅区，别墅6卧4卫➕保姆房一房一卫，别墅内自带泳池，面积大约500平米左右。别墅周围遍布各国美食餐厅、咖啡厅集网红打卡店，是曼谷年轻人最chill的逛街好去处。巷口有个泰式连锁糕点店和一家知名日式餐厅Miyabi Kappo，往前走泰餐厅ZAO LARB ซาวลาบ，意大利餐厅Pasta等.....
距离BTS Thonglor  2公里，距离The 8 Tonglo 商场1.5公里，你们距离曼谷贵妇商场EMQuartier  2公里，距离三美泰医院1.5公里，曼谷医院4公里，距离市中心四面佛8公里。距离素万那普机场和廊曼机场都是27公里。可提供付费接机、租车服务。
欢迎您入住我们的别墅，享受一个美好轻松悠闲的假日时光，相信这里是您在曼谷一个不错的家。

name: UKing曼谷Thonlor富人区六卧五卫全屋柚木定制别墅
address: Khet Huai Khwang, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
sectionedDescription/description:
别墅整体由进口柚木全屋定制.柚木以其纹理细腻、质地稳定和色泽丰富而闻名于世。
    它们的天然美感与别墅装修的自然风格是绝佳的搭档。柚木的自然属性呼之欲出，让人们仿佛置身于大自然怀抱之中。您能感受到大自然的温暖和宁静，享受到纯粹的生活品质。为您和家人创造美好的回忆

name: Siam Luxury Suite 80 sqm
address: Bangkok, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/1: Check-in time is 2PM - 12AM (midnight) and check out by 12PM (noon)
sectionedDescription/description:
Our suite features an oversized King bed, double wardrobes, luggage racks and sinks, deep bathtubs, separate walk-in showers plus Art Deco-style living rooms ideal for leisurely breakfasts and afternoon tea.

All uniquely themed and are located on two floors in the Main Residence adjacent to the spa, with convenient access to our gym, library and meeting room. 

Our suite is ideal for solo travelers or couples and anything but ordinary.

Our spirit is to create a luxury experience embracing every moment and every individual with sincerity, integrity and a passion for service.

Our luxury urban resort in Bangkok providing sincere and intuitive service for our guests, staff and partners, whilst creating a memorable experience for all.

Included amenities: 

•    Shared infinity pool
•    Breakfast in the restaurant
•    Complimentary WiFi property wide
•    Complimentary local calls in Bangkok with area code 02 
•    Butler service
•    Private boat shuttle between resort & Saphan Taksin central pier

Size: 80 sqm

Distance to:

> 10 minutes
Dusit Zoo
Throne Hall
Chitlada Palace Vimanmek Teak Palace Royal Elephant Museum
> 15 minutes
Wat Po
Grand Palace Emerald Buddha Temple of Dawn
> 30 minutes
Silom Road
Siam Paragon
BTS skytrain at Taksin Bridge Chatuchak weekend market
> 45 minutes to
Suvarnabhumi International Airport Don Muang Airport

Transportation:

Taxi service or private tours will be happily arranged by resort staff.

name: 奢华3层别墅 5个卧室6个卫生间 管家服务 豪华KTV 超大庭院
address: Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
别墅位于市中心素坤逸Sukhumuvit39巷，1000㎡大宅，“最美夕阳”就在此，院内有东南亚珍稀植物
       曼谷最大的高12米炫酷奢华KTV，商务洽谈的优选首选，也是举家欢聚的绝佳场地。
英国玛田矩阵音响、专业级舞美灯效、200寸巨幕LED电视、法国罗奇堡家居、尽享极致视听盛宴。
1楼2楼均设有Lounge区，270°落地窗，多处网红拍照打卡区，苔藓墙、顶尖设计师同款沙发，可以捕捉拍照的美好瞬间。
独特的无边超大泳池
      3层别墅，5卧卧室6卫生间。风格各异卧室，配备独立更衣区、五星酒店床品。
主卧卫生间另备超大浴缸。现代设施一应俱全，中央空调、洗衣机、烘干机、WiFi、开放式中、西厨房，满足您各种烹饪需求；
院内私家停车区可停3-4辆车；
一名专职管家服务于您

name: Luxury Pool Villa w/ Jacuzzi + Lift in Thonglor
address: Watthana, Bangkok, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/0: Check-in is anytime after 4PM and check out by 10AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Our spacious 5 bedroom 6.5 Bathroom luxury villa is more than a home; it's an embodiment of a lavish lifestyle that few experience. The careful attention to detail, desired central location, and the exquisite state-of-the-art amenties create a symphony of modern luxury that's beyond compare. 

Two Private pools, jacuzzi and lift inside. 

Don't just imagine the pinnacle of urban living – live it, in this extraordinary villa designed to exceed your expectations in Bangkok.

*Enquire for dates*

Upon entering, guests are greeted by soaring ceilings that accentuate the sense of openness and sophistication throughout the home. Designed for lavish living and entertaining, the villa features five bedrooms and six bathrooms, offering ample accommodation for residents and guests alike. 

The centerpiece of this magnificent abode is undoubtedly the private jacuzzi and two swimming pools, where residents can indulge in leisurely swims or bask in the tropical sun amidst the lush green surroundings. Whether hosting glamorous soirées, a family friendly BBQ, or enjoying quiet moments of relaxation, the pools provide the perfect backdrop for memorable experiences with all state-of-the-art amenities for your perusal. 

Parking is never a concern with spaces for 5-10 cars. Additionally, a maid's room with two bedrooms is available (only 5 bedrooms are officially advertised), catering to the needs of household staff and ensuring seamless maintenance of the villa. 

Private lift inside the home no need to use the stairs. 

Modern architecture combined with nature’s greenery and premium interiors provide the ultimate must-try experience. 

In summary, this private modern pool villa in the heart of Thailand's vibrant city offers a rare blend of luxury, comfort, and convenience. From its spacious interiors and resort-style amenities to its prime location and proximity to amenities, this villa embodies the epitome of upscale urban living. Discerning individuals seeking an unparalleled lifestyle experience need look no further than this exquisite retreat in Ekkamai Villa.

*Message privately for available dates*

Conveniently next to a huge Don Don Donki Mall (Large 24/7 supermarket that has everything), close to BTS station, local and branded shops - massage parlour, food, stalls and fashion etc. Nearby the busy night life and major tourist attractions.

- Additional TWO maid bedrooms available  (not advertised)
- Free Parking for 5-10 cars
- Nearby Huge Don Don Donki Mall 
- BTS Station close by
- Many branded shops, party, tourist attractions near home
- Weekly maintenance of private swimming pool, jacuzzi and plants
- Security: Gated villa
- Extra mattresses can be provided


- Private Pool
- Bath Tubs
- Jacuzzi
- Smart TVs
- SuperSpeed Wi-Fi
- 24hrs self-check-in
- Excellent service, concierge and local tour guide
- Airport transfer can be arranged
- Wheelchair friendly
- Family friendly

Here at your service!
sectionedDescription/name: Luxury Pool Villa w/ Jacuzzi + Lift in Thonglor

Here at your service!
sectionedDescription/space:
Upon entering, guests are greeted by soaring ceilings that accentuate the sense of openness and sophistication throughout the home. Designed for lavish living and entertaining, the villa features five bedrooms and six bathrooms, offering ample accommodation for residents and guests alike. 

The centerpiece of this magnificent abode is undoubtedly the private jacuzzi and two swimming pools, where residents can indulge in leisurely swims or bask in the tropical sun amidst the lush green surroundings. Whether hosting glamorous soirées, a family friendly BBQ, or enjoying quiet moments of relaxation, the pools provide the perfect backdrop for memorable experiences with all state-of-the-art amenities for your perusal. 

Parking is never a concern with spaces for 5-10 cars. Additionally, a maid's room with two bedrooms is available (only 5 bedrooms are officially advertised), catering to the needs of household staff and ensuring seamless maintenance of the villa. 

Private lift inside the home no need to use the stairs. 

Modern architecture combined with nature’s greenery and premium interiors provide the ultimate must-try experience. 

In summary, this private modern pool villa in the heart of Thailand's vibrant city offers a rare blend of luxury, comfort, and convenience. From its spacious interiors and resort-style amenities to its prime location and proximity to amenities, this villa embodies the epitome of upscale urban living. Discerning individuals seeking an unparalleled lifestyle experience need look no further than this exquisite retreat in Ekkamai Villa.

*Message privately for available dates*
sectionedDescription/summary:
Our spacious 5 bedroom 6.5 Bathroom luxury villa is more than a home; it's an embodiment of a lavish lifestyle that few experience. The careful attention to detail, desired central location, and the exquisite state-of-the-art amenties create a symphony of modern luxury that's beyond compare. 

Two Private pools, jacuzzi and lift inside. 

Don't just imagine the pinnacle of urban living – live it, in this extraordinary villa designed to exceed your expectations in Bangkok.

*Enquire for dates*

name: New private pool villa, mrt, Chatuchak, jodd fair
address: Khet Chatuchak, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in time is 3PM - 2AM (next day) and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
Welcome to our exquisite 5-bedroom 6 bathrooms luxury pool villa, conveniently located near Chatuchak & Jodd fair ,MRT/BTS 6 station, guests have easy access to the area’s bustling markets, eclectic dining scene, and cultural attractions. Whether you’re exploring the vibrant streets or simply unwinding in the comfort of your villa, your stay promises to be a memorable experience.

This modern 5-bedroom villa sounds like an ideal retreat for families or large groups seeking comfort and convenience. Here's a breakdown of its features:

Ground Floor: Spacious Living and Dining Area: Perfect for gatherings, with a fully-fitted Western-style kitchen nearby.

Fully Equipped Kitchen: Ready to meet all culinary needs, accompanied by a comfortable dining and sitting area.

Large Flatscreen: Entertainment is covered with a sizable flatscreen in the living room.

Second Floor: Two Ensuite Bedrooms: one with king bed size and the second with queen beds for a comfortable night's rest.

Third Floor: Two Ensuite Bedrooms: Similar to the second floor, offering more private spaces for guests.

Fourth Floor: Fifth Ensuite Bedroom: Featuring a king bed for additional accommodation options. Fitness Area: Perfect for maintaining an active lifestyle during your stay.

Rooftop: Laundry Room: Complete with a washing machine and laundry rack, ideal for longer stays where laundry needs may be more frequent.

Overall, this villa provides a wonderful balance of privacy, location, and space, making it an excellent choice for a relaxing getaway with loved ones.

Guests have exclusive access to the whole villa including private swimming pool.

We respect guest privacy but very happy to give any advice, help or information you might need. Feel free to contact us anytime via inbox.

Welcome to Chatuchak, a dynamic neighborhood in the heart of Bangkok that pulsates with energy, color, and culture. Renowned for its bustling markets, verdant parks, and vibrant atmosphere, Chatuchak offers a sensory delight for visitors from around the globe.

At the heart of the neighborhood lies the iconic Chatuchak Weekend Market, one of the largest markets in the world. Spanning over 35 acres, this labyrinthine maze is a treasure trove of goods, from handmade crafts and vintage clothing to exotic pets and delicious street food. Lose yourself in the maze of narrow alleyways and discover unique souvenirs and trinkets to take home.

Beyond the market, Chatuchak is home to a diverse array of attractions and activities. Explore the verdant oasis of Chatuchak Park, where locals gather for picnics, leisurely strolls, and outdoor workouts amidst lush greenery and serene ponds. Nearby, the Children's Discovery Museum offers interactive exhibits and educational fun for the whole family.

We appreciate your help in conserving energy during your stay. Simple steps like turning off lights and air conditioner when leaving the room or when natural light is sufficient, adjusting the thermostat responsibly, and being mindful of water consumption by turning off the faucet while brushing your teeth, can make a big difference.  These actions not only reduce our environmental impact today but also ensure a sustainable future for generations to come. Your cooperation in creating a greener tomorrow is sincerely appreciated.
sectionedDescription/houseRules:
- No smoking allowed in the house, outside only. It is against the law to smoke in these premises FINE 5,000 THB.
- No illegal substances allowed on the premises.
- Please take care of the furnishings. You have to pay for damages if it occured.
- Please don’t re-arrange the furniture.

name: 900㎡的曼谷豪华别墅 4间卧室 8-10人入住 5个独立卫生间
address: Khet Bang Na, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
guestControls/structuredHouseRules/2: Check-in is anytime after 2PM and check out by 11AM
sectionedDescription/description:
900㎡的曼谷豪华别墅，光与多面积阴翳形成的私家庭院，拥有超大中央泳池，在水中尽情畅游。景观设计别具匠心，热带植物、波光粼粼的海洋系装扮、偶尔垂落的鸡蛋花，营造出自然浪漫的氛围。   是拍照打卡的绝佳点，无论是阳光下、泳池边，还是夜晚的灯光下，都能拍出高颜值的美照。
    有4间卧室，可以轻松容纳8-10人入住。舒适的大床、空调，让您享受安静私密的休息空间。5个独立卫生间都有干湿分离的淋浴间和洗漱用品，主卧的冲浪双人浴缸让人充满遐想
      配备豪华现代的娱乐设施，度过难忘的泰兰德美好时光。在矩阵音响KTV唱心声，在台球室挑战技巧。也可在夜色下的巨幕泳池影院观看电影，在游戏机中体验刺激游戏。此外，提供免费WiFi、中央厨房、洗衣机、烘干机等便利设备，让您感受到尊享服务。
   您也可以用于party，无论是亲友聚会、生日派对、公司团建，主题气氛满满。
    有一名专职保姆负责打扫卫生，让您无需担心环境问题

别墅位于bangna商业中心附近，距离市区只需十几分钟车程，交通便利。
步行50m就会有泰式餐厅、多个便利超市和夜市等，均可满足您的需求。

距离素万那普国际机场25分钟
距离廊曼国际机场30分钟
